name: Chambre privée dans un Condominium havre de paix.
summary: Condominium nouveau  bien situé , havre de paix,
space: Quartier tranquil et paisible ,  3 voisins tranquilles,5 mn de marche pour le métro , 100 m de bus jour et nuit, parcs, marchers, centre ville, place des arts ,pont , autoroute, piscines publics intérieur et extérieur .
description: Condominium nouveau  bien situé , havre de paix, Quartier tranquil et paisible ,  3 voisins tranquilles,5 mn de marche pour le métro , 100 m de bus jour et nuit, parcs, marchers, centre ville, place des arts ,pont , autoroute, piscines publics intérieur et extérieur . Accès sur le balcon ,sortie située sur la chambre des maîtres  au cas où vous désirez relaxer au soleil . Je suis disponible pour répondre au téléphone si disponible au travail, sms , mails Parcs, métro , bus, marcher, bibliothèques, piscines extérieur et intérieur, stations du vélo de la ville. Bus a 100 m , jour et nuit,métro ligne verte à 5 mn de marche (2stations), vélo de ville à tous les coins de la rue .

access: Accès sur le balcon ,sortie située sur la chambre des maîtres  au cas où vous désirez relaxer au soleil .

house_rules: - pas de bruit après 22h:30 et franchise à propos du nombre des personnes logées.

host.host_about:
Infirmier de profession, au Canada depuis 18ans :-), très sociable, aime les bons soupers entre amis.  Esprit de voyageur, très ouvert sur les différentes cultures. Aime échanger et partager autour d'un bon déjeuner. Bon cuisinier et curieux de tout ce qui événements culturels en ville avec des bonnes références pour restos , cafés et lieux d’attractions.
Non fumeur.

reviews.comments: Abdou was the perfect host and our room in his apartment was very clean and had space for our luggage. His apartment is lovely and we were happy to share it with him for the weekend. Recommended for anyone going to Montreal.

Amazing host and loved the special touches he put from snacks he provided to notes he left to travel tips and recommendations.

The bed however was a bit small, likely a kid's bed, but otherwise a great stay.
A Good Experience!

Abdoul’s place is perfectly located and is near to all the main attractions in Montreal. It is at a walking distance from the subway station and there are lots of shops nearby. The locality is peaceful. And the house is beautiful.
Abdoul is an amazing host and a joyful person. He shared many tips to travel around the city. He is happy to answer all queries. 
Thumbs up for Abdoul and his beautiful and cozy house.

Warm regards,
Sephali

Abdou’s house was clean, cozy, and very welcoming. The interior was very stylish and the location was super convenient for our needs. As a host, Abdou did a phenomenal job ensuring that we felt comfortable and took time out of his busy schedule to show us around the city. My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would love to return in the future.
Abdou has a very comfortable, clean residence close to an amazing coffee/pastry shop/metro...free parking in Montreal...he offered us the best tea I've ever had!
Great host! Very detailed oriented.

Mon séjour chez Abdou était PARFAIT.
Déjà l'appartement d'Abdou est très propre, bien équipé et bien situé. 
D'autre part,  Abdou est un hôte attentionné qui n'hésite pas à partager (des bons plans et des discussions très intéressante entre autre).
Merci Abdou!

name: Humble hut in the middle of kihei!!
summary: 7 minutes walk to the beach!! There are grocery stores nearby as well as public transportation!
space: Quiet atmosphere and relaxing!  You  have access to the kitchen and share a bathroom.
description: 7 minutes walk to the beach!! There are grocery stores nearby as well as public transportation! Quiet atmosphere and relaxing!  You  have access to the kitchen and share a bathroom. Guests have access to communal areas like the kitchen, living room, front yard as well as share a bathroom. You can text. Close to two shopping centers “Azeka” and “ piiliani shopping center”!! Close to many beaches!! 7 minutes walk! Room has an airconditioner!! You can rent a car or take a 2 min walk to the bust stop. There’s are many bus stops nearby! The room has an air conditioner to enjoy your stay here. You have access to the kitchen and refrigerator!! You share a bathroom. We have many beach accessories to make your stay better! There is a lock box conveniently placed outside the access code will be given to you 24 hours prior to check in.  There is free parking only if you park in the left stall or in the street
neighborhood_overview: Close to two shopping centers “Azeka” and “ piiliani shopping center”!! Close to many beaches!! 7 minutes walk! Room has an airconditioner!!
notes: The room has an air conditioner to enjoy your stay here. You have access to the kitchen and refrigerator!! You share a bathroom. We have many beach accessories to make your stay better! There is a lock box conveniently placed outside the access code will be given to you 24 hours prior to check in.  There is free parking only if you park in the left stall or in the street
transit: You can rent a car or take a 2 min walk to the bust stop. There’s are many bus stops nearby!
access: Guests have access to communal areas like the kitchen, living room, front yard as well as share a bathroom.
interaction: You can text.

host.host_about: I like to explore and eat good food!

reviews.comments: Great place, quite and peaceful.

Maria is a wonderful host, friendly and super accommodating. Communication was a breeze and she’s quick respond always. The place was clean and comfortable, and Maria provided those extra little thoughtful touches that made my stay extra welcoming. The location is central and convenient. Only downside is that I wish I had more time to just sit and chat with Maria!

Maria and her son made me feel at home. They offered great hospitality and helped me plan my daily adventures accordingly. The room was clean and the location of the house was perfect to travel around Maui!
Great host and great place! I recommend it 100%

Maria was very sweet and Christian was knowledgeable and gave great suggestions for places to go. It’s in a great central location where you can easily make it to where you want to go in a short drive. They were flexible with the checkin and checkout which we greatly appreciated. Would recommend and stay here again.
Maria’s place was amazing. Warm and homely. I would highly recommend!
Accommodations worked for our 6-night stay! We spent a lot of time away from the house during the day, and parking was never an issue when we returned. We had nice hot showers and cold AC.
Close to the beech and all the shops. Thank you Maria.

May be worth paying a bit more if you can find another place in the area with whole house AC and a private bathroom but if those things aren't important to you this was a great value in a very walkable area.
Gut gelegen um die Insel zu erkunden.

Our stay at Maria’s place was fine, very quiet and peaceful place to sleep. The room is confortable and the A/C works fine. If you don’t see any problem sharing a bathroom and a kitchen and you are looking for a cheap place to stay, you are at the good place. There was a parking space for our car in the driveway. Her son knows the place very well and he gaves us good advices on the place to visit.
Was a decent place to stay but if you can you should look to rent a whole house
At Maria's you can expect a very clean home but a very small room. Window in the room doesn't open it does have an AC but still feels very claustrophobic.

Maria’s place was perfect for us. We really wanted to stay in Hawaii and feel like a local and her place made it possible. She was so sweet, always taking care of us and making sure we had everything we needed. I would go back for sure! Thank you so much Maria!

We had a good stay at Maria's place. It is not a swanky place but the dollar value is definitely good. The location in Kihei is close to everything from shopping area to the beach. The place is also just as advertised. The room is actually very small, but there was AC in the room and clean sheets. The check in process is smooth.  We stayed outside most of the time so we only came back to sleep. The only issue is that from the website it says Maria is the only tenant but I think there's another tenant here as well. There is only one bathroom for the entire house, so if not arranged well, using the bathroom could be a bit of a traffic. Overall, if you are looking for cheap place to spend the night in Kihei, this is acceptable value overall.
Maria was a great host!! She was super friendly and very helpful!! We had the best time at her place!!!

Maria's place was great! Extremely convenient location and good neighborhood. Walking distance to beach and lots of restaurants. Maria was very hospitable and went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable. The room is small so it could get a bit crowded and there is only one shared bathroom in the house so sometimes had to wait for a shower. All in all it was a very good experience at her house!

Although very basic, Maria provided everything we needed to enjoy our three days in the Kihei area. The bed and pillows were super comfortable and the room very clean on arrival. Check-in is super easy and flexible as Maria provided the combo to a key lock box. The location was perfect for what we needed - supermarket within walking, easy access to beaches and decent restaurants nearby. If you are looking for basic accommodation in the Kihei area, you cannot go wrong here.
Nice host. It was easy to communicate with her. The room was a bit small but very clean. I would reccomand this place

Very convenient location - just 20 minutes away from the airport, and not too far from Lahaina or Mt Haleakala. The house is very simple, room is very small but very clean. The bed and pillow are very comfortable and smells like freshly done laundry. There is an AC in the room too which is much appreciated and needed. Maria and her son both live in the house but they’re not home for the most part, but you will be sharing the bathroom with them. Even though the house is clean but it is on a tropical island, so expect some bugs.

Check-in and out was super fast and straight forward, and Maria is very responsive. Her and her son also gave great recommendations!

Overall if you’re on a budget and will be out exploring the island all day, and just need a clean room and bathroom, I would recommend Maria’s place.
During my stay I greatly enjoyed my time at Maria's, it was always calm and quiet, so much that I almost thought I was the only other person in the house! A+++
nice place close to the center

Maria was very friendly and welcoming. The pictures are very accurate and the rooms are clean. Great to have your own key to be able to come and go as you please. Location was convenient and nice area in general.
Easy to find, pretty close to the ocean, very clean space.  :)
Great house in a great area! Maria is very friendly and willing to suggest places to visit.
Great location! Not far to anything, and Maria is awesome.
Solid place to sleep for a night

Maria and her son are super welcoming! Place is exactly as described. Great location in Kihei (not right in the centre of all the tourist activity which is just how we like it). Would definitely stay here again if we’re ever in Maui again. Thanks again Maria!!
The house was well located. However, we didn’t really see often Maria. But we didn’t get any problem!
Maria gives you the space you need and it is clean and they are respectful. Please keep in mind the guest bed may have fleas, it was uncomfortable. Other than that I had a wonderful stay.

The place was as described and in a great location to explore Maui. it's a comfortable place to sleep and shower. It's obviously not going to have the top end amenities that others might have but it also is much more affordable. Maria was not around very much as she was working a lot but she communicated well. I recommend the place to anyone looking for an affordable place to rest and clean up in Maui.
Maria was a nice lady :) It was a good place

Maria’s home is humble and simple. She takes very meticulous care of her home and is so kind and gracious.  The house and rooms are very tidy and clean at all times. Her family is very quiet, considerate, and welcoming. 
Nothing fancy to find here, but so much more if you prefer a local and personal touch.
Would stay here again any time!
Maria’s place is close to everything including the beach where we would see sunset! She’s very accommodating and responses quickly to our requests.
Maria's place is quaint but cute and offers just what you need. Maria is very kind and her home gives off the same vibes, I would definitely recommend Maria's place.

I'm going to try to be as honest and objective as possible. While Maria was a gracious and welcoming host, her son was not. He made us feel very unwelcome and uncomfortable and seemed hostile in one situation. He obviously did not want us there and 
we ended up cutting our stay short (leaving before the midway point of our trip). Whatever you do, DO NOT GO in the backyard.
Humble is the right word but all the comfort awaits you. Maria and family are helpful and willing to help. Comfortable bed and quiet area. Very close to shops and the beach. I recommand.

すぐ近くに､ｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞﾓｰﾙや海辺があって旅行には最適な場所です｡
また､返信がとても早いので安心して宿泊できます｡

Maria’s place is at great location, nearby food trucks and supermarket and coffee shop. It’s also close to beaches and the airport.
She is very responsive and you get all the needed amenities such as clean towels (both bath and beach towels) and soap/shampoo/conditioner. 
I got to see her at night and early in the morning and she always greeted us with warm smiles.

name: Stylish Mile End Condo with City Views from the Roof Deck
summary: Greet the day as morning light fills a chic and modern space. Take your cup of coffee to the rooftop deck to see sweeping views of the city and the trees of Mont Royal Park. After a long day of exploring take a dip in the hot tub or fire up the BBQ.
space: The Building: Originally built in 1929, the building was recently transformed into newly built, high-end condominiums designed specifically to provide guests with everything they need for a perfect stay. Our magnificent welcome lobby pays homage to the building’s rich history, contrasting with the modern design within the units themselves.  Kitchen and Living Area: Enjoy the open concept kitchen & dinette with stainless steel appliances, a large dining room table with seating for 8 guests, dishwasher, washer/dryer and a very comfortable pull-out couch, which is suitable for up to 2 guests to sleep on. Bedroom breakdown: The master bedroom has a king sized bed which can be converted into two twin sized beds before your arrival (upon request).  The second bedroom also has a king sized bed which can be converted into two twin sized beds before your arrival (upon request).  The third semi private bedroom also has a king sized bed which can be converted into two twin sized beds before your
description: Greet the day as morning light fills a chic and modern space. Take your cup of coffee to the rooftop deck to see sweeping views of the city and the trees of Mont Royal Park. After a long day of exploring take a dip in the hot tub or fire up the BBQ.
neighborhood_overview: This historic building is in Mile End—a hip, laid-back area with an artsy vibe and multicultural roots. Walk to great restaurants, bars, cafes, bakeries, and boutiques, as well as Mount Royal Park, Jean Talon Market, Little Italy, and nightlife spots.
transit: Buses and taxis are available in front of the building. The city offers bicycles for rent located on our corner (Bixi bikes), which are perfect for exploring the entire city. Simply return the bicycle to another station within 30 minutes and you’re all set! You can pay for a single Bixi ride or a 24 hour pass.
interaction: Check in is easy and flexible. I will provide you with the combination number to your unit 24 hours before arrival. You can feel free to check in anytime after 4PM. Please contact me through Airbnb.
house_rules: * You are responsible for any disturbance coming from the unit during your stay. * A 500$ fine will apply per night for any party or disturbance reported by neighbours. * Please treat our place as if it is your own and govern yourself accordingly. * If you use the kitchen, please do not leave any dirty dishes or glasses upon checkout. * Please put garbage in the stairwell on a daily basis so we can pick it up.  * There is no smoking in the apartment, you can smoke outside and on the balconies. If the smoke detector turns positive after your departure, a smoking penalty of $150 will be charged on your security deposit. * Late check out penalty fee is 50$ (without notice). Please advise me if you want to enjoy late checkout. In the event that it's possible, there is no charge, otherwise please respect the 11:00 am checkout since the cleaners must prepare the unit for the next guests. *Guests will be required to provide ID upon arrival, and a security deposit of $350

host.host_about: I love to travel, and I always learn from each trip how to make my place better for guests.

reviews.comments:
Berish and his team were very accommodating to our group.  The rooftop is amazing with a great view and very nice furniture.  I heard there was a hot tub going in right after our stay.  This place is classy!   Very nice entryway and felt very safe and secure in our accommodations!
Berish and team were very friendly.  I would recommend this space to anyone!

Berish and his team are dedicated to ensuring that their guests every need is taken care of and very quickly, the units are incredibly well appointed spacious and comfortable, finishes are top notch as far as down to the linens and towels not a single detail is overlooked. The view from the rooftop patio is something to experience on a busy weekend in the city. The units are exactly as stated and photographed. This was our second unit in the building on this trip as we needed an extension. Berish and his team immediately  addressed our needs for an extension -as they always did with immediate responses- and worked tirelessly to make the transition to another fantastic unit an absolute breeze. Enjoy the roof top patio with full sun exposure and relaxing large hot tub overlooking the downtown skyline you will not be disappointed in your choice of any of these units. This building is situated right in the center of a fantastic vibrant neighbourhood with no shortage of phenomenal restaurants walk up cafes and patios for days. We could not have had a better location choice or a better stay. Very satisfied customer. These are true Super Hosts. Thank you to Berish and his amazing team for making our 15 day work trip into a mini vacation and showing us what Montreal has to offer when booking with a true Super host!
tres beau logement
A nice duplex apartment located in the Orthodox Jewish community quarter on Parc Avenue.
Great unit! Great hot tub! Beautiful views of Mt Royal. Highly recommend.
Awesome place I recommend it to anyone who can make it fit in there budget!
grea
Berish and his team were very helpful and always responded immediately.  Location was great and the roof deck with hot tub really made the place.

Very comfortable beds and great rooftop hot tub. Location was perfect. Very helpful host for the parking and the area tips. You can definitely hear the neighbours when there’s is some noise, but that was never a big issue. Would definitely go back.
Magnifique la place!
Amazing!
Great place!
Loved our stay here! Beautiful deck, large rooms, and sparkling clean!

This place is amazing. James and Brian were wonderful and very helpful. The upper deck with the jacuzzi is a great area to hangout and enjoy the evenings. James was very helpful in his suggestions , as we were vegetarians and he was spot on the places we should try for food. All in all a great stay.
This is an amazing spot for the price. The patio is great and the amenities are very nice. There are a few small things but nothing crazy.  I would definitely stay here again.
It was more beautiful then any pictures on the add. A must-to-see for any tourists in town ! :)
Very nice place ! The rooftop is perfect with the view.
We had a great stay. I wasn’t expecting a reception desk, greeting upon a arrival, and quick response to any requests. The place was stylish and clean.
Great hosts!

Nice clean place. We had the third floor suite which was two floors. One full bath on the first floor and two bedrooms share second full bath on second floor.  Hot tub on roof was great. Location was okay. If we were to stay again in montreal would
Probably choose a place closer to downtown/old montreal area. Also the place does not have an elevator which was a slight hassle for luggage. Overall great place, good value for a small group. Would definitely recommend.

Très joli appartement, très bien décoré au goût du jour. Nous avions beaucoup d’espace confortable au salon pour flâner et jaser entre amis.  Le spa en toiture est vraiment apprécié et la terrasse est un must. Petit point à présiser: prévoyez de vous apporter quelques articles de cuisine spécialisés si vous désirez cuisiner pendant votre séjour car la cuisine est petite et comprends seulement une base de vaisselle et quelques ustensiles.   Aussi le logement possède une porte communicante avec un autre appartement, et l’insonorisation est manquante. Mais pour un groupe qui n’aspire pas à la tranquillité absolue, c’est parfait et ça ne nous a jamais dérangé. Le quartier est très dynamiques, le métro est toutefois a 20 min. de marche et moins accessible. Les hôtes sont très gentils, attentionnés et nous y retournerions sans hésiter. Merci pour ce séjour.
Great space, in a great neighborhood. Berish and others were very responsive when we had a couple of issues. Highly recommended.

Amazing place - sparkling clean ! 
Great host - very prompt with responses and provided lot of local knowledge of places to visit during the stay.
Amazing place
Very Nice Place

This condo exceeded our expectations.  We were 6 girls staying for 2 nights.  It was very clean and very comfortable.  All 3 bedrooms had king size beds which made it very comfortable for all of us.  I will definitely come and stay here the next time we are in Montreal.  There was someone always at the front desk willing to help us.  In fact, 2 of you helped us with our bags.  Thank you very much.

The apartment was perfect...great location, beautifully appointed including a hot tub on the roof top deck which we used in November!  The beds are really comfortable and both bathrooms are shiny and new. Checkin was easy with a reception area to drop our bags on arrival and departure.  James was always available and super accommodating.  Best fruitiere in Montreal is right across the street and the St. Viateur bakery with warm Montreal bagels is half a block away. So many good restaurants in the mile-end, you won't need to travel far for an amazing meal.

Great place to stay! Very clean and modern. Great location for exploring the surrounding neighborhoods—many hot spots were within walking distance. Comfortable beds and nice linens. The rooftop hot tub was such a treat!
Clean, great spot! Lots to do in the area, many eclectic restaurants and a few cafes on the same street. The hot tub is an amazing amenity!  We will surely be returning guests.

I was in room 303. It is on the third floor and the building doesn’t have elevators. It wasn’t that big of a deal to me because I’m still young but just keep that in mind if you are staying with someone who has trouble with stairs. This place seemed to be recently refurbished and looked great however there were a lot of scuff marks on the white walls which again isn’t a huge deal for me, it’s just something they should fix. In general the whole place was great except for two things. The couch in the living room of my room had a lot of stains on it and I am not a fan of that. The other thing is with the hot tube. The host told me the hot tube guy comes 4 times a week, but there was no evidence that he showed up during our stay. The chlorine float had nothing in it and the hot tube didn’t smell good the whole time we were there. All in all this place is good apart from those two things that can be fixed easily.
Amazing appartament, really nice area, nice restaurants and groceries walking distance.

Berish and Brian were amazing host for our trip to Canada. Before arriving, any questions I had were answered and recommendations were provided. Communication was fast and location was perfect. The size of the unit was much bigger than I expected. It fit 6 people quite comfortable. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting Montréal. The building does not have an elevator as of now, so if stairs are an issue just make sure to let the host know.
Great place. Well worth it.

One of the best AirBnB’s we’ve stayed in. We loved this place. Our hosts truly went out of their way to communicate, accommodate & provide anything we needed from start to finish. Free local parking too! We highly recommend this place.
Exactly as gorgeous as advertised! Great view and great location! Definitely a must try!

name: casa dos gatos e cães gigantes
summary: aluguel de um quarto podendo ser pra casal, ou ate tres pessoas, possibilidade de colocar outro colchão.  Convivência com cães e gatos. Apenas pra pessoas que saibam dividir um espaço com cães e gatos. Dentro da casa as regras são deles... apenas pra quem ame de verdade e queira desfrutar do prazer de dividir o espaço com eles...  ligar no numero fixo (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ,  SEM (Hidden by Airbnb) .  ou contato via (Hidden by Airbnb) : (Website hidden by Airbnb)
space: Casa grande com quatro quartos , casa onde vivem 10 gatos gigantes e 2 cachorros. Se vc não gosta de animais, ou tem restrições com eles, vc está no lugar errado, aqui eles ditam as regras... são todos dóceis, porém o medo e sentimentos negativos oriundos de humanos não é agradável para eles... regra básica para o hóspede: amar os animais acima de tudo... respeitar o espaço deles... e usufruir do prazer de dividir o mesmo espaço com seres fantásticos desse mundo... animais de pequeno porte são bem vindos, porém o espaço deles acabara sendo restrito ao quarto onde tem telas padrão, onde animais muito pequenos podem passar...

neighborhood_overview: Grajaú é um bairro carioca residencial ...  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
notes: Não irei deixar chaves com os hospedes, assim há preferência por hospedes que saiam ate as 8:30 e retornem após as 18:00, porém avisando previamente estarei em casa quando for preciso pra receber os hóspedes...
transit: cerca de 20 minutos de linhas de metrô. perto do Shopping Boulevard e diversas linhas de ônibus.
access: Casa próximo de varias linhas de ônibus, cerca de 20 minutos caminhando ate o metrô Maracanã ( linha 2 )ou São Francisco Xavier ( linha 1). Comércio farto pela redondeza. Casa em vila residencial e familiar.  A menos de 10 minutos caminhando do Shopping Boulevar.
interaction: Preferencialmente pra hóspedes que fiquem mais tempo fora de casa devido minha disponibilidade de estar mais a noite em casa. Havendo exceção conforme conversas.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: LUXURY PRIVATE HOUSE NEAR BOSPHORUS
summary: THE PLACE IS LOCATED MOST POPULAR STREET IN ISTANBUL (BARBAROS). 1 MIN WALKING DISTANCE TO BOSPHORUS AND FERRY. ITS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF THE ISTANBUL 2 MIN TO ALL RESTAURANTS SHOPPING MALLS PUBS BARS FAMOUS HOTELS. THERE IS A PUB DOWNSTAIRS OF MY PLACE.
space: BEST LOCATION
description: THE PLACE IS LOCATED MOST POPULAR STREET IN ISTANBUL (BARBAROS). 1 MIN WALKING DISTANCE TO BOSPHORUS AND FERRY. ITS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF THE ISTANBUL 2 MIN TO ALL RESTAURANTS SHOPPING MALLS PUBS BARS FAMOUS HOTELS. THERE IS A PUB DOWNSTAIRS OF MY PLACE. BEST LOCATION Near Bosphorus
neighborhood_overview: Near Bosphorus

reviews.comments: The flat location is excellent within walking distance to everywhere. Baturalp is very polite and accommodating host and his flat is so nice. Moreover, he allowed me to drop off my luggage hours before offical checkin on the first morning. I really had no complaints and would definitely book again in the future.
Très belle maison avec une très belle emplacement
Highly recommended. Excellent location, close to everywhere, 1 min walking distance to Bosphorus. Baturalp is a wonderful accommodating host. Such a beautiful place to stay.

We stay in the apartment 15 minutes Only then we left and canceled the reservation also we booked tow rooms and pay extra money to the hotel it was very bad day. 

 when I talked to the host and explain what I saw he said I don't accept it this not truth I paid 120 TL for cleaning then I preferred to stop the conversation.

 This photo is not reflect the truth.
I booked the flat in same day 
To be honest communication was the only good thing in this reservation and host was flexible in check in 12:30 PM

In agreed check in time I followed the location that provided by Airbnb the description was totally different so I called him and he said I will  send the correct location to your (Hidden by Airbnb) . 

 
I followed the correct location and it is 8 minutes by car far from Airbnb location and 16 minutes by walking when we arrived we were not sure which door is?  and it took around 5 minutes to find it ( the host called me video call to show me the building door)

When I open building door there is a hole in the wall and you can see the pipes (it is not safe if have kids)

And there is No Lights in corridors I used my phone flashlight to see my way

The host told me that he paid 120 TL for cleaning.

But it is not. Flat wasn't clean and  odors odious smells in the flat. There is bad smells in bathroom 
Also there is no TV and I couldn't find AC remote control.( to be honest I did not ask the host where is it).
 
In regard to sleeping, the place is not healthy to sleep everything is old and the duple bed is about tow small  bed.

I felt like I am in a very old aprtment not a modern as shown in pictures

For me the value vs money is not worth.

Perfect location. This place is right in the middle of Besiktas, which is a very lively neighborhood with a lot of museums and great food nearby. You can walk to Dolmabahce museum in 1 minute, which was the most magestick one we saw, you can take a boat tour of the Bosphorus from the Besiktas dock in 1 minute, which was awesome (take the hop-on-hop-off boat tour), you can take the boat or bus north to Bebek, you can take the bus or tram downtown to see all the tourist attractions. Baturalp is super friendly and has great communication. We had a blast and I would definitely stay here again if I go back to Istanbul.

Great experience! As my first time in Istanbul I wasn't sure exactly what location to choose ''Besiktas is the answer''
If you're looking for a place that is unpretentious and reflects the essence of istanbul living, stay here. It literally is the perfect location and I don't think there is any other area we would have rather stayed in. Its in an incredible neighbourhood with amazing history, great cafes and restaurants, shops, etc, and is a short walking distance to all major points in the city.
Great location! Also baturalp and his friend help us for our all need immeadiately thank you guys you are great!
This flat is not suitable for families or guests seeking quiet place. It is a modest flat not luxurious. On the plus side it is close to many shops, restaurants and transportation.

The apartment would be ok, if cleaned... no sheets, towels all dirty and stinking from previous people... We asked the guy to bring us toilet paper, towels and sheets, but he brought only the former... no words.

Pros: Great value, fast response from the host, easy access to transportation, shopping centers, and restaurants.
Cons: Leaking pipe in the bathroom, no toilet paper, no proper bed sheets, noisy neighbor playing drums at night.

Öncelikle ev ilandaki konumda değil. Bulunduğu konum Abbasağa parkı yakınında ama  ilanda tam Beşiktaş çarşıda gözüküyor. Duşakabindeki delik yüzünden duş aldığınız zaman banyo göle dönüyor. İlandaki fotoğrafta gözüken TV evde yok. Duvarlar oldukça ince,  çok ses geçiriyor. Konumu için tercih edilebilir ancak birkaç günden fazla konaklamayı önermem.
Ev mukemmel bir konumda keyifli bir tatil oldu benim için iletişim yüksekti. 10/10
Herşey beklediğim gibiydi, Batu’ya hızlı cevapları ve nezaketi için teşekkürler.
10/10 The place was very clean. All the needed appliances were provided. Good communication fast in responding. Excellent location 1 min walking distance to Bosphorus.

Avios this flat at all costs. The bedroom has no curtains, the boiler is installed inside the bedroom and is constantly leaking water. The bed was filthy, old and not clean. The bathroom is not functional with water leaks everywhere. The kitchen has no cooking tools, all content is plastic. No TV and the sofa is extremely uncomfortable. Stay away from this flat. Airbnb should not allow this user to advertise such a place, it is inhabitable.

Batu is amazing host, he was always ready to help us. His place is located in really nice city area, shops, bars, restaurants, parks, grocery stores, sea, everything is so close so the price for staying is right for sure. Apartments itself are on the first floor,  apartments were clean, light and cozy. We had everything what we needed. Thank you so much for amazing staying! 
Next time when we are in Istanbul we would love to live in same apartments:)
5⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Awesome 10/10 !  The location is perfect walking distance to bosphorus and ferry. Quick responds from the host. Thank you.
Ull not lose if you ll decide to stay at this place.

FINGER WEG!! 

Die Wohnung ist sehr dreckig und heruntergekommen. Keinerlei sieht es aus wie auf den Bildern. Der Gastgeber hält nicht für nötig sich bei euch zu melden oder den Schlüssel persönlich abzugeben. 
Erspart euch den Stress mit dieser Unterkunft.
Batu was very responsive. Easy to check in and check out. Great location.
Alles war sehr nett. Bestes Haus sauber, friedlich. Die Lage ist sehr schön. Wir kommen wieder.
Very cozy place. Easy location. And larger than I expected.
I’m staying here for the second time, everything was perfect, batu responded my messages instantly, we will visit again with my friends:)

The location of the house is very good, and the flat is quite comfortable in general. We did not have any problems with the overall cleanliness. 
However the house did not have some of the simple basic things like garbage bags or a hand towel for kitchen or the bathroom -(big towels were provided as promised). The water for the shower did not heat properly unless we increased the temperature from the CV-kettle (the big heater), which we had to figure out ourselves. These things did not matter too much in the end but we felt like the host could have been more thoughtful about them.

The communication could have been definitely better before we checked-in. Until the last moment we (like 1 day before or so) we did not get further information on the flat. I messaged the host a few times asking questions about check-in times etc. and it was quite hard to get an answer. We did not have a problem after we checked-in.

host.host_about:
Hi, My name is Kadir, I born in 1989 in İstanbul. I have been through many areas of tourism business and currently engaged in both being a travel consultant and a host here at Airbnb. At our various rooms in Asia and Europe area, I'd be delighted to guest you at one of our accommodations. With years of guest satisfaction and understanding of hospitality, I am sure you will be enjoying your stay with us.

Our rental apartments are arranged to offer our guests the comfort of home and not look for their own home. We strive to make the best of what you have for the satisfied and we work constantly to do better in the developing and changing process

Our goal is practiced in many countries of the world system rental apartments, unprofessional apply to become a leading international company in Turkey and is initially providing a service in the country and many cities, including Istanbul.

name: Architectural Design Townhouse with Spa-worthy Tub
summary: Get inspired by the aesthetic architectural lines of this redesigned centennial house in trendy Little Burgundy, home of the famous Joe Beef restaurant. Enjoy your morning latte in the warm rays of the unique two-story yard window. Explore the city via the subway station across the street or simply walk 15 minutes to Downtown, Ste-Catherine Street, Bell Centre (hockey, concerts), cafés and boutiques. Then pamper yourself in the black rain shower and spa-like double-tub.
space: -Free private parking, Large deck, Garden, Barbecue, Air conditioning - Authentic centennial fully redesigned 2 story condo.  - Ground floor in front and back because built on a slope.  - 2 km or 1 subway stop from Montreal train station -Private yard, trees and garden. Your own quiet heaven. - Huge 20’ high window into backyard with architectural staircase. - Small balcony on second floor - 1 large bedroom with king sized bed - Lounge area transforms into guest bedroom with curtain walls and Murphy double bed (see pics) - 30 feet (1 min walk) from George-Vanier subway  (quick route to anywhere in town) - 2 private parking spots - Unlimited wifi internet - 60” HD cable TV with free Netflix -Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, stove and oven, microwave, Italian coffee pot, toaster, kettle, plates and cutlery (high end espresso machine if you know how to operate it) - Washer and dryer, detergent, iron and board - Bathroom essentials: Shower gel, shampoo, toilet paper, hair dryer - Th
