So easy. There are a lot of markets and restaurants near my place. Also two bigger mall, Trump Towers and Cevahir Mall. In guest room you have bad and a wardrobe. I have an American kitchen .and i love cooking traditional Turkish food which we can share when I cook. You can cook also, feel free while you are staying here. My flat is very clean and i dont prefer to smoke in the house but i hove a balkony for smoke. It's ten minute to metro and metrobus stations called of MECİDİYEKÖY. its 2 stations to Taksim with metro. if you prefer bus, its only 200metres to walk bus
neighborhood_overview: I love Şişli because it is very (website hidden) is near to turistic area. Just 2 metro station. It is one of the decent regions of ancient Istanbul. The neighborhood is authentic and nice, where you will feel in Istanbul! There are many restaurants, markets, shops, shopping centers around.
transit: It's ten minute to metro and metrobus stations called of MECİDİYEKÖY. its 2 stations to Taksim with metro. if you prefer bus, its only 200metres to walk bus station.

host.host_about: İm math teacher.. İ have a beatiful flat!

Apartment was as described, clean and quiet, located in a safe family-like neighborhood and ideal for visiting İstanbul. Eda is really nice and make you feel like at home.

If you go to Istanbul there is no other places where you want to stay.

I should say with the full resposibilty that it was the best hosts i had ever hosyed.
Eda was so friendly and helpful that that i have no words. She is very intelligent and interesting personalities,  i am very thankful for her. The room was very was so lovely every thing is enought fo me, it was very clean and nice. Eda flat is the place of good energy and love. Location is also great near to all public transportation. I am really lucky, see you Eda welcome to Egypt, many thanks to you and all spesialy Ozge.

name: 1 BR w/ Terrace @ Box House Hotel
space: 1 Bedroom @ The Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. This gorgeous 1 bedroom loft offers a queen size bed and a pullout sofa and can accommodate up to four guests. There is a full kitchen equipped with dish ware and a dining table. Features an iPod dock station and 42" LCD HD televisions with premium cable channels for your entertainment! There is a huge 200 sq ft private deck with partial city views, so you can unwind and take a break from your exhilarating stay.

Also, just a short walk to the Greenpoint Avenue G train and the East River Ferry. Greenpoint is an artsy Brooklyn neighborhood filled with great restaurants, cafes, and shops. Come see what all the buzz is about.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: A cute boutique hotel.  As described.
I really enjoy the 3 nights in boxhouse,I will be certainly back.
This is a very good hotel! Excellent service, friendly staff, and reasonable price.

Una piacevole sorpresa: un'ottimo albergo, curato e pulito e con camere spaziose e ampie.  L'albergo è piccolino ma con tutti i servizi inclusi una piccola palestra e soprattutto una sala lavanderia, utilissimo. Le stanze sono dei piccoli appartamenti con cucina a vista: la soluzione ideale per chi viaggia in famiglia e sceglie di pernottare per più giorni. L'accoglienza è stata ottima e tutto il personale è sempre stato disponibile e gentili. La zona può intimidire al primo colpo ma invece facendo un giro si scopre un quartiere bellissimo, fatto di tanti piccoli bar e caffè. Inoltre l'albergo è a davvero 3 fermate da Times Square, basta attraversare il ponte (e godere della vista). Consigliatissimo, ci tornerò prima o poi.
Such a wonderful experience. It was the second time staying at Box House and I had a great time. Comfortable, beautiful, spacious and accommodating.
Loved staying at the Box Hotel!

reviews.comments: Seb's place is conveniently located just a few minutes from downtown Montréal -- if proximity is of importance to you, this could be your place. The floors creak at every step, the towels were stained, and the bathroom was dirty. I have to mention that we did check in late in the evening, so it could have been that they didn't have enough time to prepare to host guests, I'm not sure. As for Seb himself, he was very kind and made sure we were properly accommodated.

Seb's place is very comfortable and clean. The bedroom is big and bright and the breakfast delicious! If you don't mind being a bit further away from downtown, I really recommend it!! There is also a supermarket close by and a Mall and lots of stores and restaurants within walking distances.
Nice room in a nice neighborhood.
Appartement bien situé plusieurs services à proximité, tout dépend du voyage que vous voulez faire le plateau Mont-Royal est assez près. Hôte très convivial, de bons conseils.

Great stay at Seb's! Pleasant room (AC was a big plus during the heat wave), good location and the hosts were very nice and accomodating. Only minor issue was the parking, as someone had parked in our spot (which we were able to reclaim after a few hours), we had to park somewhere else and the city very strict on parking. Overall we had a great time there
Easy check in, comfy bed!
Excellent place to stay in a quiet neighborhood. 15 min from the metro and about 15 more to get to downtown. Seb was very nice and gave us good advice on what to see and do during our stay :)
Very nice. Very friendly host.
Very comfortable bed, room was clean and spacious, nobody was ever home it seemed so it was like we had the house to ourselves
Solid, simple, cheap accommodation with parking.
Seb was a great host. Very responsive. The apartment is in a great location for a fantastic value.
Host was very prompt and helpful. Nice place. Had a wonderful stay.
Seb’s place was very easy to find and was very clean. It was much affordable compared to hotels and the restroom was clean as well! We didn’t face any difficulties during our stay.
Clean, bright, a 10'x8' air conditioned room, reasonable walking distance to Metro, and bus 161 is just 50 meters away.  Good value for the money.
Chambre très confortable et bien placé proche de toute commodité. Seb a été très accueillant, je recommande
Great value!

My husband and I drove a car from our home, so we needed a parking space. Seb's place included enough parking space for a car. We stayed two nights and thanks to his quick and accurate responses, we didn't have any problem. This place was a few minutes from grocery store and you can go to Notre dame easily by bus.
Truly cozy with an easy and safe feel. Not a ton of frills but in a neighbourhood with subway access as well as bars and markets. An enjoyable stay!
Check-in and Check-out very convenient, great location close to public transit and local stores.

Great value - location accessible by bus and relatively close to Metro. 
Seb and Leo are super approachable and friendly.

The apartment was kind of mess. Not clean. Too much stuff in the house.The floor was too much noisy(squakey). 1 of the pillow was like rock solid. The bed was also not comfortable. The mattress was curved, sloppy on the sides and deep in between. The kitchen was stuffed with all the food in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) issues with the parking. thank you for hosting :)
Rapport Qualité/Prix, il n'y a pas mieux.
great and easy to communicate with. even accommodated my change in travel quickly
J'ai été très bien accueilli chez Seb !

Très bien situé à 5 minutes à pieds des caves et du joli Pont Luis: ideal pour visiter le centre de Porto! José est disponible par téléphone et réponds rapidement aux messages. Merci à lui. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour !

Terry,  a great host willing to help in everything. His home is In a quiet area, could do a short hike through the agricultural field up to the hill.. There's a Dao temple closed by, a spot that the locals visit often during weekend. U can try Chinese vegetarian dished from their canteen style restaurant.  Definitely recommend Terry's place. Thank you!

It was very nice staying there, I felt very welcome, not like staying at Airbnb but like staying at a friend's house :) , we actually did a lot of chitchat and Netflix . A very welcoming and nice family.
one nice couple
Terry is very nice & helps me a lot.It actually makes me feel like living at home.I’d like to live here next (Website hidden by Airbnb) really a good experience for me.
Terry is so nice!I went to the house very late! They still waiting for me!They help me a lot!They pick me up and take me to the bus station the next day!
房东夫妻特别热情友好｡去的前一天联系房东,告诉我们最方便的地铁站｡到了地铁站之后亲自过来接我们,给我们介绍了交通路线｡房子周围比较安静,去到地铁站也很方便,一般几分钟就有一辆小巴｡房东人超级nice ,需要什么都会帮忙,很好的一次住房体验｡

本是想给好评的,房东夫妻人也不错,为什么给了中评呢?走的时候房东让我带东西给她大陆的朋友,我答应了,后来想起不妥,万一有违禁品呢?于是在出关之前在地铁站等房东准备还给她,我还是提前联系的,然而知道我不帮忙之后回消息很慢,也来得很晚｡我觉得一定要交到她手上再说句不好意思,所以一直在等她过来,我还提前联系,也道歉,也跟她说我的火车在几点,让她们尽量快一点,然后拖拖拉拉起码四十分钟,变脸也是快,后果就是东西给她了,我没赶上回程的车呵呵呵｡大家注意了,出门在外留个心眼,我也算长见识了,再也不见｡｡｡
房东夫妻很热情,事先沟通好后亲自到车站去接到人,真的非常感谢｡而且这几天中,跟房东联系,回应都很快,感觉沟通起来很舒服｡

I enjoyed my stay at Terry's place. I honestly was considering just cancelling my trip to HK because I couldn't find a place to stay due to booking at the last minute. I decided to come because Terry answered all of my questions quickly and was so helpful. Although Terry's place is a bit of a way from the city center, everything was so easily accessible buy bus or train which has pickup points very close to their home. Considering this was Hong Kong, their home is spacious, and the room was bigger than something you would find in the inner city. He and his wife were so kind and none intrusive and I felt right at home. If you are needing a place to stay in HK, definitely consider staying at their home. Thank you for wonderful hospitality.
房东人很好

It is a family flat and I had comfortable stay there. The hosts are very friendly and helpful and their kids are lovely and quiet. The place is a bit remote, but it is quite easy to get to centre of Hong Kong in a bit more than an hour. I was met by the host and his kids in Fanling station for easier checkin, so had no problem to find the place. I had couple of hikes not far from the place and visited Taoist temple which is next to bus stop.

Staying at this place feels like visiting your relatives in the rural hometown. It takes a while to reach the MTR, with the house being in a literal village and all, but the view is great, air is clean and refreshing, perfect for those wanting to experience the other side of HK and escape from the busy city life. Terry & family are very friendly, helpful, and hospitable, too. A hidden gem in the heartland of Fanling.

The place is very perfect for relaxing and resting after a very crowded and busy life in Hong Kong  city center. Terry, his wife and the kids are very nice. Staying in their place seemed like visiting a long time friend or relative. Amenities are all complete. Cleanliness is good. Location is the best if you love the country house ambiance. Many interesting things to do and places to visit. Definitely recommended. Would always love to come back here.
入住房间周围空气比较好哦!入住体验很好,独立空间比较安静,性价比还是蛮高的,房东热情!会尽可能的满足房客的要求哦!女主人做的早餐很不错的呦!

name: Entire Studio Apartment 5 min walk to Sydney Uni!
summary: A very simple studio apartment, with a good sized bedroom/living room, separate bathroom and a separate kitchen. It's less than 5 minute's walk to Sydney University, and a short stroll to Glebe markets, frequent city buses, Jubilee Park and Blackwattle Bay, village shops, cafes and popular restaurants. Would be perfect for travelling academics, conferences, and anyone wanting to live within moments of the CBD. The house is neat, tidy, quiet and a great option for those wanting their own space.
description: A very simple studio apartment, with a good sized bedroom/living room, separate bathroom and a separate kitchen. It's less than 5 minute's walk to Sydney University, and a short stroll to Glebe markets, frequent city buses, Jubilee Park and Blackwattle Bay, village shops, cafes and popular restaurants. Would be perfect for travelling academics, conferences, and anyone wanting to live within moments of the CBD. The house is neat, tidy, quiet and a great option for those wanting their own space. Myself or my sister will be available to hand over the keys and show you around. You will also be able to call one of us if you require assistance at any stage :) If you need to check in a bit earlier or later, don't hesitate to ask as it's very likely that I can accommodate this! This apartment is just a 5 minute stroll to the beautiful Sydney University campus and the renowned Glebe Markets. It's also just a few minutes from vibrant Newtown with it's numerous restaurants, boutiques and cafes al
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is just a 5 minute stroll to the beautiful Sydney University campus and the renowned Glebe Markets. It's also just a few minutes from vibrant Newtown with it's numerous restaurants, boutiques and cafes along popular King Street. It's also just a few minutes to Royal Prince Alfred Hospital. You can walk to Sydney's Central Station in 25-30 minutes, but there are plenty of city buses stopping within a few footsteps of the house.
notes: There is currently no wifi at the apartment. However, you can find a number of cafes offering wifi along Glebe Point Road.
transit: Buses on Parramatta Road come very frequently, and go direct to Central Station.
interaction: Myself or my sister will be available to hand over the keys and show you around. You will also be able to call one of us if you require assistance at any stage :) If you need to check in a bit earlier or later, don't hesitate to ask as it's very likely that I can accommodate this!

host.host_about:
Hello,
I am a graduate student at the University of Sydney, and travel overseas quite frequently. I make my studio apartment available for accommodation when I am away.

reviews.comments: Thea was a lovely host and an excellent—and speedy—communicator.

Thea was an amazing host, quick communicater and we felt welcome from the second my partner and I met her. Her place is super cosy and is incredible, as well as super close to lots of shops, restaurants and public transport. Would 110% recommend staying here; she is incredibly hospitable and nice.
Super easy, replied quickly & great location.

Thea’s place was lovely, a couple of details like she could maybe add more utensils (pans, cups, glasses) in the kitchen and the hot water in the shower wears out too soon. She doesn’t have WiFi so check the ad before booking! She’s very sweet and  responsive. I really enjoyed the private and quietness of this place in my first days in Sydney! Thanks for everything ;)
Thea's place is perfect for one - clean, safe and conveniently located. Thea and her sister made communication really easy. Thanks again!

Thea的房子距离悉尼大学很近,而且房子安静且干净,还舒服,以至于我们每天早晨都不想起床｡虽然没有wifi但是我们并不觉得这个问题很难熬,毕竟房间里信号不错｡
Thea真是人美心善,我的行李箱轮子遇到了点问题,没法把它带去凯恩斯,征得Thea同意她愿意让我把行李箱寄存在她的公寓,这可帮了我大忙,让我在凯恩斯能轻装游玩,非常感谢｡我会记得这次澳洲旅行遇到的各位善良友好的澳洲人民｡
Thea's house is very close to the university of Sydney, and the house is quiet and clean and comfortable, so that we don't want to get up every morning. There's no wifi, but we don't find it particularly difficult. After all, it's a good signal in the room. 
  Thea was so kind that I had a problem with the wheel of my suitcase and couldn't bring it to cairns. With Thea's permission she was willing to let me deposit the suitcase in her (Website hidden by Airbnb) helped me a lot. It allowed me to travel light in cairns. Thank you very much.
 I will remember the kind and friendly Australian people I met on this trip.

Thea’s place was perfectly located. A great space which was well maintained and exceptionally clean. Thea was an excellent communicator and was in touch very promptly to reply to all of my questions. Staying there during summer, the studio was very cool during the day. It is well located close to public transport and major shopping centres. There are many great cafes in the area, and a very welcoming and diverse neighborhood. Definitely good value for money.

host.host_about: A Montrealer, a biologist and currently finishing my masters at McGill in PR & Philanthropical studies. I am very passionate about travelling, meeting new people and helping others. I have almost travelled the world, and in each voyage I did, I tried to make a difference and help in any way i can. I started my own foundation/movement called "The Globe Jumpers" it's a social and non profit movement that tries to make an impact in small communities, by turning dreamers into jumpers, one adventure at a time. You can (Hidden by Airbnb) it if you have a minute, or else when we meet up, I can tell you all about it. I speak French, English, Arabic and Español, and I love meeting new people. I hope to meet you or host you very soon :) Keep Jumping!!

reviews.comments:
Nader's home is lovely, everything you would want in a city apartment with a large bath, outside area and comfy bed! 

Nader was in constant communication with us and introduced us to his friends. He gave us tips on places we could check out in Montreal all of which were well worth it!

Defo recommend this lovely air BnB!

Nader and his partner werr extremely helpful with check in/out times and for local tips. The apartment is perfect for a city break. We cycled in to town every day so found the location great. It's near the old Olympic park which was great to walk around. I really can't thank them enough for our stay.

Such a cozy little space to make Montreal feel like a second home! Wonderful layout and decorations, I felt like we had entered a bohemian oasis in the heart of the city. Quiet street with rather simple street parking (outside of two weekly restrictions), we had no problem finding a spot to park on the block. First floor location made it easy to unpack and apartment came with heating and AC unit. The bathroom was just the right size with a shower and bathtub. Super comfortable living room and kitchen access made our staycation away from home so delightful. Wonderful backyard space with table and grill to enjoy the warm nights. Access to wifi, Netflix and laundry were great perks. Would recommend and stay again!
Nader has a lovely home, very neat and welcoming. He was very accommodating and kind, will definitely want be staying there again! Thanks again Nader!

Nader has an eclectic condo in the Rosemont area of MTL! This host was very hospitable and went the extra mile to make sure that I not only had a great Airbnb ecperience; but also offered helpful resources to explore and enjoy the city :)

name: Quarto partilhado do Porto! (1)
summary: Temos um quarto partilhado em nosso apartamento que pode abrigar uma pessoa (ou duas). É o apartamento onde moro com minha esposa e filho. Estamos em uma rua com fácil acesso e com todos os tipos de transporte. Desfrute sem preocupações o melhor que o Porto tem a oferecer!
space: Um quarto com muita luz natural. O espaço está organizado para receber confortavelmente duas pessoas. Há uma separação da área comum do apartamento, garantindo toda a calma para os momentos de descanso.
description: Temos um quarto partilhado em nosso apartamento que pode abrigar uma pessoa (ou duas). É o apartamento onde moro com minha esposa e filho. Estamos em uma rua com fácil acesso e com todos os tipos de transporte. Desfrute sem preocupações o melhor que o Porto tem a oferecer! Um quarto com muita luz natural. O espaço está organizado para receber confortavelmente duas pessoas. Há uma separação da área comum do apartamento, garantindo toda a calma para os momentos de descanso. As áreas comuns do apartamento são partilhadas. Uma sala de estar, uma área externa com 70m2, duas casas de banho e uma cozinha com uso restrito. Eu e minha família moramos no apartamento, mas não interferimos na rotina das pessoas que cá vêm. Convivemos com as pessoas na medida em que estas querem, sem aprofundar em questões pessoais. Nossa zona faz a ligação entre todas as partes do Porto. Existe todo o tipo de comércio e serviços. É possível fazer uma caminhada pela manhã em ruas arborizadas e tranquilas, tomar caf
neighborhood_overview: Nossa zona faz a ligação entre todas as partes do Porto. Existe todo o tipo de comércio e serviços. É possível fazer uma caminhada pela manhã em ruas arborizadas e tranquilas, tomar café nas esplanadas ou deitar ao sol sobre um relvado. Outra opção é ir às compras, num shopping ou no comércio tradicional.
notes: Nosso apartamento fica no primeiro andar, mas não possui elevador. Acesso dificultado para quem tem mobilidade reduzida.
transit: Estamos ao lado da estação de Metro dos Combatentes. Várias linhas de autocarros cruzam a região. O Prédio não possui estacionamento e, como em todo o Porto, é difícil estacionar na rua durante a semana. Existem garagens próximas.
access: As áreas comuns do apartamento são partilhadas. Uma sala de estar, uma área externa com 70m2, duas casas de banho e uma cozinha com uso restrito.
interaction: Eu e minha família moramos no apartamento, mas não interferimos na rotina das pessoas que cá vêm. Convivemos com as pessoas na medida em que estas querem, sem aprofundar em questões pessoais.
house_rules: - - Silêncio após às 23h - - Fumar apenas na área externa - - Não são permitidos animais

host.host_about: Uma boa conversa com trocas de ideias é uma das melhores formas de convívio entre as pessoas. Considero muito enriquecedor o contato com as pessoas que vivem nos locais que visito, pois mostram um panorama diferente daquele apresentado ao simples turista. Ter pessoas de diferentes locais em minha casa é uma forma de conhecer um pedaç do mundo.

reviews.comments: This is a great place! Amazing and friendly family, they will make you feel at home and help you with what ever you need. There is room to be privte or to be social, according to your likings! Thanks a lot!

bests hosts ever. they are a family, very thoughtful and fun guys. i felt as in my home with them (lovely apartment), had dinner together once, and they let me leave my lugage in their place after checkout. i stayed in a shared room with other guest and everything was fine. 
fully recommend to stay with Anthony and Carol! thanks for everything guys.

Arthur y su familia son anfitriones excelentes. Son muy hospitalarios, y tuve todas las comodidades en su hogar. Disfruté mucho de poder compartir tiempo con ellos. La casa está ubicada muy cerca de la estación de metro Combatentes, de donde se puede acceder a todas las líneas.
A hospitalidade foi muito boa. Fui bem recebido, bem tratado e recebi boas orientações sobre a cidade. Recomendado.
Excelente hospedagem. Pessoas muito atenciosas, carinhosas, agradáveis!!
Adorei a hospitalidade, todos na casa foram muito receptivos, sempre me ajudando quando necessário. Recomendo muito.

name: 24 Eight Guesthouse - Apartment 12
summary: Situado no Campo 24 de Agosto, a 50m da estação do metro; direto do aeroporto para o apartamento, entre outras linhas de fácil acesso à vários pontos de paragem obrigatória do Porto assim como a Casa da Música, Jardim de Serralves, Torre dos Clérigos, estação de São Bento, Avenida dos Aliados, Rua de Santa Catarina, Livraria Lello... Autocarros e praça de táxis a 100m. 800m a pé do centro histórico do Porto. Farmácias,hospitais,shopping, restaurantes e todos os tipos de longas típicas do Porto.

reviews.comments: That is a lovely apartment to stay a couple of days in Porto. 15 minutes by walk from the apartment to the center of the city. Maria is very arranging. The apartment was very clean, spacious and quiet. I recommend this place.
Casa muito simples mas muito gira, decorada com bom gosto e muito bem equipada. Localização top, perto de tudo sem ser "demasiado" central. A anfitriã sempre disponível! Adorámos!

Nos ha gustado mucho el piso! Muy bonito, acogedor y bien situado. A 15 min andando del centro y 1 min de la parada de metro. Maria ha sido muy atenta y nos ha contestado a nuestras dudas al momento! Si vuelvo a Oporto, repito seguro! Muchas gracias por todo, Maria!

Our trip in Porto was amazing thanks to Maria and her beautiful apartment. It was very cosy, spacious and clean. Near the city center, so very convenient. Maria has been nice and responded quickly to our questions. We highly recommend it !

Das Apartment 12 im 24EightGuesthouse ist super: schön und modern eingerichtet, sehr geräumig, mit allem, was man braucht. Die Lage ist super zentral, man ist zu Fuß ganz schnell im Zentrum und auch zum Busbahnhof kann man schnell zu Fuß gehen. Das einzige kleine Manko ist die relativ viel befahrene Straße, die man halt hört. Dennoch konnten wir gut schlafen. Die Fenster kann man mit Fensterläden schließen. Maria hat uns immer sofort geantwortet und als wir ein Problem mit dem Öffnen der Tür hatten, hat sie uns sofort telefonisch geholfen. 
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und empfehlen das 24EightGuesthouse jedem weiter!!

Maria war sehr sympathisch. Sie hat uns persönlich und sehr nett empfangen. Die Kommunikation war einwandfrei. 
Die Wohnung war sehr sauber, schön eingerichtet und es gab alles notwendige.
Die Lage war gut: ca.15-20 Minuten ins Zentrum alles gut zu Fuß erreichbar, es war sehr ruhig trotz der Lage an der Straße. Es gab genügendRestaurants und auch ein Lidl ganz in der Nähe.
Das Appartement ist für jeden sehr zu empfehlen: problemlos, unkompliziert und Preisleistung top! Sehr gerne wieder! 

Danke Maria für den schönen Aufenthalt :)

Maria's apartment was newly renovated and is really comfortable, identical to the pictures. It is located minutes away from the historical center so that was really convenient. Maria answered all our questions and reacted really fast to make our stay the most comfortable possible. We really recommend her apartment!
Very nice appartment for a good week.
Very modern flat. Close to the centre (but not too close!)  as well as a metro and bus stop. Quiet for sleeping at might. Would definitely recommend!

The apartment is well located close to the center. Decoration is great. It's very clean. It's a shame that there is no wi fi and it would be better to have more coffee than just for one day. Anyway I would recommend this place for a wonderful stay in Porto !
Lovely and cosy appartment, very clean, in a quiet neighbourhood, near the center. The wifi wasn't working very well, but everything was ok. We recommend, and we will probably  come back.
Ottima location, pulita e comoda per raggiungere il centro di Porto. La consiglio vivamente a chi fosse interessato a soggiornare a Porto.

We really liked the apartment. it was clean and tidy & as described in the description. 
The apartment is very central, like 10 mins away, away from the hustle and the bustle so you can have a good night sleep, but close enough to enjoy the city. 
I particularly liked the location as that meant we didnt have to use the uber and its easy to get to one place to another

However, the downside we experienced was incorrect code to enter apartment and the host was difficult to get in touch with. This meant we waited outside in the cold for >30minutes.

name: SUNNY DELIGHT ❤ double bedroom + balcony
summary: This is a bedroom in the heart of Barcelona, with its own private terrace. Very central, nearby shops, restaurants, coffee bars, and the city's famous sights. The metro station is literally few meters away from the building, with access to lines L1, L4. The room is private and exclusively for yourself, there are two shared bathrooms and common areas shared.
description: This is a bedroom in the heart of Barcelona, with its own private terrace. Very central, nearby shops, restaurants, coffee bars, and the city's famous sights. The metro station is literally few meters away from the building, with access to lines L1, L4. The room is private and exclusively for yourself, there are two shared bathrooms and common areas shared. Checkin time if flexible, but preferred checkin time is:  between 13:20 and 16:00; and then after 19:15. Check for availability for checkins after 20:00. Late checkin fee after 23:00 -> 30€
notes: Checkin time if flexible, but preferred checkin time is:  between 13:20 and 16:00; and then after 19:15. Check for availability for checkins after 20:00. Late checkin fee after 23:00 -> 30€
house_rules: Please don't smoke inside, use the terrace. For safety reasons don't open the door to anyone, much less let unauthorized people in the apartment.  Respect the roommates, avoid making noise in the common areas, especially at night (intensive cooking, loud phone calls). Respect the neighbours and avoid making noise in the staircase. Wash the kitchenware you use. Check-in / check-out times may be flexible (ask). Check-ins after 23:00 imply a 30€ cash fee to pay upon arrival. Keep the flat tidy and take out the trash when you leave. We will require you  a valid ID. The city hall of Barcelona charges a turistic tax of 2,5€ per person per night, and hosts are required to collect this tax. This tax is not included in the reservation cost and will be charged separately.

host.host_about:
Early 40's, laid back guy. I am from South America and now live in Barcelona for the last seven years. My job includes customer service and support for a large life entertainment company. I love what I do, although it is extremely challenging. 

I have traveled a fair amount around the world and like making new friends and discovering other cultures. I have discovered Barcelona to be a very cosmopolitan city, warm and welcoming to the millions of tourists that visit it from all over the world. That is why I really recommend you try it out; you will have an amazing time!

cheers,
Roberto.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

Includes one Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom , two separate rooms extra  guest bathroom in living room .  Washer , dryer included .  Large living room , dining area and kitchen .  Close to all night life , amenities , restaurants , and all the action the city has to offer .

reviews.comments:
the host, vinay, is great. spacious apartment with all needed amenities. I had a group of 7 friends by the apartment and the apartment accommodated and was comfortable for all of us. location great and a quick Uber ride to wherever you need to go. it already mentions this in the listing but there is no AC. keep that in mind for the warmer days as they do heat up the apartment. 
other than that, had a good time in the apartment

We booked this place after a last minute cancel by two other hosts and it wasn't actually available.  Have no idea what this is actually like.   The host needs to do a better a job of keeping his schedule accurate.

My friends and I had a great stay at Vinay’s place. It’s very spacious and has great natural light. The apartment is two blocks from the museum of fine arts and within walking distance of the old city. I would definitely recommend staying here

name: Exquisite apt. Open space and plently of light
summary: Unbeatable location. My apartment is in the heart of the Eixample, only four streets away from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia, surrounded by the most important architectural gems by Modernism masters like Gaudí and Puig i Cadafalch, and only two steps away from the Born and the Gothic Quarter, that is, the historic center of Barcelona.
space: Welcome to my home! A fantastic apartment completely renovated in the heart of Barcelona, in the so-called "Egg Yolk" of Barcelona, between Modernism and the historic old quarter of Barcelona.
description: Unbeatable location. My apartment is in the heart of the Eixample, only four streets away from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia, surrounded by the most important architectural gems by Modernism masters like Gaudí and Puig i Cadafalch, and only two steps away from the Born and the Gothic Quarter, that is, the historic center of Barcelona. Welcome to my home! A fantastic apartment completely renovated in the heart of Barcelona, in the so-called "Egg Yolk" of Barcelona, between Modernism and the historic old quarter of Barcelona. I am always available to advise my guests about everything concerning the city. Tourism, gastronomy, leisure, escapes near Barcelona, etc. Anything you may need during your stay in my city. It is definitely the best neighborhood in Barcelona, because it is located on the border between L'Eixample, which means Modernism, and El Barrio Gothico y Borne, that is, old Barcelona. A quiet neighborhood with all the services As you really find yourself in the center of
neighborhood_overview: It is definitely the best neighborhood in Barcelona, because it is located on the border between L'Eixample, which means Modernism, and El Barrio Gothico y Borne, that is, old Barcelona. A quiet neighborhood with all the services
notes: We have just rehabilitated the apartment so you get to enjoy its debut! The rehabilitation was a complete overhaul. A semi-loft by design, we mixed different styles that I hope you find attractive and make you feel at home. With a notable touch of Catalan design, yet retro and vintage at the same time, you will find icons of international design such as the SMEG fridge or the lamps by renowned firms that you will love. A very practical loft, open and with movable doors to reconfigure the spaces to your convenience and liking. The kitchen opens to the living room with custom furniture. The highlight of the kitchen, in my opinion, is the thick marble (5cm) that cascades to the floor, offering a feeling of robustness and personality. In the bathroom, since we were unable to recover the original ceramics, we have integrated modernist-style tiles and retro-style toilets. The most attractive and important aspect of the apartment is its amazing light. The sun comfortably fills every corner of
transit: As you really find yourself in the center of Barcelona you have all the public transport next door: Metro Urquinaona (red line): 200mts Metro Girona (Yellow Line): 200mts Metro Paseo de Gracia (purple line): 400mts Metro Paseo de Gracia (Green line): 700mts Train Station 700mts Many buses on Calle Gran Via, 50 meters from the house Parking public Saba at 300mts
interaction: I am always available to advise my guests about everything concerning the city. Tourism, gastronomy, leisure, escapes near Barcelona, etc. Anything you may need during your stay in my city.
house_rules: This will be your home, plase treat it as you would treat your home  Also please respect the neighbours and keep noise down to a minimum, there are full of Bars on the street to make fun! Visitors are not allowed at home. if you are planing to invite some other person at home, you must ask me in advance. Enjoy a lot your stay!   IMPORTANT (it has never happened but you must know): I am very strict with security and safety, that is the reason why I have a very secure looks at home, but for your security and for future guests security, if you lose the keys of home, I will immediately call a company to change the lock, what I have a cost of 500 euros.   Also, never forget  the keys in the lock and leave the house. If you left the keys in the lock on the inside you will not be able to enter the house again.  Forgetting the keys in the lock will carry a penalty of 150 euros, because a specialized company has to come and unblock it.

host.host_about:
Hi I'm Laia,

I'm from Barcelona; as were my  parents, grandparents and great-grandparents, as far back as I remember! I am a lover of my city, but of the original city of Barcelona, the whole gothic and Eixample area is spectacular!

I worked previously in communication and creativity, but for some time now I decided to use all my creativity in creating furniture and decoration. Restore anything that people do not want as they think it is useless or old or broken, I look for new uses for them so that they don’t die and remain among us.

I am delighted and 100% available to give directions and suggestions about my city! Here I´ll give you the first, advice... watch your bag! Catalans are very good people, but we also have one or two thieves…well, many actually !
 
I hope you ll feel at home in my apartment and enjoy very much the city!

See you soon!!
Laia

description: Master Bedroom with Ensuite Bathroom, spacious and luminous master bedroom with your own full bathroom.  Huge closet and mirrors.  A well heated room to make you feel warm and cozy.  The house is equipped with everything you need to make your stay easy and enjoyable.  International students welcome. Bus stop is 2 minutes walk away and 10 minutes ride from station honore beaugrand. Free street parking. Depanneur couple of blocks away and shopping centre 10 minutes walk away or 3 stops on the bus.

host.host_about:
I am a world traveler.  I love hosting, I used to live in Vancouver and now I am in Montreal.
My place is very accommodating and close to public transit.
Welcome to Montreal, enjoy our fine cuisine, rich culture and hospitality.

reviews.comments: I spent two nights at Julia's house during my stay in Montreal. She was extremely accommodating, we had everything we needed. The room was very affordable and had an ensuite bathroom. Very cute, quiet neighbourhood with a bus stop to the metro just around the corner.
Very friendly and accommodating host, definitely recommended!
Beautiful home, close to transport and shopping.

Julia was very responsive to messages and kindly allowed us to check in early. She cleared plenty of space for us in her fridge and granted us use of her washer and dryer, which was a huge help. Her neighborhood is residential, but a few blocks away the area becomes more industrial, with several power plants and smokestacks. The street was very quiet, although we were awoken by a construction crew doing early-morning repairs to the sidewalk. Overall, we had a very nice stay and would stay here again. Thanks, Julia!

You get what you pay for. Thinking this was a great deal and not TOO far from the green line via bus, my husband and I booked the bedroom with ensuite bath. The interaction with the host was awkward from the start. My husband and I both heaved our luggage onto the tiny porch while looking for the key in the mailbox. I couldn't see that Julia was inside washing dishes with only the screen door opened. My husband went inside to get the layout while I guarded the luggage. No help from her at all or introduction. Later when we went to the back deck to eat, she repeated 3 times make sure to close the screen door...and seemed befuddled that we would chose to eat al fresco instead of in the stifling living room. The next morning we awoke to banging, drilling, and lots of other noises. Apparently Julia had hired a handyman to do some construction in the house but didn't bother to tell us. Thanks! He was pleasant; just doing his job. We called Julia to see how long he would be there- no response. We opened our windows and the ones in the living room because it was sooooo hot in there and we closed them before we left. The next day we did the same but left them opened because the other tenant was enjoying the air as well. The next morning, Julia removed the cranks so the windows could not be opened. Shortly after that we cancelled the rest of our reservation, but not only because of that issue. She was not accommodating AT ALL!!! It was a chore to ask her for toilet paper, especially after she had a door erected between the kitchen and where she stayed. Also she was dressed inappropriately most of the time in a shorter nightgown ( often with no bra) in front of my husband. She even came into the kitchen wearing just a bathrobe when my husband was cooking, reached across him to turn the vent of the stove on instead of going around. I don't know how she got her rating or her supposed hospitality, but she must have left it in Vancouver!!!!

Julia was a great host. We had to check in a late at night but she was kind and nice. The price is very reasonable and the roon is clean and tidy. It seemed buses run even at late night at around 1-2am near her place. We had a car so didn't feel difficult to travel around but if you're taking public transit, it will be tough. Also, although the place is located in a quiet neighbourhood, there still constructions going on in the morning so you might feel little irritated. Overall, it was a great place!
Buena persona, amable y considerada! El lugar limpio y de fácil acceso, parada de Bus a la vuelta de la esquina.

Julia was very welcoming and explained us very well how to get to City Center and where to go. 
The room and bathroom is tidy and well equipped. 
The house is in a quiet area and you will find everything you need.

Julia is just an amazing host!!! Beautiful and caring, she took care of me and helped me with my concerns!
Her places is wonderfully located, walking distance to food, grocery’s and depaneurs! In a quiet cute neighborhood.
Very clean and comfortable, I’m glad I found this place.
The 187 bus will drop you in front of the house almost, and it’s 10 minutes away from the green metro line!!! Magnifique for long stays

Julia knows where to go for the transportation passes and can help you find just about anything you are looking for! She was a wonderful host, and I would definitely stay with her again if I was in the area.
This place felt like home to me. That's how good it was.
good place to save a little.  note it is in pointe de trembles the most east part. suburbia near malls definately need a car

It was lovely, cozy and welcoming.
The place was clean and in great shspe.

It is very close to the bus station.

The host, Julia, is very nice and kind. She makes you feel comfortable and right at home.

She is very helpful and tries her best to assist in any way possible to make your stay comfortable and enjoy a.

I will make sure to reserve the same room next time I am in Montreal.

Thanks Julia.

Location is a bit far from downtown but with a car there is no problem.  Neighborhood is quiet and safe. Affordable.  House is small but ok for the price I paid.  Thanks Julia for letting us stay at your place.
Everything was fine thank you Julia
Très bon rapport qualité prix, bien situé, proche des transports en commun pour aller en centre ville et des commerces.
Julia is a open-minded, a friendly and a very helpful person. The room was clean and everything was as expected.

Ask Julia if she's taken care of the mold issue before booking. Don't expect the breakfast she provides to involve any fruit, bread or protein sources. There are other guests sharing the tiny house who may or may not communicate with you. There is no dining room table at which to eat food nor is there a desk for using laptops. The beautiful backyard has no lawn furniture and there is junk stacked back there which is unfortunate because the green space could be the best feature of the house.

name: Porto D'Alma Santa Catarina - Studio w/ Terrace
summary: Located in the historic center of city, across one of Porto´s most charismatic Churches known for its painted tin-glazed ceramic tilework - Capela das Almas - Porto D'Alma Santa Catarina Studios provides the perfect location. Experience the heart of Porto’s downtown and be in walking distance from all sightseeing spots on the map. Metro Bolhão station is 1min walk!
space: The renovated building retains its original façade and ceilings, yet offers studios with a vintage décor fully equipped. Integrated in a private building, in one of the most known streets of Porto, Santa Catarina Street, enjoy the heart of the city in 5 minutes walks to main attractions: Clérigos Tower, Downtown Aliados Square, Ribeira and the main streets for dinning and enjoying night life. Porto D'Alma Santa Catarina – Studio with Terrace features a fantastic private terrace, where you can enjoy the sun or a Porto wine. Indoors, you will find free wifi, television (with international channels), coffee machine, stove, ketle as well a microwave. This entire space was designed to be a welcoming space for you at the end of an unforgettable day of exploration. The Kitchen is wide open to this space and totally equipped. Its excellent solar exposure and is location in Porto city center, close of the most touristic points, allows you to explore the city on foot, however if you need to, met

neighborhood_overview: Inserted in a area rich in coffees, restaurants and shops, but peaceful at night.
transit: Metro and taxi are available. Private transportation from/to airport or other places can be provide (availability must be checked).
access: The house is entirely for the guests.
house_rules: - Respect the silence time - Smoking is only allowed outside - Parties aren`t permitted - Late Check-in Fee: from 10 p.m to 0.30 a.m - 20€  /  After 0.30 a.m - 30€

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host.host_about:
I love travelling and meeting new people.
Receiving people is somethig that gives me pleasure, certainly I will be a good host.
I like to have fun with my friends, but also consider myself a calm and respectful person.
Riding a bike with my friends is my addiction.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Great apartment. Very clean, very comfortable, perfectly located, and the terrace is a big plus.
The apartment was very clean, in a great location and spacious.  Ricardo gave us a big list of great places to visit and eat.  Definitely recommended.
Bright and clean room, provided with microwave,oven, coffeemaker, television.

Riccardo and his wife are nice, cooperative young and friendly couple. 
We had a pleasant & enjoyable vacation in Porto

Great accomodation in Porto! The appartment was very clean, comfortable and nice furnishing. It is very well located and has a nice terrace. The communication with the host was very good and he gave us a lot of great tips for Porto. I can highly recommend this airbnb!

name: Acıbadem kadıköy

host.host_about: Psikoloji mezunu.

name: Central Apartment w Bosphorus&Hist. Peninsula View
summary: My other 2 bedrooms flat with Bosphorus View is in very central location, close to public transportation and to touristical attractions. It is 5 min. by walk to Galata Tower, to famous İstiklal Street, to metro. Bus stop and tram line are 2 min. away by walk. The tram arrives in 8 min. to Sultanahmet (Historical Peninsula). The building is located in historical part of the city on a narrow quiet street. There are many restaurants and shops around. Good choice for relaxing & enjoying the city.
space: USAGE of the Washing Machine in the building: Please let me know one day before if you want to use the washing machine of the building. It can be used between 12.00 - 18.00 and it costs 30 TL per use.  Please prepare your clothes in a bag in your room and please put the money in the bag. Cleaning lady takes it and brings them back after the washing machine finished. You don’t need wait for her. Iron can be provided upon request.
description: My other 2 bedrooms flat with Bosphorus View is in very central location, close to public transportation and to touristical attractions. It is 5 min. by walk to Galata Tower, to famous İstiklal Street, to metro. Bus stop and tram line are 2 min. away by walk. The tram arrives in 8 min. to Sultanahmet (Historical Peninsula). The building is located in historical part of the city on a narrow quiet street. There are many restaurants and shops around. Good choice for relaxing & enjoying the city.
