It can be used between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and it costs 30 TL per use.  Please prepare your clothes in a bag in your room and please put the money in the bag. Cleaning lady takes it and brings them back after the washing machine finished. You don’t need wait for her. Iron can be provided upon request. Dear Guest,  Welcome to İstanbul! It is really one
neighborhood_overview: Dear Guest,  Welcome to İstanbul! It is really one of the most beautiful cities on the world: Historical, picturesque, colorful land full of contrasts.  East and west meet in Istanbul. Istanbul is ancient, Istanbul is modern. Sweet comes always after spicy but they are next to each other but never mix. Sadness turns to happiness in Istanbul.  Sometimes you would feel it is crowded, chaotic and noisy. If you want to make a break and breath, Istanbul has very calm corners as well.  Heybeliada is one of Istanbul’s peaceful spots. It is a small island next to Istanbul. This is actually one of a group of Island and called Prince's Islands. There is no traffic, no motor vehicles on the Islands and transportation is made by horse cars or bicycles. With its beautiful houses island is like an open air architecture museum. Islands are one of the must to see spots if you stay in Istanbul longer than couple days. If you would like to spend time on the island my friend has a beautiful house with a
notes: Elevator reaches 3rd floor. The apartment is on the 4th (very top) floor. You need to take the last 15 steps by foot.  ————————————————— You can leave your bags after 11.00 in your accomodation before check-in time at 15.00 Check-out time is 11.00 am as mentioned in the listing details.  Please prepare your luggage until check out time (11.00 am) and leave your keys on the kitchenette countertop. You can store your luggage in your appartment until 15.00 for free. I can provide you a locker until 22.00 in the same building for 20TL per bag.
house_rules: - Smoking is allowed only on the terraces. - Please be quite in the apartment and on the stairs in the building. There are also families and long term tenants in the building. - Drinking alcohol on the street is legally not allowed. - Please turn off the AC and the TV before you go out. - Please keep closed your window before you go out. - Please bring your garbage to the trash container on the right corner outside the building if it is full. - Please don't leave any dirty dishes. - Please don't drink anything on the bed especially wine. - Please leave key set inside the apartment before you check out.

host.host_about: I worked at multinational companies as Business Controller & as Business Solutions Manager. In 2014 July i started  my own business. I am an experienced Airbnb host tries to give the best for my guests.

reviews.comments: My parents stayed at Ozgur’s place for 3 nights. They found him polite and kind and they enjoyed the great view from the balcony very much. Thanks Ozgur!
Excellent location
If you care about clean mattress, providing bed sheets, or high slope of the location, ease of reaching the address, outside construction that is just in front of the location, think twice.

Great location, safe neighborhood, modest furniture. Needs improvement. Good for its price. Don’t expect much. 
Özgür and Fairoza are great people to deal with.
Great apartment and even better host!!
Amazing location & friendly host, would recommend this place to anyone!
Grate place with a wonderful view on Bosporus!

The place was great. Very clean, bright and the airconditioners (one in each room) worked perfect. Towels and bedsheets were clean. The location could not be better!!! 
The flat was very confortable with plenty of room and two amazing terraces overlooking Istanbul and the Bosphorus. 
Özgür is a great host, always accesible to answer any questions and trying to make our stay as pleasant as it could be. 
I will definitely recomend the host to my friends and family.
It is a nice flat with a big terrace with a spectacular view. It is small but cosy. The neighbourhood is really nice, there are quite many shops and lots of cafes and restaurants.

We had 2 great week in that Apartment. First of all, Özgür is a great and very polite host. You can literally reach him always and he’s very helpful. The location is great you can reach everything easily. If you walk down the hill 3minutes theres a tram station. If you walk up the hill, you can reach the Sishane Metrostation and the famous Istiklal street in 7 - 10 minutes. Its a very quiet and lovely neighbourhood. Few constructions going on around but its not disturbing. The apartment needs a bit care inside in terms of equipment but everything works fine so its not a big deal. The views from the balconies are just astonishing. There are small local markets and cafes around if you need smth. All in all, very recomended.

위치: 트램역에서 가까워 이동하기 편합니다. (꼐딴꽈 오류뫅뀔입니다) 오르막길에 위치하고 있고 주변에 공사 중이라 조금 으스스했습니다. 
숙소: 앞 뒤에 테라스가 있는데 침실 쪽은 바다가 보.이.고. 주방 쪽은 갈라타 타워가 보.입.니.다. (딲휘 쀼꽈 쫗쮠 않쑴뉘똬) 주방에 식기구도 잘 준비 되어있고 냉장고도 있는데 앉아서 먹을 곳이 마땅치 않아 난감했습니다. (주방에 큰 침대가 있고 식탁이 없습니다) 보통은 테라스를 이용하면 될 것 같은데 하필 비가 오는 날이라 테라스를 이용할 수가 없어서 아쉬웠습니다.

그 외: 수건과 휴지는 넉넉히 준비되어 있었습니다. 세탁기 건조기 없습니다. 작지만 엘리베이터가 있어서 유용했습니다.
호스트의 여러 요구 사항 중에 쓰레기를 밖에 버려달라는 것이 있었는데 저희가 도착했을 때 이미 쓰레기통이 가득 차 있어서 황당했습니다. 
가기 전에 숙소 찾아가는 방법이나 추천 식당 등 여러 팁들을 길고 친절하게 알려주어 도움이 되었습니다.

The roof apartment is fabulous with stunning views from two terraces (on all the tourist places on one side and Bosphorus on the other side). Moreover, Özgür was quick in solving every issue and addresed us with very useful “starting info pack”. The locality of accommodation is great as well - near tram stop and restaurants. I definitely recommend!
Lovely apartment in an ideal location, host was extremely helpful, very quick to respond and had loads of great recommendations.

Özgür подробно рассказал как найти дом, прислал фотографию крыльца. Так как мы приехали поздно вечером - это было очень кстати. 
В квартире чисто. Удобная кровать и подушки. Тепло, отопление есть. 
Мыло, туалетная бумага, бумажные полотенца - все было. Чистые и свежие полотенца. 
Расположение квартиры очень удобное. Приятный район, рядом милые магазинчики и кафе. До площади Галата идти 6 минут! До трамвайной остановки минуты 3. 
В квартире была веранда с красивейшим видом! Утром просыпаться одно удовольствие, а вечером можно романтично посидеть. 
Мы лично познакомились с хозяином квартиры. Он оказался очень гостеприимным и приветливым. Ответил на все наши вопросы и всегда был готов помочь, если нужно. 
Если вы думаете бронировать эту квартиру или нет - даже не думайте! Бронируйте! Вы ничуть не пожалеете!

Большое спасибо за гостеприимство и приятное впечатление о Стамбуле!

Özgür's apartment is in a little street next to everything and with good conectivity to the tram and the subway. the view is nice and the place is really comfortable for a tiring day after exploring that beautiful city of Istanbul!

Evin konumu gayet güzel  bir  tarafı  galata kulesine bir tarafi denize bakıyor. Özgür  bey  çok  anlayışlı  ve hızlı  cevaplar verdi  konaklama yapmadan  önce  kolaylık  sağlamak  için  nereye nasıl  gidilir şeklinde  ufak bir  bilgilendirme mesaji yolluyor ve tüm  ihtiyaçlarınızı karsilamaya çalıştı. Ev temizdi  banyosu ufak ama sıkıntı  değil. Bir sıkıntı olduğunda  direkt olarak Özgür  beye mesaj attigimizda anında  çözüm  bulmaya çalıştı ve yardımcı  oldu.  Ilgisi ve alakasi için  teşekkür  ederiz.

name: Casa da Ponte - Fontainhas Duplex
summary: Apartamento duplex, totalmente renovado, com uma localização privilegiada no centro histórico do Porto, num bairro muito tranquilo e típico. Este espaço foi remodelado e decorado a pensar no conforto dos nossos hóspedes, para que se sintam como em sua casa.  Be our Guest!
space: O apartamento duplex é constituído por um open space no primeiro piso com um sofá-cama inserido na área da sala, uma kitchenette totalmente equipada (frigorífico, forno, placa vitrocerâmica, micro-ondas, máquina de café, torradeira, louça). No segundo piso tem 2 quartos com cama de casal (inclui roupas de cama) e uma casa de banho (inclui toalhas e secador de cabelo). O espaço está equipado com televisão, internet e Wi-Fi.
description: Apartamento duplex, totalmente renovado, com uma localização privilegiada no centro histórico do Porto, num bairro muito tranquilo e típico. Este espaço foi remodelado e decorado a pensar no conforto dos nossos hóspedes, para que se sintam como em sua casa.  Be our Guest! O apartamento duplex é constituído por um open space no primeiro piso com um sofá-cama inserido na área da sala, uma kitchenette totalmente equipada (frigorífico, forno, placa vitrocerâmica, micro-ondas, máquina de café, torradeira, louça). No segundo piso tem 2 quartos com cama de casal (inclui roupas de cama) e uma casa de banho (inclui toalhas e secador de cabelo). O espaço está equipado com televisão, internet e Wi-Fi. Os hóspedes têm acesso a todo o apartamento. Todos os hóspedes são recebidos pelo anfitrião e podem entrar diretamente em contato com ele em caso de alguma dúvida ou necessidade durante a estadia. Este apartamento está muito bem localizado, podendo percorrer toda a zona histórica sem precisar de uti
neighborhood_overview: Este apartamento está muito bem localizado, podendo percorrer toda a zona histórica sem precisar de utilizar transportes. Encontra-se a poucos minutos a pé da Praça da Batalha, do Teatro Nacional São João, do Funicular dos Guindais, da Ponte D. Luis I, da Sé Catedral e da estação de comboio e metro de S. Bento. Está, também, muito próximo da Rua de Santa Catarina, uma das  mais conhecidas e cosmopolitas ruas do Porto, onde encontrará o histórico café Magestic. A poucos metros do apartamento está situada a Praça dos Poveiros, onde poderá encontrar uma ampla oferta de restaurantes e bares típicos.
notes: Informamos que existe a partir do dia 1 de Março de 2018, uma Taxa Turística no Porto de 2€ por noite e por cada pessoa com mais de 12 anos.
access: Os hóspedes têm acesso a todo o apartamento.
interaction: Todos os hóspedes são recebidos pelo anfitrião e podem entrar diretamente em contato com ele em caso de alguma dúvida ou necessidade durante a estadia.
house_rules: - O horário de check-in é 15:00-22:00 - Checkout às 11:00

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The Appartment of Elvira is amazing. It is feshly renovated and very well equipped with everything that you might need. The location is very much in the center and it is not even 1 kilometer and you are where all the stuff goes on in the city. The neighbourhood is nice, traditional and quiet despite the central location. Elvira herself was very attentive to all our needs and when we arrived we were presented with a nice bottle of Port Wine and some pastries which both were amazing. My two friends and I were very pleasently surprised with everything. It is a perfect stay for 3-5 people.  I would definetely recommend this appartment!

Such a great place in a wonderful little traditional neighborhood. Ground floor access was great for us traveling with luggage. Location was convenient to public transportation. Easy to walk to restaurants and shopping nearby. Elvira was an amazing host. Would definitely stay here again.

Elvira’s home is great, really stylish! We loved the area and the great tips Elvira shared. 

Thank you for a great time in Porto!

We has a wonderful time in Porto. My brother and his girlfriend arrived first, Elvira allowed them to leave their bags early and provided some port wine and snacks. They said she was very nice, although I never met her. We arrived late as our flight was delayed and we had been traveling for over 24 hours. We were very tired and had a bit of a hard time finding the place as our cab dropped us off on the wrong side, the neighbors were very friendly and helped us find it. The apartment was very cute and clean, perfect for 4 people. It definitely gave you the feeling of living in Porto, with the streets decorated for an upcoming festival and lots of potted plants and local children and pets enjoying the nice weather outdoors. The location was perfect, easy to walk to the river, as well as the town center. My only complaint would be that it was so hot, but they were getting air conditioning installed the day we left! I would definitely recommend this apartment! Great location and value for the price.

Had a fantastic experience staying in Porto. The accommodation was clean, very comfortable, had great personal touches to welcome us to Portugal and was exactly as described. Elvira was a wonderful host with clear and quick communication - we happened to book for the weekend of Festa de São João and Elvira was kind enough to let us know that it would be a busy weekend in the city (in a good way!) and what to expect from the festival. I would happily stay here again.

I and my husband have been to Porto for more than two weeks in July 2018, stayed at Casa da Ponte and we loved it. The pictures are a true representation of the house which is newly renovated, stylish, comfortable, very clean and with a well equipped kitchen.  The location is quite convenient;  it takes 10-15 min. To walk to the main hot spots in Porto (Ribeira river front, D Luis Bridge, Cathedral, S Bento Station, S Catarina Street, etc.).  The neighbourhood is safe and quiet at night and there are grocery stores nearby.  
Elvira is an amazing host - very nice, friendly and kind.  She greeted us and made us feel welcomed from the first moment. The pastries, port wine and souvenirs were a very nice touch.  During our stay Elvira was very helpful  with prompt communication. 
We had an amazing vacation in Porto and Casa da Ponte had a big contribution.  Thank you Elvira!

Logement en duplex refait à neuf, très propre, très bien équipé, sommiers et matelas de qualité. Le voisinage peut étonner (petites allées étroites avec quelques nuisances sonores dans la journée, mais très calme le soir pour dormir) proche du centre ville historique. Le rez-de-chaussée ne reçoit pas beaucoup de lumière naturelle mais le premier étage si.  Les hôtes sont très accueillants et tout à fait disposés à aider.

We really enjoyed our stay, the location is excellent, close enough to walk to most of the cities attractions while being in a calm and typical neighborhood. There is a metro stop nearby which is convenient because it’s the same line that goes to the airport. Elvira was very friendly and answered our questions quickly, she gave us the chance to leave our luggage as soon as we arrived from the airport even though it was before check in. She explained and gave tips of the neighborhood and some city highlights. Parking was very easy and she gave us a couple of suggestions of where we could leave the car. The apartment is recently renovated so everything is new and works great. We had an amazing time ! Would definitely recomment staying here!
Great place, perfect for our group of 3, all tourist attractions were walking distance. 10/10 would recommend
모든 것이 집처럼 아늑하고 깨끗하고 편리한 곳이었어요. 저희 도착시간이 밤 12시가 넘었는데 호스트가 그 시간에 마중나와서 악수하고 안아주며 캐리어까지 들어줬어요. 매우 따뜻하고 좋은 사람들이어서 포루투에 대한 좋은 인상을 받았습니다. 포루투 여행 오신다면 이 숙소를 적극 추천합니다.

The apartment was perfect, clean and beautiful. Elvira, the hostess welcomed us with her husband that helped us with the luggages. 

She let us and little bottle of Porto to welcome us and made us feel like home. The place is clean and very well decorated.

The location is close to everything and in a little street that is full of charm and surrounded by local neighbors.

The bed were brand new, super comfortable. Finally, Elvira is super quick to answer when you have a question.

Strongly recommended.

Isabelle

Special thanks Elvira for your support and your recommendations.  It was a pleasure for us to get to know you and your family and to stay in your cosy, little house. Greetings, Tom & Özden

All is new and clean. The Location of this little house is very central, near restaurants, supermarket, city centre. We enjoyed our stay very much.

It was exactly like the pictures. They offered shampoo, conditioner, body wash, tooth paste, enough toilet paper, clean towels and linens, hair dryer, etc. They also set out a bottle of water and some Oporto wine for our arrival. The neighborhood is very traditional, quiet and nice; it is ideally located, very close to the city center. A big plus is that it has A/C (we were there on a particularly hot weekend). Would definitely recommend.
A Elvira é uma ótima anfitriã, nos recebeu muito bem e no horário combinado. Ofereceu vinho e nos deu dicas sobre a cidade. O apartamento é novo, como nas fotos!

Elvira and her family were extremely friendly and helpful! They provided not only a beautiful home with lovely personal touches but also various suggestions as to where to eat and where to go.  Thank you very much for such a wonderful stay, I definitely recommend this home to people visiting Porto :-)
Excellent location and great, homey place. I would definitely recommended. Even the neighbor were nice and friendly.
Great place to stay in Porto! Quaint but clean and great Port left for us to sip during our stay. Thank you!

Le logement est conforme à l’annonce. Il est bien situé par rapport au centre ville.
Nous avons particulièrement apprécié l’accueil d’Elvira.

Very clean and cosmetically charming accommodation. Very well located, within walking distances to public transport or the quays. 

Owner was there to greet us on arrival with all the answers to our questions, an abundance of local knowledge and a lovely sample of the local Porto

Has my top recommendation, will definitely book again with Elvira

I had a reservation for the hotel, but changed my mind after looking at Airbnb and discivering Elvira’s place. And it was a great experience. She responded right away, get clear directions and met us at the place with a warm welcome gift.
The place is squeaky clran and has everything you need.
It’s a in walkable distance to supermarkets and to the upper riverbank. Highly recommend to stay at this place.
Apartment conform to the description. Elvira is a very welcoming host and gave us good advice for our stay in Porto
Great apartment, within walking distance of the main part of Porto. Would stay again
Een klein appartement van alle gemakken voorzien, schoon en in een rustige buurt.

wow!!! what an absolute gem. Elvira has thought of everything for the traveller. She met us on arrival and explained the local area and  the necessary details about the house. Comfortable, quiet spotlessly clean and in a fabulous location the house is one of the best Airbnb stays we have stayed in. cI can't recommend it highly enough. Thank you Elvira and family, we hope to stay again one day.

Elvira was a great host and answered any questions I had very quickly. She was very welcoming and the extra touches of having cake and port on arrival was a lovely touch. The apartment is really lovely  and the photos represent it very well. The location is perfect, walking distance to some of the main sights. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Porto. Thank you for your wonderful hospitality Elvira :)
Clean well appointed place with a good location.

This place is awesome!! Elvira was quick to respond to everything, and let us drop off our bags early. The place was sparkling clean, the beds were very comfortable, and I really enjoyed the treats she left for us. 

The neighborhood is a quiet community hidden in a very active part of town. Make sure to try the pork sandwiches at Casa Guedes just up the street - there is a line for a reason! 

Note: The neighborhood is quiet. I wouldn’t suggest this for those looking to be loud after 9-10pm. But it is so close to everything you’ll have no reason to stay at home.

I have used Airbnb all over the world on countless occasions and Elvira’s was by far the best experience I have ever had. 

We arrived early and Elvira invited us to drop our bags off, Elvira gave us great tips for the city, where to go and helped with any questions we had.

In addition Elvira left some beautiful welcome touches to make us feel at home and I would recommend that anybody looking to stay in Porto stays here as you will not be disappointed!

I will definitely be back!
Nice apartment, great location. Prepare for a cobble stone alleyway if you have heavy luggage.

Sobre el anfitrión: 
La recepción de Elvira fue excelente , nos espero en persona. Ella es la dueña de la locación se nota en todos sus detalles y cuidados. También ayudo mucho con su recomendaciones y flexibilidad.
Sobre la ubicación :
Con respecto al casco histórico esta justo en el borde , pero es muy practico de llegar caminando a todos lados , bus turístico a 2 cuadras , funicular a 3 cuadras , y el puente a do infante a 2 cuadras , y la salida de Flixbus ( bus low cost ) a 2 cuadras. En departamento esta en el corazón de una vecindad en reconstrucción como la mayoría de la ciudad
Sobre el departamento: 
esta recién reciclado a nuevo, con todos los detalles, y muy bien aprovechado el espacio, sentirás que sos el primero en habitarlo .
No es del todo silencioso , ya que hay una vecina muy ruidosa , pero las ventanas de excelente calidad  son sumamente herméticas y disminuyen mucho los ruidos
Aunque veras en las fotos se lo ve un poquito mas grande de lo que es , es muy cómodo y practico

This apartment is a hidden gem in a quiet little residential neighborhood tucked into a corner of the city! You can walk to lots of attractions and are very close to the tram, bus and train station. The place is neat, clean, modern and has all the necessary amenities. Comfy beds and nice linens, nicely decorated! Elvira provides maps, a printed information booklet and gives you any other answers you might need for your stay. Great experience!
A great welcome and a lovely flat.

Our stay at Elvira's was the highlight of our trip, if we could have taken the apartment along with us for the rest of our stay in Portugal, we would have done it! The place is really cozy, comfortable, stocked with everything you could need, it really felt like a home away from home. The location is also excellent, only a few minutes walking distance from historic Porto. Elvira was a wonderful host, welcomed us at arrival with Port wine and crackers, spend 20 minutes showing us a local map and the mustsees, told us when we could get food at the late hour, groceries, breakfast, etc. The whole time we were there she was easy to contact and quick to respond. This was my best Airbnb experience to date!

Perfect apartment for couples or friends which want to explore the city.

It’s not in the fanciest environment but the apartment itself is very pretty and it’s hard to find something comparable with at least in this price class, I would recommend it to everyone who will explore Porto. It’s really central and you can get there fast to the City center or metro.

The flat itself was clean and you have everything you need. The beds are super comfy and the air condition is powerful enough that you get the temperatur  you want (not that normal in my experience)

Unrestricted recommendation for everyone who can handle a few stairs to get in bed.

Ótima Localização,a Anfitriã mto simpática e e acolhedora...
Recomendo...

Endroit très proche du centre ville, très propre, Hôte très accueillante & réactive si vous avez besoin de quelque chose. Ruelle très calme, Elvira nous avait préparée une petite surprise pour notre arrivée, elle m'a ensuite aider a trouver une place de stationnement, parle un petit peu Français & parfaitement Anglais. Je vous recommande ce logement sans soucis.

Super logement pour visiter Porto. L'accueil d'elvira est très chaleureux et l'appartement est super charmant et d'une propreté impeccable. Encore merci pour tes conseils Elvira nous avons adoré séjourner chez vous ☺️

Elvira es una gran anfitriona. Desde que la contacté me ayudó y me dio mucha información. Mi familia se hospedo en el piso y estuvieron muy cómodos, el piso es muy limpio, bonito y con buena ubicación. Elvira es muy flexible y atenta. Mis padres la han pasado muy bien y sin duda cuando regresen repetiremos. Muchas gracias Elvira =)
特别棒,是我住过最棒的房子｡离海边距离很近,房子很新,家具也很好,住的特别舒适｡强烈强烈推荐｡

Un alojamiento precioso, nuevo, muy cerca del centro y en un barrio muy bonito, especial. Tranquilo y muy pintoresco. La casita muy limpia y bien cuidada, todo nuevo y no falta detalle. Elvira es muy amable y contesta rapidamente. Nos orientó y aconsejó respecto a que ver y donde comer en la ciudad.

Elvira’s apartment was excellent. Fantastic location, great space and a wonderful host. Communication was prompt and really useful. We had a lovely stay, the apartment is so comfortable, modern and sparkling clean! We will be back!
Elvira é a melhor, super educada e prestativa. Quando eu voltar para o Porto quero ficar na acomodação dela.

One of the best Airbnb experiences I've ever had. Elvira was extremely thoughtful in every aspect and always ready to help. The place is great, recently reformed and within walking distance from almost everything you need to see in downtown. I totally recommend staying with Elvira.
We have great wonderful time in Portor. The apartment and host is good. And the location is good, too.

name: Homey Studio Hong Kong next to HKU MTR station
summary: Homey Studio Hong Kong is in the centre of the city, only 1 min walk to Hong Kong University MTR station. The tram (Ding Ding) stop is just doorstep away, along with buses to Central, Wan Chai, Causeway Bay and Kowloon.  Tons of restaurants, cafes and two supermarkets are just around the corner. The newly renovated studio is equipped with new facilities (toilet, sink, and shower and brand new bed) It is perfect for solo and couple travelers to enjoy pleasant holidays in Hong Kong
space: Brand new bed, mattress and toilet facilities that make Homey Studio Hong Kong stand out among other airbnb listings. Travellers will enjoy this space and relax in this cozy and modern studio
description: Homey Studio Hong Kong is in the centre of the city, only 1 min walk to Hong Kong University MTR station. The tram (Ding Ding) stop is just doorstep away, along with buses to Central, Wan Chai, Causeway Bay and Kowloon.  Tons of restaurants, cafes and two supermarkets are just around the corner. The newly renovated studio is equipped with new facilities (toilet, sink, and shower and brand new bed) It is perfect for solo and couple travelers to enjoy pleasant holidays in Hong Kong Brand new bed, mattress and toilet facilities that make Homey Studio Hong Kong stand out among other airbnb listings. Travellers will enjoy this space and relax in this cozy and modern studio Being a superhost and a world traveler and love to interact with my guests, providing them some travel insights about Hong Kong. The neighborhood of the apartment is located in SaiWan which is between Sai Ying Pun and Kennedy Town. The authentic Hong Kong vibes as well as the expats living in this neighborhood makes the a
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of the apartment is located in SaiWan which is between Sai Ying Pun and Kennedy Town. The authentic Hong Kong vibes as well as the expats living in this neighborhood makes the area fun to explore as you will see some local markets here and some nice cafes/ restaurants hidden in the small alleyways
notes: No shoes inside the studio, and no party, no pets.
transit: Hong Kong University metro station (exit B1) is only 1 min walk from home. The tram stop and the airport bus stop are just outside the apartment.
access: 溫馨小家是獨立房門入住,電梯出來後,有自己的房門｡使用電子密碼鎖,每個月定期更換密碼,安全又方便,不會擔心弄丟鑰匙的問題｡
interaction: Being a superhost and a world traveler and love to interact with my guests, providing them some travel insights about Hong Kong.
house_rules: - no shoes inside

host.host_location: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
host.host_about: Open minded and easygoing . Often travel for work and for leisure. Professional Airbnb host and user.

address.street: Hong Kong, 香港島, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Very nice studio.

If I could have stayed there more I would have done so.  Close to HK University and the subway (and all the buses), it's near everything you need.  Downtown is just a few bus stop away.  My host was away in Europe but he was helpful and quick (minutes) to reply to my inquieries.  The studio is modern, well thought, bed comfortable, and I love the powerful shower. 11/10 More than perfect for the discerning travelers.
As it was my first trip to Hong Kong, I had a lot of worries about accommodation, but it was very good unlike I expected. Thank you for your nice trip.
Nice clean place and quick responses from Henri!

Super convenient location right next to the HKU MTR station. Very bright, modern place with a powerful shower, cool air conditioning, and fast WiFi. The check-in process was very smooth and Henri was incredibly responsive. Thanks, Henri!
特別好找的地理位置,房子很時尚可愛,去中環上環灣仔都很方便~

Henri's place is in an excellent location.  The room itself was in immaculate condition.  The bathroom looked like it was newly renovated.  The communication with Henri was excellent and he even went to great detail to provide step by step instructions to find his place which made it easy to find.  I would genuinely recommend this spot for anyone going to HK.

Clean room. Comes with some tea. I tried bringing some instant ramen one day only to find theres no eating utensils so keep that in mind. Henri was very responsive through our texts. Careful with the elevator.
Great place with lots of local food around.
房間很新,很乾淨｡房東十分友善!樓下還有很多特色的餐廳
Great location

If you’re looking for a local experience, Henri’s place is your choice! Although the unit is small, the room is consider very new and clean in HK. Check in was easy from the instructions and Henri make sure we are always alright during our stay there!
Henry was on the spot with anything I needed. He went out of his way to get me a much needed converter and was nice enough to let me keep it. What a guy!

Stayed here 2 nights on a short business trip and couldn’t have been happier. This studio is in an excellent location - fairly central and on a variety of public transportation lines.  Henri provides a few local tips, but there’s a lot of self-guided exploring to be enjoyed just outside on the street below. The unit doesn’t have any natural light, which might be a hangup for some. But this comfortable a place in such a great location with a solid and responsive host is a good value by any definition.

Be sure u have read very carefully about the address description and know how to open an electronic door. If u r sensitive to noise like the window air con and the banging sound from an old style elevator, better think about it. And if u like/need watching TV, think twice coz it's not available.

This compact studio is located at a very local neighborhood with lots of food and shops to explore. Henri’s step-by-step check-in guide is essential as the complex entrances are quite confusing, even with the studio doors layout. 
The compact room has the essentials. Will come back if I am traveling alone again!

房東Henri人很好,遇定的時候因為臨時有事不能來而臨時改期,Henri很好沒有責怪也很理解｡房間有點窄,電梯是我電視上看到的非常老式的像貨梯,有點恐怖,不過算是一個體驗吧,可能是房子比較老,不過房東裝修很用心｡房間在地鐵隔壁,晚上鄰居進出比較吵,而且鄰居大力關電梯門匝的時候房間都會感覺到震動｡房東很好的準備了咖啡和茶包還有小糖果,還寫了一段歡迎來香港的小紙條,很貼心｡Check-in以後問我需不需要幫忙｡房間的窗戶不透光,天亮了都不知道,適合喜歡睡懶覺的人｡房間沒有牙刷,牙膏,拖鞋,和梳子,自己要準備好了｡
Love Henri's place!

Apartment is centrally located and connected with metro as well as by bus. Lot of nearby eateries and Cafe makes it ideal place for a traveler. Apartment is neat and clean and host is quick to respond to queries. Great place to stay in Hong Kong.
Great place to stay!  Good location close to the MTR.  Room was cozy and had everything I needed.
入住中有發生小插曲,但房東處理事情的積極態度讓入住變順利!很推

Henri is a great host and communicated with me actively to help me check in smoothly. 

The apartment is conveniently located just a minute walk from the mtr station. It is perfect for a short stay. My only gripe is that there is some random noise early in the morning on both days during my stay(perhaps clearing of the rubbish). Nevertheless, neat, clean and comfortable apartment!
Very good.
Henri was a great host and always quick to respond. Thanks Henri.

Henri was a great host and always responded very quickly! His place is very nice, clean, and in a great location! We were very happy with our stay here and wish we could have stayed longer. Thanks again for the great place and all the travel tips and advice Henri!
Nice and clean :)
Henri是一位非常有禮貌､很關心客人的房東｡房間雖小,但乾淨整潔,是一個人來香港的不錯選擇｡
It was a very comfy stay.  Great location + super nice host.  You can't get better than this.
Very nice apartment, clean and modern. Easy to find and easy to access.

His room is located in 屈地街. 
It is closed to the tram station.
Also the bus stop to the airport.
His is so confortable.
Actually this is the first time for me to use the airbnb.
Henri replies so quickly when I asked him. 
I reccomend you a lot!

Kleines Zimmer mit allem, was man braucht inkl. Kaffee und Kühlschrank. Was fehlt, ist etwas Tageslicht und ein Schrank. Das Bad ist schick, die Dusche geräumig, die Armaturen 1A. Den Gastgeber habe ich zwar nicht getroffen, aber per (Hidden by Airbnb) war er immer erreichbar.
房間乾淨,浴室高級,位置離地鐵站很近,房東回覆迅速!

Henri's place was great. It's small (as most places are in HK), but is well designed and has everything you need for your stay. It's ideal if you don't plan to spend much time in your room and just need a nice, clean place to sleep. Lots of small thoughtful touches and the amenities like shower and air conditioner worked well. 

The location of the flat is convenient for public transport, being close to the MTR and also the tram stop right outside the building. 

Communicating with Henri was excellent. Really clear instructions to find and access the apartment and he was responsive and friendly. Thanks Henri!

All in all, it was another fantastic Airbnb experience.

Henri’s apartment was perfect. It was cozy and had everything needed for our stay. Not only was the apartment in a great place to stay, Henri was an outstanding host being there along the way with quick responses and helpful information to better our visit. 

The apartment was very easy to find. Being near one of the train stops (HKU) and a Tram stop (whitty Street) it is very accessible. The apartment utilizes the given space unbelievably well. Truly a perfect place. It was an absolute pleasure. 

By the way it also has a neat lift to take you right to your door. Entering the building and apartment were also seamless. 

It is Hong Kong and the food choices are abundant. However, Henri was able to steer us towards a few local favorites. 

In all- great host, lovely apartment, beautiful city. 

Our trip was that much more pleasurable because of this stay. 

Cheers!
Henri is a responsive host. His place is tiny but very clean and cozy. Great location!
Great place and location!
Herni’s place was clean and cozy as expected! Conviently located close to HKU.

Henri is a great host, and he was responsive throughout my stay. The studio is cozy and perfect for the solo traveler. Building is old style Hong Kong, with inside studio renovated and modern. Excellent location, and great value.
Clean neat place suitable for one although not too bad for two.

Henri's place is very cozy and convenient. The location is very central and we were able to get to most of the places we wanted to visit within 20 minutes or less. Being in the 'hipster' part of HK, there are many hidden gems (restaurants, small boutiques, Instagram spots) within walking distance as well as in nearby Kennedy Town and Sai Ying Pun. I would suggest to avoid bringing large luggage/suitcase as that would make it difficult to move around the apartment. This place is perfect for single travellers and a tight squeeze for 2 people, but we managed okay. Would stay at Henri's place again if I come here by myself.
Great location, three minutes walk from the exit B1 of HKU. Convenient transportation from/to the airport. Henri is super nice and the room is cozy.
入住很方便,以前在港大读的master,对这里也算熟悉,这间房的位置绝对是相当便利｡屋子不大,但是五脏俱全,屋子很干净,而且一进屋就有哈密瓜的味道,哈哈哈｡唯一的遗憾是隔音稍微差一点,不过住一宿还好,算是性价比不错的选择了｡
交通方便,地铁和公交､叮叮车都在门口｡房间干净整齐,有薰香和衣架｡房主提供交通指示到达房间很明确｡冬天手比较干燥的同学,记得开电子门锁的时候要哈一下手指｡下次有机会来香港,还会入住的,

The location is convenient with Mtr just 1 min away and many local yummy food around. The room is tiny but with everything you need and it’s very newly and nearly renovated! Most important of all, Henri is very helpful on the guidance of transportation and extremely responsive on enquires. Definitely a super host and I’d like to recommend to people who plan to visit HK!
Great place with good value
The host is kind and fast at feedback. He recommended some places and those places was great. The room was littlebit tiny to use for two people.
Henri's apartment is great for a short stay and exploring the city.  Good transport links and very close to the underground.

Henri was a great host! Really appreciate him checking in on me at different points during my stay to make sure things were fine, even though he was out of town.

Location of the apartment was great, just a short walk from HKU MTR, surrounded by lots of food, a great base for exploring. While the apartment was small, it was also cozy & comfortable. The old school gate lift was an interesting experience that we don’t get anymore in Singapore.

Walls are rather thin so you will hear noises of people moving around outside but it wasn’t really an issue for me.

All in all, a great stay in HK!
交通便利,房东贴心,楼下饭店很多好吃的很多,房间装饰很有特点｡
这个价格在香港租到这样的房间已经算不错了~

the room was small (expected, and very common in hong kong) but clean. excellent location, mtr and airport bus are within 3 minutes’ walk.
i saw a review where a guest complained about the lift, i didn’t see any problem - hey it takes you from here to there, what’s the big deal of having to open the gate yourself? just a friendly reminder - open the gate as soon as it reaches your floor, or it may leave if other people pressed the button on other floors.
only one minor problem - the room is right next to the lift, if someone lets go of the lift door you can hear a loud “bang” when it shuts. again - not that big a deal for me.
overall we are satisfied and will consider coming back.
A very well located place to stay.
房子整潔,地理位置便利,雖然房子小,但使用設施都很好很方便,就是抽風機聲音有點大｡
Good apartment for a short stay. Be aware that the window is facing another building so there’s no natural light from outside. Henri is helpful and very fast in answering all my question.
非常舒服的一次旅程 房东人非常好回复迅速,民宿周边交通方便,地铁叮叮车都很近,便利商店和药房几步之遥

Henri's place was great to stay at. His check-in instructions were so detailed and it made finding the apartment super easy. The room was a bit small, but that was expected since it is in a great location in Hong Kong. The room was very clean and Henri provided extra amenities and guides for my stay. Very much enjoyed my stay and would book again!
这是一个很温馨的小窝
Great location with tons of great food, just forget those tourist trap areas like tst and mk and cwb and explore this beautiful old area. Thank you so much!
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,在香港算是性价比很高了,(不过175以上睡起来应该不会很舒服)｡楼下就是叮叮车/bus mertro都很近,去哪里都很方便
Henri’s place was great. It was in such a good location. Thanks so much for letting us stay

Henri非常贴心,未入住之前就发来详细信息,平时有什么问题也及时回复了我的问题｡虽然发错了房源地址,但是及时更正并且诚恳道歉了,其实我自己也有很大责任,所以其他游客入住前三天一定要看入住的那个地图,一方面是防止发错地址､另一方面方便找到房子｡Henri真的是位很负责和热情的房东,很关心我们旅途是否顺利､希望我们能玩得开心,他很棒｡需要注意的是电梯有点危险,以及房间的隔音不太好,如果晚归建议有同伴出行｡不过此房源在香港的性价比很高,去香港大学只需要去到地铁的另一个出口,从房间下楼即可坐叮叮车,楼下便利店､数码店､点心店一应俱全(让我很惊喜的是有柯达冲洗店 对玩胶卷的游客很友好)｡总体非常赞!
Gud
Very cozy and clean
回覆超快,也很耐心解答,貼心房東,小資旅程首選!

Henri is a fantastic host with not only prompt responses and accurate info about the area, but your apartment is PERFECT for the Hong Kong explorers! I couldn’t have picked a better location, with trams, trains and buses literally at the doorstep! Thank you again Henri, you and your apartment are a delight!

name: Studio in the center of Porto for 4 people
summary: Private Studio at Travel & Live hostel, central located in Porto, at Santa Catarina street. Everything in the city is walking distance from the hostel, perfect stay for travelers.  Available for up to 4 guests, there is one double bed and one sofa-bed. Access to shared kitchen fully equipped.
description: Private Studio at Travel & Live hostel, central located in Porto, at Santa Catarina street. Everything in the city is walking distance from the hostel, perfect stay for travelers.  Available for up to 4 guests, there is one double bed and one sofa-bed. Access to shared kitchen fully equipped.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Was a good place, but expensive if you compare the prices in advance. The room and the location was right and the staff so kind.
Cuarto espacioso, muy bien ubicado en el mismo centro de Oporto! Me volvería a hospedar ahí! Gracias!

host.host_about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) e foi quando comecei alugando um quartinho na minha casa, onde pude receber pessoas de todos os cantos do mundo e compartilhar com eles a minha paixão pelo Rio. 

O sucesso foi tão grande que passado o tempo, meus amigos e amigos de amigos, passaram a me pedir para que administrasse os seus apartamentos. Topei o desafio, e os apartamentos foram se multiplicando... larguei a Faculdade de Geografia e decidi empreender, me dedicando exclusivamente aos meus hóspedes ! Foi a melhor decisão que tomei na vida. 

Depois de alguns anos fundei a minha própria agência, a Omar do Rio, especializada em Aluguel de Temporada e hoje administro inúmeros apartamentos de temporada na cidade. Me auto realizei por poder trabalhar com uma atividade que tanto amo, que tanto agregou a minha vida. 

Meu objetivo hoje, com a minha agência, é proporcionar uma estadia segura, tranquila e de qualidade, para que meus hóspedes possam desfrutar ao máximo a experiência na Cidade Maravilhosa. 

Contem comigo e minha Equipe para obter todo o suporte e as melhores dicas que você pode ter na cidade. 

Nos vemos no Rio !

Omar


Caso deseje visitar a minha lista de apartamentos entre no link: 
https://www.airbnb.com.br/wishlists/152530987



_________________________________________________________________


Hey,

I have been on Airbnb since (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , when I started renting a small room in my house, where I was able to receive people from all around the world and share with them my passion for Rio.

The success was so great that after time, my friends and friends of friends, 
 came to ask me to manage their listings. I accept the challenge, and the number of apartments was multiplying ... I left the University of Geography and decided to dedicate myself exclusively to my guests ! It was the best decision I ever made.

After some years I founded my own agency, Omar do Rio (Omar from Rio), specialized in Vacation Rentals and today I manage innumerable seasonal apartments in the city. I realized myself by being able to work with an activity that I love so much, that added so much to my life.

My goal today, with my agency, is to provide a safe, quiet and quality stay, so that my guests can enjoy the experience in the Marvelous City.

Count on me and my Team to get all the support and best tips you can have in town.

See you in Rio!

Omar


If you want to visit my list of apartments enter the link:
https://www.airbnb.com.br/wishlists/152530987

host.host_about:
I live in Barcelona and I work several months as a Tour guide taking Spanish groups around India. I also take American students in educational tours around Spain. The rest of the time I like to spend it doing my hobbies, of course travelling , dancing, reading, writing, photography and going out and socializing with my friends. I like almost everything and I’m interested always in knowing new things, people and places.  I’m easy going and friendly, I think, je,je. 

Vivo en Barcelona y trabajo varios meses en India llevando grupos. En primavera llevo estudiantes americanos que vienen en viajes educacionales a conocer España. El resto del año lo dedico a mis aficiones que a parte obviamente de viajar, son bailar, leer, escribir, la fotografía y salir con mis amigos a todo tipo de actos, me interesa casi todo, soy muy curiosa y tengo unas incansables ganas de conocer cosas, personas y lugares nuevos.

neighborhood_overview: Moda is the modern face of Kadikoy, where you can experience the old city as well as having bohemian lively, night life, lots of coffee shops, bars, gourmet restaurants, hammams etc. You can have long pleasant walks, cycle or run by the beautiful Moda seaside which will be only 10 minutes walking distance from home. You also have 5 minutes walking distance to the famous fish market where you have beautiful restaurants and fresh, gourmet Turkish food. If you are vegeterian/vegan, you will have so many options in Kadikoy.
transit: You can take a direct Havatas shuttle bus from Sabiha Gokcen airport. Getting home from Ataturk airport is also easy  with metro or seabus. During your visit in Istanbul, you will have too many options for sightseeing.  You can take the ferries from the ferry port which is 10 minutes distance from the flat. By using the ferry, you will both have the chance to see the great Bosphorus view and go to the very center of the old city (Golden Horn) where you will find the Grand Bazaar, famous Galata tower, the palaces and mosques. You can also go to Taksim, Beyoglu street, which is the living center of the European side. (Alternatively, you also have the chance to take the mini buses that work 24 hours from Kadikoy to Taksim Square.) In the Asian side of the city, you can go to the beautiful Prince Islands and the Maiden Tower by the ferry as well.
access: the flat is all yours but the balcony is shared with the next flat.
interaction: I live around so if you have any problem i can help you.

name: Lovely room in Born
summary: Habitación individual en un piso nuevo. Estamos justo enfrente del mercado Santa Caterina, en el corazón de la ciudad, en El Barrio Born junto con El Barrio Gótico. Una de las zonas más hermosas y famosas de Barcelona. El agradable barrio está delimitado por las Ramblas, Vía Laietana, la plaza Cataluña u paseo de Gracia. Playa 15 min caminando. El piso es muy tranquilo pero cuando salgas a la calle estarás en pleno centro de la ciudad con bares, restaurantes y supermercados.

host.host_about: Burgaz adada eski tarihi bir köşkte yaşıyorum sanatçıyım yeni insanları adada evimde misafir edip adanın güzelliğini sessizliğini doğasını ve denizini tanıtmak istiyorum beklerim efendim

reviews.comments: Konukseverlik ve güzel manzara var,  fakat ev eski ve biraz daha özenli restore edilebilir. Teşekkürler

Acaba doğru karar mi verdim dediğim tatilim, ev sahibi Selçuk ablanın konuk severliği, cana yakınlığıyla, güzel muhabbetiyle harika geçti.
Çok teşekkür ederim abla iyiki tanıdım seni:)
Nice people:)
Ortam ve yatak örtüleri  temiz değildi, eski ve bakımsız bir ortam, manzara tarafındaki odada banyo yok banyo olan oda penceresiz ve kasvetliydi. Rahat etmedim.

Selçuk hanım gerçekten çok düşünceli bir insan ve bize çok yardımcı oldu. Geç saatte geldiğimizde su alamadığımızı tahmin edip bize su ikram etti, kendi terasında kahvaltı yapmayı önerdi ve adada gideceğimiz yerleri bulmamıza yardımcı oldu. Yerin konumu da iskeleye çok yakın yani 5 dakika bile olmadığından geliş ve gidişlerde çok rahattı. Sadece sokak akşamları karanlık oluyor ancak telefonun ışığıyla halledilemeyecek bir şey değil

host.host_about: Hi ! I’m a photographer from Montreal who loves to travel and meeting new people from around the globe ! My appartement is located in an artsy neighborhood and it’s all furnished and calm .

reviews.comments: My experience in Satya’s appartement was wonderful. I felt like my own home. Everything was clean, beautiful and comfortable. My recommendation is 100% effective.
Great place. She was super friendly. Easy to find. Good location. Nice room with little balcony.

The room lets in a lot of light and air, which was a relief from the heat and humidity outside during my stay. The apartment is rustic, cozy, and full of art. It reminds me of my grandma's old home, in a good way. The neighbourhood is low-key and cool, and a short walk away from a lot of fantastic establishments (try out Falafel Yoni). I only had two brief interactions with Satya, and she was cordial and helpful in both.
It is on the third floor for older people who might want to stay there.  Very quiet neighborhood.

We enjoyed our stay at the apartment. We didn't get to meet our host but she was available via messages. The apartment is located in a great area with great eateries and convenient transportation. It's not downtown but it was much better for us. There were amazing vegetarian options nearby, and the bakeries were sublime.
Satya's place is so cute! There is a little porch connected to the room that we used every morning.  She was very nice and accommodating and my sister and I enjoyed our stay. Thank you!
The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Modern vintage and Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment
summary: Situé au dernier étages cet appartement est moderne, et impeccablement entretenu. La rue Sainte-Catherine se trouve tout juste au nord. Cet emplacement unique vous permet de profiter des boutiques, cafés, restaurants et boîtes de nuit se trouvant à 5 minutes de marche sur ces trois rues mythiques de Montréal. Pour ceux qui utilisent le transport en commun, les stations de métro Champ-de-Mars et Berri-UQAM sont à 3 min de marche.

summary: Golf Villa C-5; Mauna Lani Resort Two story villa on the golf course

The villa is two stories, on the corner with privacy and a great view of Mauna Kea and a perfect view of the golf course right on the bottom floor lanai. 3 bedroom, 3 bathrooms, full kitchen, dining and living area. Smart TV`s in the bedrooms with Wi Fi, Full computer and printer and have fun playing foosball in the upstairs loft!   Home is in  paradise, enjoy our villa as your next memorable vacation in Hawaii.

name: Luxury Chelsea Townhouse at the High Line
space: Why stay in an over priced hotel room that is way to smalll when you can stay in a private spacious sanctuary. Located in Chelsea situated in the historic Fitzroy Townhouse complex. Located in one of  the most in demand areas in New York this charming townhouse is 1/2 block from the highline entrance. From the moment you enter the parlor level you are struck with a breathtaking view of the true centerpiece of this extraordinary home - a two level 43' X  25' lush south facing garden with spectacular mature trees, bushes, and plantings - you are immediatly transported from city to the country in this extremly quiet and serene sanctuary. You can sip cocktails or coffee just on the other side of the slidding glass doors in the private garden.  The home feels like a five star botique hotel, it's interiors are 20th century Modern Design. The living room with it's double height 17' ceiling gives the feeling of loft living as abundant light streams in thru two stories of south facing windows.

house_rules: Conscious, Considerate and Compassionate guests No pets  No smoking  No children under 10 (due to stairs and upstairs railing) One cleaning for up to four days $100 Two mandatory cleanings for five day stay $200 Three mandatory cleaning for seven day stay $300 Cleanings done by house keeper in the employ of owner for 20 years Copy of ID's prior to check in No loud parties at all No friends or guests over night Quiet comings and goings No loud music Consideration of neighbors  No loud gatherings or music in the garden

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I own a Branding & Advertising Business. Currently live in New York and love Urban & Organic Farming.

reviews.comments:
This is a beautiful apartment creating an oasis of calm in the heart of busy Manhattan. We had all the facilities that we needed and many more that made our stay enjoyable and comfortable. The apartment is decorated with an eclectic mix of contemporary pieces and there are creative touches everywhere. The main bathroom in particular is stunning with a huge Hollywood style mirror and the deepest bath we have ever seen. 

The locality is full of a wide range of restaurants and coffee shops including Joe's which should not be missed. Chelsea market is a short walk away and 5th avenue is even closer. 

It is worth mentioning that the owner is also tremendously helpful. She was always quick in recommending places to visit and eat and made our stay extremely stress free.

Everything about this place was perfect! I could not recommend it highly enough and the owner was very responsive and considerate. I had a wonderful stay here and liked it so much I wouldn’t want to stay anywhere else in New York!
This home is exactly as described and pictured - and so much more!

name: Designer Flat in East village
summary: Ideal location in Manhattan- behind the Bowery hotel, 10mn walk from Soho and nearby subway & great restaurants. 1930's authentic building with elevator- Uncluttered 2bdr with designer furniture, large kitchen, and office space/2nd bedroom. Sleep 3.
space: Uncluttered, tasteful and comfortable in the best location of New York city- 4th floor with view on a quiet street and typical Ny buildings.
description: Ideal location in Manhattan- behind the Bowery hotel, 10mn walk from Soho and nearby subway & great restaurants. 1930's authentic building with elevator- Uncluttered 2bdr with designer furniture, large kitchen, and office space/2nd bedroom. Sleep 3. Uncluttered, tasteful and comfortable in the best location of New York city- 4th floor with view on a quiet street and typical Ny buildings. High end furniture, TV in bedroom, ALL PREMIUM CHANELS, High speed internet, office space with printer... Metro a proximity We accept max 3 people from now on- for your highest comfort experience. Please not the 2nd bedroom has a couch that transforms into a bed with a mattress topper. It is not the same comfort as a bed...

host.host_about: We leave in Venice California, French and Italian couple working together - co-owner of a fashion consulting company- esthete and art lover, we spend a lot of time decorating our homes in LA, Ny and Paris...

reviews.comments:
Melanie is a really nice person. She helped us with everything we needed even if she wasn't in the city.
The apartment is big and really nice, location is super.
only 2 cons, sofas are good looking but really uncomfortable and some old and stinky food left in the fridge probably from previous hosts.
I definitely come back to Melanie's apt next time I will be in NYC!!

We had a wonderful stay, the apartment has everything you need & was very comfortable, for 2 girls travelling it was wonderful to have 2 bedrooms. The apartment was clean and neat and easy to find & access and very safe/secure. Melanie was always quick to respond if we had a question and very kind and obliging. The highlight for us was the location. The East Village is a crazy mix of people night and day, tons if personality and character. There are so many restaurants & bars to choose from. Additionally we were able to walk to many parts if NYC easily and the subway was also nearby & easy to access.
As described! Great location, close to the subway. Large rooms in an interesting old apartment building. Melanie was very responsive at all times.

Melanie was very helpful and quick to respond whenever we had questions.  The apartment was exactly as described and was very comfortable. The building was lovely and the neighborhood offers great food and amenity. Subway close by and everything within walking distance. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the east village.  
Thanks Melanie

My friend and I felt at home at this apartment. The apartment is beautiful, very well-equipped, clean, and in an excellent location. It is accurately represented in the pictures.  I did not meet Melanie in person but we were in contact via sms.  She was responsive and gave us all the practical information we needed for our stay. A good and reliable host. I needed to stay a few extra hours after the official checkout and, even if I could not stay until the time I wished, she tried to accommodate my request.  

The East Village area where the apartment is located is full of small restaurants, bars, cafes, shops etc.  It is great for anyone who likes going out.  On the downside, it can be a little noisy so perhaps not ideal for someone who prefers a quiet area.

Cool apartment with old-world charm, sparsely decorated with eclectic style. Melanie was very helpful ~ questions and issues that arose were addressed promptly and efficiently via text or email. All in all a great experience.

Melanie is a great host !!
Apartment is great and too comfortable for 3 person.
neighborhood is too close of a lot of hot spots (non tourist)
Small problems with the keys that doesn't bring serious problems
Stay there !!

The apartment was very well located near to lots of restaurants and bars as well as a short walk to great shops. The space was clean and comfortable with everything you needed for a good stay in New York. Melanie was responsive to queries and was very accommodating allowing us to leave our bags at the apartment until our evening flight.

Awesome place!  

Pros:
- Great place. Spacious and clean.
- Amazing location, there is ton of stuff all around the building.  Was super fun to explore the area. If you like walking, you can walk to many places from there – Greenwich Village, SOHO, Chinatown, Little Italy, Union Square, etc.  Subways stations are close.
- Melanie was an attentive and accommodating host.  Even though she was overseas would check in to make sure things were going well.

Cons
- Can be noisy at night, particularly on the weekend.  People in NY like to honk and yell it seems.
- The apartment is well maintained but It’s an older building. The floors are squeaky in some places so could hear the people above walking around sometimes and we tried not to stomp around too much especially at night.
- The chairs in the living room are a bit uncomfortable.
- For people mostly interested in things around the more touristy areas like Times Square the location is probably not so convenient.

Loved the place and the location and would stay there again.

Apartment looks exactly like the photos. Very clean and useful. Both rooms are big. Great light. Comfortable building with elevator. Great value in the area. Melanie was very responsive and very easy to deal with.

Melanie's and Marco's apartment in the East Village is perfect for people who want to stay in a more organic and less gentrified area of NYC but still be close to all the tourist and non-tourist attractions that Manhattan has to offer. 

The accommodation  is on one of the main avenues and located on the fourth (third for UK folk) floor of an attractive older block served with a lift, giving it a genuine NYC apartment feel; it is clean, airy, well lit and beautifully furnished with relatively spacious rooms, making it a great place to hang out between venturing outside. Just as the hosts describe, the apartment can at most accommodate two willing to share a double bed with additional 'one and a half' bedding in a separate room.

The area is abundant in many non-chain restaurants and bars for travellers that do not want to venture too far from their accommodation in the evenings; Katz's Deli is definitely one to add to the list!

As other reviewers have pointed out, the area can be a bit noisy especially on the weekend evenings, but if you were hoping for a quiet and relaxed vacation, why choose beautifully manic NYC at all?

Melanie was not around but kept in touch by email/airbnb and assisted as best she could at all times, leaving the numbers of her housekeepers who greeted us when we arrived and who we could contact should we have needed anything which we didn't.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Three of us thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Melanie's place. It was clean, well provisioned and larger than the photos suggest. I slept comfortably on the bed set up with full linens in the office space. Melanie was more than gracious in her communications and was really really prompt when responding to questions. East Village is a great location with plenty of culture. Our favorite restaurant in the neighborhood was Il Buco, an Italian place that we dined in on our first and last nights stay. All in all a very positive experience that I would love to repeat. Thank you Melanie!

My husband and I had an amazing stay at Melanie's apartment. It is super spacious, in a great old NY building that is in a wonderful location. The apartment had everything we needed to feel like home - including an incredibly comfortable bed and plenty of closet and drawer space! Close to the subway, Wholefoods and surrounded by loads of great cafes, bars and restaurants. Melanie was a fabulous host. Quick to respond, easy to communicate with, very friendly and welcoming!  Highly recommended!

We had a great time staying at Melanie's apartment. It is in a perfect location - we love the East Village. The apartment is beautifully furnished and well equipped. Natalia greeted us with the keys as planned and was very friendly. We would highly recommend staying here. The only negative of the location is that it is quite noisy but you expect some noise in NYC!

Melanie was a very gracious host, easy to communicate with, and provided an abundance of local tips for the best of the best in her neighborhood, which is arguably one of if not the best neighbourhood in Manhattan if you want easy access to the best nightlife and access to the city's main attractions.  I would be thrilled to stay here again. Thanks Melanie!

Mélanie repond très vite aux mails et nous aide à préparer notre voyage et elle parle français! 
L'appartement est très confortable et bien situé. Proche du métro avec des commerces à proximité. 
Quartier branché, ne convient pas à une famille avec des enfants en bas âge.
Nous vous recommandons cet appartement !!!

Amazing location!! Nice apartment!
:)

Melanie was a great host - very easy to communicate with. The apartment is in a great location, in a fun and vibrant part of East Village, but quiet because it’s at the back of the building. It’s nicely designed inside and has everything you’ll need.
Melanie's place is much more spacious than I expected .  The windows open.  The building was quiet . I felt comfortable and safe.

name: PLATEAU-Mt-Royal METRO- Nice backyard/Jardin
summary: Small charming bedroom in a very nice apartment of typical Montreal architectural style! Best location in the city- very centrally located. Close to cafés, restaurants, parks, swimming pools, tennis courts, boutiques.. Steps away from Mont-Royal metro station, buses, bike rental. Super convenient to go anywhere around town! The apartment itself is on a small quiet charming street and has a nice backyard. WIFI, Washing machine, Dryer, Towels, Hairdryer... everything you need!
description: Small charming bedroom in a very nice apartment of typical Montreal architectural style! Best location in the city- very centrally located. Close to cafés, restaurants, parks, swimming pools, tennis courts, boutiques.. Steps away from Mont-Royal metro station, buses, bike rental. Super convenient to go anywhere around town! The apartment itself is on a small quiet charming street and has a nice backyard. WIFI, Washing machine, Dryer, Towels, Hairdryer... everything you need!

reviews.comments:
Magali was an awesome host. She gave great tips on restaurants and events that were happening all around the city. She really went above and beyond even tailoring additional info for the event we were in town for (Formula One Race). The check-in was super easy and she was quick to respond during our visit. She also gave accurate and thorough information about the space and its amenities. 

The space was comfortable and exactly what we needed since we were spending most of our days out in the city. Her garden in the back is very charming and so is the space. It feels like spending time in a friend's home. We will absolutely be back next time we are in Montreal. 

The location also can not be beaten. Everything you need is a walk away and the train is a half block away making it a great starting point for visiting everywhere in Montreal. The area is very hip reminded us a lot of our neighborhood in Brooklyn. Bars, great food, and cafes.

We spent a lovely stay in the Magali's housing. The flat is quite big, and have a little cute patio, where we can have a seat under the sun. Magali gave us a lot of useful informations about the things to know around the flat, but also more global informations about Montreal; it was very helpful for us. We really recommend that flat, which is very well located, from just a few subway stations from the downtown.

An amazing host,  and a nice and cozy bedroom. The location is the best you can get in Montreal. Le Plateau is a fantastic neighborhood, with parks and plenty of small cafés and restaurants on Mont-Royal avenue. Also the metro is less than 1 minute away,  in 10 minutes you're downtown. Great airbnb experience! I will definitely come back.

A green and sunny and quiet backyard steps away from lively Mont-Royal avenue, cafes, restaurants, bookshops, public transports… That was awesome! Magali is the best host ever: very helpful and she’s offering incredible tips about the area. Great value, highly recommended!

This place is awesome. Quick response from host to every questions and more tips and advices on local visits. Great roomates and a very interesting stay overall. I would recommend this stay without hesitation.

We enjoyed our stay at Magali’s place. It’s conveniently located right next to the metro and there are so many nearby restaurants and bars. Magali was awesome at keeping in touch and letting us know about things to do in the area. Will definitely visit again :)

name: Fun & Games in Potts Point
summary: This apartment is in the perfect location for anyone looking to get the most out of Sydney. Everything that you need including transport, food, shopping and entertainment is within easy WALKING distance of the apartment.  The apartment is stylishly fitted out with a comfy Queen size bed, large couch & TV, fully equipped Kitchen etc.  We have a lock box for after hours check ins for your convenience.
space: This executive studio apartment is situated on the second floor of the well known “Regents Court” boutique hotel in the heart of Potts Point, prime location for quality dining and direct access to the city. Modern fit out including kitchen/dining, bedroom and separate bathroom with full size shower, the apartment has a scene of sophisticated charm.  Sit back and unwind in the Livingroom in front of the 49inch flat screen. Or sink into the couch, kick your feet up and enjoy getting lost in your favorite literature.  The kitchen is well-equipped with everything you need to put together that fantastic home cooked meal, if the local cuisine hasn’t persuaded you to dine out. Fitted out with an electric stove, cooking utensils, kettle, fridge/freezer, toaster, and basic pantry supplies. We all enjoy and great night’s sleep so I can assure you, the bed is fantastic. A comfortable Queen size bed is fitted with hotel quality linen you can sink into, professionally laundered after every stay. If
