The kitchen is well-equipped with everything you need to put together that f
neighborhood_overview: Potts Point is in my opinion the prime location for a traveller. Firstly it's walking distance to pretty much anything you need. The Sydney CBD is a 10 minute walk away through the beautiful Hyde park. The Opera house, Mrs Macquaries chair and the Botanical gardens are 10 mins away. Party destination such as Oxford St and Kings Cross are a 5 min walk away. And world famous Bondi beach is a 20 minute bus ride. Local Eating. The local area is home to some of Darlinghurst’s best cafes and restaurants. Zushi on Victoria Street is great Japanese for either lunch or dinner. Casoni is located in Taylor Square and just a short stroll away for Italian. Bills is just down the road on Liverpool Street and is a local institution for both coffee and breakfast/lunch. If you are up for a short walk, Potts Point is a 10 minute stroll down Darlinghurst Road. Here you will find some of the city’s best restaruants including Apollo for Greek, Cho Cho San for Japanese, Billy Kwong for modern Chinese, Frate
notes: Please take note that our cleaning fee includes professional cleaning after each guest along with the restocking of essentials such as toilet paper, soap, conditioner etc. The sheets and towels that we use are high quality hotel standard linens which is guaranteed to be clean, fresh and pressed. If you have any problems with the cleanliness of the house when you arrive please let us know AS SOON AS YOU ARRIVE so that we can send the cleaners back to complete the job.
transit: As mentioned most of the things you need are WALKING distance, Sydney harbour, the CBD, Surry hills, Kings Cross, Museums, Library, Pubs, Clubs, Restaurants, Cafes. As mentioned I lived here for 5 years and never had a car, it's perfect. If you want to take the ferry to Manly or the Zoo circular quay is walking distance as well.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment which is directly accessible from: Springfeild Ave, Potts Point. This apartment is a non-smoking, so if needed please step outside. This is a relaxed and peaceful neighbourhood so we ask you to respect the environment in such a manner while enjoying your stay.  Key collection has been made easy, as I use a lockbox system. This allows you to come and go on your own time. Once you have confirmed the booking I will send you through the details on how to find and operate the lockbox. And if you would prefer me to meet you at the property for checkin this can be arranged.
interaction: I live 15min away in Newtown, so if anything comes up during your stay I am more than happy to help. Once the booking is confirmed I will send you through my mobile number, if needed you can contact me at any time during your stay.
house_rules: - No loud noise after 10pm - No parties

host.host_about:
Hey
I'm Johannes, from Sydney.

I'm an easy going guy that works hard and play hard. Lived in Sydney most of my life, so I know the area pretty well. I enjoy meeting new people, and hearing their travel stories. In my free time I enjoy indoor rock climbing  or taking the bike out for a ride.
Looking forward to meeting you.

reviews.comments: Super great location, very close to a range of great restaurants and bars. The apartment is quiet and old worldly but with character and modern comforts. It was the perfect combination of peace and privacy in amongst a bustling area with great nightlife
Great place

From apartment to King cross station only 5mins very close. 
3mins have a supermarket.good. 
Room so clean.  Nice Johannes

L’appartement est très bien situé, un peu petit mais convient très bien pour 2 personne. Il est propre.
Johannes répond rapidement aux questions

The apartment is close to some nice restaurants and about 30 mins walk from many main attractions. Very easy to access from the train station. 

Johannes is quick to respond to questions. 

I would recommend his place to travelers who wish to see Sydney but not stay in the busy central city.

Nice spot at a great location. Supermarket and 24h food kiosks just round the corner, and the train station is just minutes away on foot. However, might not be suitable for younger travellers as it is within the red light district of Sydney with plenty of strip clubs around. That said, it is a safe gated building which never left us any worries.
Great spot! Johannes is prompt with his responses, and made sure my stay was pleasant. The proximity to nearby shops and restaurants, and the short walk to Kings Cross station from here are ideal.
Great location but expensive for what is a tired granny flat.
Great spot!
Great apartment in a perfect location
We had a great stay, such a great location! Johannes was very helpful and a wonderful host.
Great location, good sized flat & very good host offering clear instructions & help. Would stay again

In the middle of Potts Point, a central spot for backpackers. The area apparently used to be much more lively before Sydney’s lockout laws. There are a few nice places close by. I especially recommend the ramen shop that you can see out the kitchen window to the right in the alleyway.

As for the apartment it has everything you need, like towels, shampoo, and a kitchen (not that you’re gonna cook and eat at home!). It’s a clean space to rest after exploring the city.
Perfect visit great experience
Perfect location, good value, safe, everything you need.
A great place to stay!
Fantastic location. Nice old building - the lift took me back. Apartment was as described - also very well stocked. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Potts Point.
A great apartment in a great location, there were no problems with anything at all, definitely recommend.

They were awesome and the room also awesome.
I recommend it.

name: OCEANFRONT*Deluxe Ocean View Sugar Beach Condo
summary: Feast your eyes on this tranquil beauty! With an amazing full-on ocean view and partial mountain view, you will love this condo! Your nicely tiled lanai is overlooking the sparkling complex pool. The living area is fresh, open and with a bright and inviting, fully stocked kitchen.
space: This oceanfront property also has stunning views of Haleakala and Upcountry Maui from your own private lanai.  There are flat screen TVs in the bedroom and living room and air conditioning in the living room as well. A marvelous glass block shower well entice you to get gleaming clean for your next adventure!  Gas barbecues with picnic tables are available for your use at the complex.   Sink your toes into the soft sand on the beach below.   Take a stroll to Sugar Beach, the longest stretch of white sandy beach in Hawaii.   The magnificent Maui sunsets will take your breath away!  You will embrace Maalaea Bay, where humpback whales come to have their babies and play from December through April.   ** A one time $35 resort fee is due at the time of booking.
description: Feast your eyes on this tranquil beauty! With an amazing full-on ocean view and partial mountain view, you will love this condo! Your nicely tiled lanai is overlooking the sparkling complex pool. The living area is fresh, open and with a bright and inviting, fully stocked kitchen. This oceanfront property also has stunning views of Haleakala and Upcountry Maui from your own private lanai.  There are flat screen TVs in the bedroom and living room and air conditioning in the living room as well. A marvelous glass block shower well entice you to get gleaming clean for your next adventure!  Gas barbecues with picnic tables are available for your use at the complex.   Sink your toes into the soft sand on the beach below.   Take a stroll to Sugar Beach, the longest stretch of white sandy beach in Hawaii.   The magnificent Maui sunsets will take your breath away!  You will embrace Maalaea Bay, where humpback whales come to have their babies and play from December through April.   ** A one tim
neighborhood_overview: This complex is located right in the Maalaea harbor where you can walk to an amazing surf break, beaches including the longest walking beach on Maui called Sugar Beach, restaurants, the Maui Ocean Center aquarium, Beach Bums beach bar, and it is where all of the whale watching and snorkeling boats leave from as well.  Centrally located you can drive to anywhere on the island quickly as well when you plan your island activities nothing is that far away from Lahaina to Iao Valley to the resorts of Wailea.
access: This is a fantastic unit, and a newer addition to our rental pool! If you are looking to read reviews about us and how we cater to our guests, please click on my profile picture. There you will be able to view hundreds of positive reviews since I started hosting on Airbnb.
interaction: Our team is always available to be reached via email or phone. We have a Housekeeper on call; additional cleaning could be arranged at a fee, generally our long stay guests take advantage of this service. Our Maintenance crew is on call and can assist at any time. Check-in and Check-out are very simple. We send you a pre-arrival email that has all necessary information on how to get to the condo, how to access the unit and pool area, etc. We recommend you print the email prior to the trip or saving it on your smart phone to easily access it when you arrive at the complex. A private Concierge is always standing by to help with any activity bookings, island recommendations and restaurant reservations.  ROOM AMENITIES: Smoke-free environment, A/C, Free WiFi, Fully equipped kitchen (cooking range/oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, blender, coffee maker, dishes, and silverware), Cable television, DVD/CD player, Ceiling fan, Private lanai, Iron and ironing board, Additional linens an

host.host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

reviews.comments: This is a well appointed, clean and stylish condo.  Everything is new and fresh and it's a quiet location.  We thought it was a bit closer to town where we could walk to more things, but the building and the view are great. The condo and lanai offer great privacy and you really can relax.  The host provides vacation necessaries such as a cooler, beach chairs, beach towels and such.  There are fans in every room to keep cool and plenty of island breezes.  This is a great condo and we highly recommend it.  The swimmable beach is approximately 5 minutes walk down the street. In front of the condo there were lots of turtles and a tiny inlet sand area where you can sit to watch them and look at the ocean view.  It's very peaceful and relaxing.  You have a reserved parking space in the lot which is also a plus.  This is a good place!
Amazing, beautiful place. Had a great time

Great place to stay for a couple right at the ocean with literally 20secs walk and easy access to any other place in Maui. Right in the middle of all attractions and great beaches.  Viktoria was very responsive

Great place, highly recommended! The location is amazing in between Lahaina and Wailea. The view from living room is amazing! Viktoria is very responsive and shared tips for each day while we were at Maui. One tip for improvement may be add privacy curtain in the living room overlooking lanai
Great place! Great location! Great communication!

The place is very nice.  It is a little further away from shopping, grocery stores and other amenities then we realized but everything is a relatively short drive away.  It was really good for accessing all parts of Maui.  We chose this location so that we could check out beaches in both Lahaina and Wailea and it worked very well for that.  The AC unit is in the living room and it doesn't serve the back bedroom very well so it was pretty warm in there and we ended up sleeping on the pull out couch in the living room, which was pretty comfortable.  The host company was really great and brought us an extra fan when we requested it and was in general very responsive and helpfull.

Viktoria’s place was just as described. A very central location and all the amenities we needed, including beach gear ( chairs, umbrella, cooler & beach towels). 
We visited in late September and the heat index was over 100 degrees every day. With these conditions the small AC unit in the living wasn’t strong enough to cool the bedroom & bathroom. There are plenty of fans provided, but still just a bit too warm for our comfort. Other than that inconvenience the condo was great and a good location for heading out in any direction to explore the Island.
Viktoria has excellent and quick communication.

I stayed at this condo for 4 nights and it was perfect. The views were second to none and situated nicely near the harbor, highway and Kihei. The condo itself was very clean, up to date, fully stocked kitchen and linens. There is also a pull out bed if you want to wake up to the beautiful views as well as get the nice sea breeze if you leave the sliding door to the lanai open. Viktoria and her staff were very helpful with vast amounts of information on things to do, see and eat in Maui. They were prompt to answer any questions and made every effort to make sure the stay was very enjoyable. I highly recommend this condo!
Clean overall

(Nov 2018) Excellent choice.  We had time for only  a short stay (three nights) on this, our first trip to Maui, so we were looking for an oceanfront place in a central location,  with great views from lanai/balcony.   We didn’t  want to stay in an expensive resort since we intended to spend our days sightseeing around the island, not hanging out on the property. 

This place fit the bill perfectly.   It’s a
1br/1ba unit perfect for a couple, possibly with a youngster on the couch.  Spotlessly clean, not new but recently refurbished.  Right on the water with a good size lanai for dining/morning coffee.  Great view. Two AC units although we didn’t need to use them.  Excellent host provided all the info needed plus sightseeing tips. Check-in couldn’t have been easier.  The complex is equally well kept and managed.  Very quiet. No complaints at all.   

Walk just a few blocks to the harbor for whale watching and tour cruises. Walk a few blocks in the other direction to reach Sugar Beach 
Bonus—-the property’s own small “pocket” beach had anywhere from 4 to 12 sea turtles  hanging around within 10 yds of shore every time we looked.

Love the place, the location and the host! Victoria is very thoughtful and helpful with all the travel tips l/guides she gives before and during our stay... the place is sparkling clean and filled with all travel needs!

Viktoria’s condo was the perfect place for my daughter’s and my first trip to Maui.  It’s a light, airy place with a killer view of the water.  The swimming pool is heated (nice for our winter trip), and the other people in the condo building were friendly and welcoming - the aloha spirit!

While you do need to drive a bit to get to stores, it’s in a perfect location for activities.  We were able to just walk down the street for our Trilogy Molokini snorkel boat slip. And there is a lovely beach just down the street the other way   that is great for sunset viewing, paddle-boarding, and snorkeling.  

Mahalo Viktoria, for all the information you sent us and your speedy communication - you are a fantastic host!

A small walk to the beach but an amazing beach!!! Prepare for being in the flight path, a bummer at night because all windows had to be closed due to noise. Easy to walk to marina and a few good restaurants available. You can't see the sunset but fun to chase it around the island!
GREAT SPOT. Easy in and out :)

Fantastic place, very conveniently located for exploring the island. Beach chairs, beach umbrella and cooler were provided in the unit which were great to take down to the beach at Haycraft Park which is in walking distance.

Viktoria's place was a great base for our adventures around Maui.  Everything about the condo was clean and fresh.  The kitchen was well stocked with cooking utensils, pots and pans, dishes, glasses, oil, and basic spices.  Beach chairs, an umbrella, a cooler, and beach towels were a welcome perk.  The view from the balcony provided great whale watching space and plenty of room to dine al fresco.  We throughly enjoyed our vacation here!

name: Olympic Games
summary: Barra da Tijuca is a beach neighborhood full of entertainement. Our place is located in one particular condo surrounded by green parks and a lagoon were you can experience the unique carioca way of life.
space: - There is air conditioning, tv and black-out in all the rooms of the house. - The house is in a very safety condo - Peninsula Barra. - Complete leisure area with swiming pool, saunas, green parks and bicycle path, - It's near restaurants, bars, pubs, drugstores, markets, parks, bakeries, etc. -  It is also near to great shopping centers such as Barra Shopping (15 min. walk) and Via Parque Shopping (10 min. walk). - We are near the brt  station "via park" and there are also two bus lines in front of the condo,  one  goes to the airport and the other one goes to downtown.
description: Barra da Tijuca is a beach neighborhood full of entertainement. Our place is located in one particular condo surrounded by green parks and a lagoon were you can experience the unique carioca way of life.  - There is air conditioning, tv and black-out in all the rooms of the house. - The house is in a very safety condo - Peninsula Barra. - Complete leisure area with swiming pool, saunas, green parks and bicycle path, - It's near restaurants, bars, pubs, drugstores, markets, parks, bakeries, etc. -  It is also near to great shopping centers such as Barra Shopping (15 min. walk) and Via Parque Shopping (10 min. walk). - We are near the brt  station "via park" and there are also two bus lines in front of the condo,  one  goes to the airport and the other one goes to downtown.  The hostess speak english and french. The condo has a eco style and green parks. Its adorable to walk around and feel the nature. - We are near the brt  station "via park" and there are also two bus lines in front of
neighborhood_overview: The condo has a eco style and green parks. Its adorable to walk around and feel the nature.
notes: We have someone to keep the house clean once a week.  There is is a clothes line in the bedroom balcony so that you can keep your towels dried.
transit: - We are near the brt  station "via park" and there are also two bus lines in front of the condo,  one  goes to the airport and the other one goes to downtown.
interaction: The hostess speak english and french.

host.host_about:
Hi! 
We are a Brazilian couple, living in Barra da Tijuca. 
We both enjoy travelling and getting to know other cultures
We hope you enjoy being our guest and the experience of visiting the Wonderfull City!

reviews.comments: Apartamento gostoso e bonito. Delícia a rede na varanda. Proprietários simpáticos e atenciosos. Adoramos a estada. Condomínio com boa conveniência

name: House General Torres
summary: Totally refurbished penthouse apartment with elevator and private parking spot in the buildings garage. Located in the historic center of Vila Nova de Gaia with amazing views over the Oporto city and the beautiful Luis I bridge. Being very near to a lot of  places of interest, everything is in walking distance, namely all the famous port wine cellars. The Douro river is only one minute away and so are the typical restaurants along the river margins.
space: Cosy, welcoming, wide spaced and modern. Air conditioning throughout the apartment, free internet, 55 inches flat screen with cable tv, wide sofa and a balcony overlooking the Luis I bridge and some historic landmarks. The kitchen is totally remodelled and has all the necessary appliances like: Coffee machine, tea kettle, microwave oven, traditional oven, dish washer, toaster and various others. There are towels available for all guests, as well as shampoo and hair dryer. From the sleeping quarters you can also enjoy the breathtaking views over the Douro River. The beds are generous in size and confort. The metro station of General Torres is in 5 minutes of walking distance.
description: Totally refurbished penthouse apartment with elevator and private parking spot in the buildings garage. Located in the historic center of Vila Nova de Gaia with amazing views over the Oporto city and the beautiful Luis I bridge. Being very near to a lot of  places of interest, everything is in walking distance, namely all the famous port wine cellars. The Douro river is only one minute away and so are the typical restaurants along the river margins. Cosy, welcoming, wide spaced and modern. Air conditioning throughout the apartment, free internet, 55 inches flat screen with cable tv, wide sofa and a balcony overlooking the Luis I bridge and some historic landmarks. There are towels available for all guests, as well as shampoo and hair dryer. From the sleeping quarters you can also enjoy the breathtaking views
neighborhood_overview: Panoramic views, tourist site.
transit: The metro station of General Torres is in 5 minutes of walking distance.
access: You can access all the areas of the apartment.
interaction: I tend to leave my guest at their will and give them the privacy they need, but I am always available to help whenever needed.
house_rules: - Horário de silêncio 22 horas

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments: Casa reformada, preciosa y muy bien ubicada. Vistas espectaculares a Oporto y al río. Pedro muy atento. Responde muy rápidamente a cualquier duda que surja. Cuida mucho los detalles. Totalmente recomendable.
Overall a great place to stay for a visit to Porto or to the Douro winneries. Very friendly host and new and stylish place.

L'appartement tout neuf, tout propre et au calme est idéalement situé. 
Les 2 chambres sont très confortables et ont vue sur Porto. L'équipement de la salle de bain et de la cuisine est au top. Les + sont la petite terrasse, la climatisation et la place de parking ! 
Bref, adresse à recommander sans hésitation. Nous avons passé un superbe séjour, merci à Pedro pour son accueil !

What a brilliant apartment! Amazing views from every window, comfortable, spacious and larger than we thought. Perfect for our family of 4 to explore central Porto, all right on the doorstep. Pedro was a brilliant host and made everything really easy. Cannot recommend highly enough!

Self check-in/out worked perfect and provides you all flexibility. Great location at Nice area (Riverside and bridge) of the city and 20’ to airport. Communication was good. Parking place is a bit narrow but for our car no problem. Recommended.
Un très bel appartement moderne, belle deco contemporaine, avec une vue splendide sur Porto. Rapport qualité prix impeccable.

Très bon logement, propre, lumineux et moderne. 
Tres bien situé à quelques pas du pont Don Luis. 
Pedro est très réactif à toutes les questions que l’on peut se poser. 
Séjour très satisfaisant que l’on recommande sans hésiter.

Apartamento muy bien ubicado y con una decoración exquisita. Nada a ver con el aspecto exterior de la casa. Además tiene aire acondicionado. Lástima de poder haber estado en él un solo dia. Bien ubicado. Totalmente recomendable.

Ubicación inmejorable, vistas increíbles desde cualquier estancia, zona tranquila, apartamento silencioso, aire acondicionado en todo el apartamento. Cada estancia tiene su encanto y está decorado con mucho gusto y estilo. El garaje está muy bien, pero es un poco complicado maniobrar dentro. 
  El anfitrión, muy atento tanto en la respuesta a nuestras dudas, instrucciones de llegada como en los detalles de bienvenida. Repetiremos
Amazing property, in the best location with a good host. 10/10
inmejorables vistas y prestaciones, comunicación rapida y ubicación genial!

Loved the apartment, as did the kids. Great location just across the river from Porto itself. Self check-in was super easy and a must as we arrived late. Great views of the river from bedroom side. Parking space was really useful for us, but make sure your car’s not too big, could be a bit tight getting in / out. Netflix Tv, good wifi and air conditioning were all definitely a plus too.

Très belle appartement, bien entrenue et bien aménagé avec tout ce qu'il faut comme ustensiles et appareils électroménagers . L'aspect extérieur et intérieur du bâtiment laisse à  désirer, mais une fois passer la porte de l'appartement on oubli tout. Il est parfaitement decris , comme  sur les photos. Pedro est très réactif, le garage est un vrai plus .

El apartamento de Pedro es genial!!!! Daba la sensación de que lo estrenábamos nosotros, está todo en perfecto estado. La decoración me ha encantado y la comunicación con Pedro buenísima. Además está en la zona turística, es perfecto!!!!

Квартира превзошла все ожидания - отличный вид, идеальная чистота и стильный интерьер. Особое внимание к деталям - есть даже аптечка и капсулы для кофемашины.

Так же есть парковка в доме, но на длинной машине проехать к месту не удалось. Но это не проблема - в 80 метрах платный паркинг за 15 евро в сутки.
Amazing space. The location has a stunning view, apartment was close to everything and was sparkling clean. The view overlooking the river and bridge was breathtaking.

Pedro really deserves Superhost status, the apartment is beautiful and a little problem that we had, was solved withing 10 minutes. Host also was understanding when we were little late for check out :)  5 stars!
Totalmente recomendable.
Excelente apartamento, confortável e bem decorado! Localização perfeita! O anfitrião foi muito eficiente no check in / out e muito disponível. Recomendo!
Very nice place and very easy to check in and check out.

Perfect location, with magnificent views. The car parking can be a little tight!
We really enjoyed our time at this apartment (But as a month long traveller a washing machine would have been appreciated!)

Pedro truly deserves superhost status. Check-in and check-out were both seamless. Car parking spot can be an issue for longer cars. The house was sparkling clean and well equipped. Great location with even better views. Highly recommend.

房子装修很好, 跟图片一模一样｡里面的配置都比较高级,整体的居住感觉都很不错｡位置也比较方便,走五分钟就是河边,对面还有一家不太贵的米其林｡房间的窗口可以看到日落很棒｡如果要挑毛病只能说车库的门太小太窄会担心进不去,然后电梯特别的旧,没有里门,会觉得不安全｡
Overall is good. The location is perfect, just takes you 5 mins to the riverside. The apartment looks new, and easy to check in and out. The garage is a little bite small, but it is not a problem. The host is nice and reply my message quickly. Thanks for hosting.
Amazing Place to stay for a City trip in Porto!
The best location in a beautifully refurbished flat

Pedro’s place is AMAZING! The pictures of this place online are great but it is so much prettier in person. So modern, sleek, clean, cool and in a wonderful location! We so loved this place and made our trip to Porto very special. Thank you Pedro!!! Bravo!!!

O apartamento é maravilhoso, super moderno, extremamente limpo e a vista é IMPAGAVEL!!! super recomendo! 

O Pedro foi atenciosíssimo conosco, voltarei lá sem sombra de dúvida.
Great place, fantastic location, beautifully decorated

A great location with easy access to the old city and river area. 
Car park was a big challenge, if you have anything other than a very small car it is impossible to use.
Very Nice!!!  I strongly recommend

Pedro’s place is fantastic, completley renewed and stylish. He was a good host, and did not bother us. We are a family of 4 and would be happy zo have more glasses and plates. The views and the location of the apartment is fantastic, the metro is close as well as the waterfront! We would definetly come again!
Great place!

This apartment was the best one out of the 4 we stayed in during our 9 day holiday and such a great ending to our holiday was here. Super stylish, super modern and super sweet! We enjoyed the gorgeous bedrooms with comfy beds and amazing view, the shower is incredible (you will see if you book here) the kitchen has everything needed including coffee machine, and living is perfectly furnished and comfortable with handy Smart TV. Our group of 4 had nice evenings cooking dinner and then watching some shows in the tasteful living room. The decor is just so beautiful. We hope to come back to Porto and stay in this apartment as we decided two nights wasn't enough....we could stay there for a week or even forever :)
Appartement très correct.  Joliment décoré, lumineux et idéalement situé. Nous conseillons fortement.
Casa muito bem localizada com uma bela vista. Quartos confortáveis, muito bem equipada e com muito estilo! Valeu muito a pena e repetiremos com certeza!
amazing location
Très bien

if you drive to this flat, you will be in trouble for sure. the gate for parking lot locates completely different way and the explanation from host is very unclear. at the same time the parking lot is very narrow and hard to get entered. but if you are not driving, it can be a good flat to enjoy the night view. 
also, it is well equipped but no laundry machine in the entire building. so, not recommended for long period travelers as well.
if you go into bed room, you cannot use the wifi anymore since the device has very weak transmission.

Llegada autónoma muy cómoda, con muy claras instrucciones de cómo acceder a la vivienda y al parking. Me ha parecido muy cómodo no depender de una hora concreta de llegada.

La vivienda tal cuál las fotos, muy bonita y unas vistas y situación inmejorable.

A great stylish and clean place to stay. Communication is very fast and helpful.
Very close to the center. The parking space in the garage is quit small so don't come with  a too big car. Porto is not a town for big cars many road and parking space are very narrow and small.
Es bonita y con una preciosa vista. Te da todo lo que necesitas y estás ubicado en una zona estupenda. Todo perfecto.

집 내부가 아주 깔끔하고 예뻐요. 다만, 건물 외부가 많이 낡았습니다. 엘레베이터와 집 문고리는 안전한지 걱정이 됩니다. 주요 관광지들을 가려면 동 루이스 다리를 건너 가야하는 언덕에 위치하기 때문에, 최고의 뷰를 가지고 있지만 어디든 조금 멉니다. 포르투는 가파른 언덕들이 많이 있기때문에 이 조금의 차이가 많이 아쉬울수 있습니다. 건너편에 2018 미슐랭 가이드 음식점이 있습니다. 많이 비싸지만 맛있고 친절합니다.
Absolutely amazing stay.  Best air b and b stay yet.  Amazing house beautiful views excellent shower living and bathroom  I would stay here again. Thank you :)

Very nice flat. Everything is as describe.
The building is a little bit old.
Un appartement luxueux dans une ville sublime. Une vue à couper le souffle. A quelques pas du pont Louis 1. Un séjour époustouflant entre tradition et modernité. Je recommande fortement.
great apartment, very simple check in  steps. Good location and good price
Thank you for a great stay!
Un piso espectacular con una ubicación insuperable! Un anfitrión de lujo! Lo recomiendo 100% y seguro repetiré

Excellent apartment with excellent views of the city center. Stylish and new repair in the apartment, there are many important little things. Pedro always responds quickly, very convenient check-in, we arrived very late, the key was in the safe at the door of the house.

Pedro’s apartment was exactly what was pictured. It was in a great location in Gaia steps away from the bridge to Porto. He gave clear, concise directions with pictures. His amenities were spotless and the views were amazing. Definitely would recommend staying here!

Emplacement super !!!!
Garage dangereux pour se garer
La remise des clés difficile
The hostel is clean and well equipped. The host responded quickly to the message and gave me a good look. First of all, the outlook is very good.
침실에서 포르투 강변을 볼수 있는 멋진 조망을 가진 집입니다. 내부 인테리어도 깔끔하고, 전일정 셀프체크인과 아웃이 가능해요 ~
Amazing apartment close to Douro river. The views are incredible and we will come back to enjoy the Vila Nova de Gaia neighborhood!

사진보다 훨씬 이쁘고 좋았어요 
깔끔하고 따듯하고 경치도 너무 좋아요
다만 따듯한물이 잘나오다가 안나올때가 있어요
Very good stay. the flat was clean and stylish as expected + very well located. The view over the Ribeira was great.
Vous pouvez venir les yeux fermer. Bien situé, tres tres propre, appartement tout neuf, vu sur le Douro, spacieux. Je recommande vivement
un acierto,  eso si,  prepárate para pasar un poco de miedo en el ascensor...
El alojamiento muy bien. La ubicación y calidad del edificio y el aparcamiento dejan mucho que desear. Nunca vino al anfitrión y tampoco tuvimos recomendaciones locales. Cómo puede ser un súper host?

Pedro's place is wonderful place to enjoy Porto and its surroundings. The place is clean, warm and has fantastic views over the city. It has a private parking space which is a rare find in the area. Overall, this apartment is everything you can wish for to enjoy the wonderful city of Porto!
Estupendo
Pedro’s apartment was an excellent base to explore Porto and Gaia. The view from the apartment was spectacular. It was very clean, well equipped and stylish.

name: House of Nomad 2
summary: This is Room #2 in House of Nomad. This listing is new but we aren’t. You can find reviews under the same name. It's a co-living space which consists of 4 private rooms. We spare 2 rooms for Airbnb. The room’s cozy and the common area is quite spacious.   It's at a perfect location of Kowloon. You can reach Yau Tong MTR with just 5 min of walk. name: Villa 200m2, 10 mn de Porto  , 150m de la plage
summary: Maison entièrement à neuf. Faite avec goût.  Elle est composée de 4 chambres avec chacune sa salle de bain. Aussi il y a un canapé lit de 2 place à l étage.  Un très grand salon cuisine de 90m2, est composé d’un très beau canapé d angle, un très bel îlot central très cosi.  Vous allez vous sentir au calme dans un cadre à 150m de la plage.
space: Cette villa est constituée d'une jolie cuisine toute équipée (lave vaisselle, four, micro onde, plaque induction), un salon salle à manger de 95m² avec un écran led de 165cm, un canapé 8 places, un grand meuble avec des rangements, de 4 suites avec chacune sa salle de bain, un canapé lit à l'étage et de 3 toilettes. A étage, vous apprécierez la terrasse de 36m² avec la vue sur mer. Pour les fans de musique, je pourrez brancher via bluetooth, votre iPod, téléphone, et le son ressortira par les enceintes situées au plafond de la pièce principale.

neighborhood_overview: Vous séjournerez dans un cadre très calme, sans bruit, pour avoir des vacances apaisées. Vous apprécierez les restaurants de poisson qui se situent en bord de mer
notes: Cadre très calme. Si vous avez besoin de repos, ce lieu est fait pour vous. Vous aurez les restaurants à proximité afin de goûter les produits locaux.

reviews.comments:
Great house , everything is new and the area is realy scenic.
Хороший дом , только недавно отреставрирован, все работает ,а местность очень умиротворяющая .

Très chouette maison toute moderne et propre. Tout était nickel. Les propriétaires sont sympa et prêt ) aider et l’accueil avec un porto et des pâtisseries était super. Le propriétaire ne parle pas anglais mais la communication n'a pas été compliquée.  La maison est à 200 mètres de la plage mais à 35 minutes de marche du métro, la voiture est donc recommandée. La piscine serait en construction...

We were a group of eight people in Labruge and had an incredibly great time. The villa was even more beautiful than on the pictures! Absolute recommendation! The beach is 2 minutes away, only the train station is a bit further, but with a taxi or a car it is no problem. Jose always replied immediately. Especially Helder was incredibly accommodating and nice! He was really courteous and made the stay super enjoyable. We were really happy to meet him! We would come back anytime and hope to see you again! If you do not book this accommodation, it is your own fault!

Nós estávamos em oito labruge e tivemos um tempo incrivelmente grande. a vila era ainda mais bonita que as fotos! recomendação absoluta! A praia fica a 2 minutos, apenas a estação de trem é infelizmente um pouco mais longe, mas com o táxi ou carro não é problema. José sempre respondeu imediatamente. e especialmente herder foi incrivelmente confortáveis e Nice! Ele estava realmente ansioso e fez a estadia super agradável. Nós ficamos muito felizes em conhecê-lo! Nós voltaríamos a qualquer momento e esperamos vê-lo novamente! Se você não reservar este alojamento, é sua própria culpa!
La casa es maravillosa tiene todo lo que se puede esperar la ubicación es genial y es un lugar muy tranquilo para pasar con amigos nosotros seguro que repetimos
A recommander, 10 sur 10. Il faut surtout que les voyageurs prennent soins de cette maison pour qu’elle reste comme elle est.
Chez José vous adorerez l’espace de sa belle maison, la piscine, la terrasse du haut pour le café face au couché de soleil et la proximité de la mer.
villa moderne très agreable helder tres sympathique et réactif !  nous recommandons !
Os recomiendo sin lugar a dudas este alojamiento. Súper bonito, limpio, moderno, ubicación perfecta, todo espectacular.
Casa com boa localização e excelentes comodidades! Boa climatização! Bom sistema de som! Óptima higiene e limpeza! Recomendo!

La maison de José est vraiment superbe avec des prestations de grandes qualités.
Tout est neuf et de bon standing.
Excellente qualité de la literie
L’accueil est super et notre interlocuteur très disponible et réactif.

La situation géographique de la maison est excellente compte tenu de nos objectifs : 15 / 20 mn par autoroute pour rejoindre le centre de Porto et très bien situé pour descendre en visite soit vers le sud (Aveiro....), l'est (vallée du Douro) ou un peu plus au nord (Guimaraes, Barcelos....)

La toute proximité de l'océan était secondaire pour nous en cette période de l'année.
Possibilité de faire ses courses en grandes surfaces à proximité 

Un groupe très satisfait d'avoir séjourné dans cette demeure et ce beau coin du Portugal.

name: Bakırköyde konforlu güvenli sitede daire
summary: Sade, temizliği kolay fonksiyonel modern bir taz ile döşenmiş bir (Website hidden by Airbnb) 2 yatak odası ve 4 tane yatak mevcut.
description: Sade, temizliği kolay fonksiyonel modern bir taz ile döşenmiş bir (Website hidden by Airbnb) 2 yatak odası ve 4 tane yatak mevcut.
house_rules: - Gece 12 den sonra

host.host_about:
In Bakırköy, I live in a house that is very close to the airport, 2 rooms, 2 bathrooms. I am offering you a house that is suitable for family or solo traveler to the room or house.
I am staying in a central house close to the transportation means. There is no security issue on a private site. There are many grocery stores nearby, also close to restaurant centers and a big shopping mall.

reviews.comments: Stay at the flat was quite pleasant and communication was pretty good with Aysegul and Ferhat. Flat was clean, apartment is quite stylish.There was a security at the main door (7/24)which makes the place quite safe. Around the flat, there are local shops. You barely see tourists and that is a good place to enjoy real local Istanbul experience.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Ferhat (Ayşegül’s husband) and Ayşegül’s lovely apartment. It was much more spacious than we expected, and Ferhat and Ayşegül were kind and lovely hosts. Their flat is in a secure (site) area with 24/7 security who were kind and vigilant. And it’s really close to a large nearby mall as well. (We had a car, so I’m not sure how easily accessible it is without a car, but I assume it’s not too difficult.) By car it’s 15 minutes from the Ataturk airport (IST) so it made coming and going from there a cinch! 

Their place is comfortable and spacious and what you see in the pictures are just a small but good glimpse of their place. We highly recommend staying with Ferhat and Ayşegül.

name: Casa do Pombal
summary: Casa ideal para ferias familares com o Porto a 15 min
space: Além da casa e da piscina está disponível todo o quintal, no qual se encontra a horta e as árvores de fruto.
description: Casa ideal para ferias familares com o Porto a 15 min Além da casa e da piscina está disponível todo o quintal, no qual se encontra a horta e as árvores de fruto. Os hóspedes são livres de utilizar toda a propriedade, incluindo colher frutas ou flores. Às quartas-feiras, sextas-feiras e sábados, a pessoa responsável pelo jardim irá trabalhar. Podem solicitar que seja feita a colheita de outros vegetais. A pessoa irá verificar se o produto desejado está pronto para ser colhido. Se pretender contratar alguém para limpar a casa durante a sua estadia, por favor, acorde os termos respetivos com a anfitriã. A propriedade localiza-se sobre o rio, numa pequena localidade chamada Pombal. Está enquadrada num ambiente muito tranquilo com a aldeia nas proximidades. Existem transportes públicos na estrada principal a cerca de 1km da propriedade.
neighborhood_overview: A propriedade localiza-se sobre o rio, numa pequena localidade chamada Pombal. Está enquadrada num ambiente muito tranquilo com a aldeia nas proximidades.
transit: Existem transportes públicos na estrada principal a cerca de 1km da propriedade.

Se pretender contratar alguém para limpar a casa durante a sua estadia, por favor, acorde os termos respetivos com a anfitriã.

reviews.comments: Ha sido una estancia genial. Las vistas son impresionantes, te levantas y lo primero que ves por la venta son el rio y las montañas. Tiene piscina climatizada y el agua estaba perfecta. El Anfitrión nos ha recibidó muy bien, ha sido muy amable, la casa tiene de todo, menaje de cocina, de aseo etc... Hemos tambien disfrutado de la fruta y verdura que tiene en su finca, en resumen como si fuera mi casa. Solo hay que contar qu ela casa tiene muchas cosas antigua y no es moderna pero esta muy limpia. Volveremos.

La maison est a 30 min du centre de porto 
En arrivant vous serez subjugué par la vue et la grande piscine 
L'hôte est gentil et parle un peu Français 
La maison est parfaitement équipée
Vous avez a 3 min en voiture des petits restaurants très sympa et des bars au bord de l'eau 
Dans la commune il y a un petit magasin pour vous dépanner des premières nécessité 
Nous avons passe un très bon séjour
Merci a Maria et son fils

La maison est très bien équipée, tout est disponible pour la cuisine (robot, presse agrumes, gauffrier, yaourtière etc..) un niveau d'équipements rares qui rend agréable le séjour.
Merci d'avoir fourni une table de ping-pong, la piscine avec la vue sur le fleuve et les couchers de soleil magnifiques.  Le barbecue et le four a pizza agrémente les repas.

Le linge de maison et de piscine est fourni. En clair tout est fait pour vous faciliter la vie.

L'endroit est calme, proche de tout pour explorer porto et ses environs. 
Nous avons séjourné en famille : 7 adultes tout s'est très bien passé, merci aux hôtes discrets et efficaces

name: Charming Beach #1 Cabana Room Single
summary: Enjoy on-the-beach-living! This 1 person only (no exceptions) ROOM is in a charming beach home that is on the beach path in the midst of dining, shopping, & nightlife. It is located in one of the few Kauai locations where you don't have to rent a car! And yes, this room is for one person only, absolutely no exceptions ever so please don't ask.
space: We're right in the middle of all the action! You can walk to virtually every tourist attraction in this town! Only caveat: be prepared for the nightly sounds of karaoke (we provide ear plugs and the room fans can help mask the noise at night). FYI US News voted Kalapaki Bay the #4 thing to do on Kauai after 3 remote natural attractions. It is a great spot if you like being in the middle of all the hustle and bustle!  Lihue is central to the island's attractions. Many visitors enjoy using this area as their "hub." Work for United or American Airlines? Get a $20/night discount.

This is a simple one person room in my home with one twin bed. The room
neighborhood_overview: We're right in the middle of all the action! You can walk to virtually every tourist attraction in this town! Only caveat: be prepared for the nightly sounds of karaoke (we provide ear plugs and the room fans/ACs can help mask the noise at night).  We are on the beach path not directly on the beach. It is approximately a 2 minute walk to get to the beach in the pictures. FYI US News voted Kalapaki Bay the #4 thing to do on Kauai after 3 remote natural attractions. This is a great spot if you like being in the middle of all the hustle and bustle!  Lihue is central to the island's attractions. Many visitors enjoy using this area as their "hub." The home is a 10 minute taxi ride from the airport.
notes: The home can be noisy certain nights of the week due to nearby bars, etc. We do provide earplugs and highly recommend using them and the AC as a white noise machine. It's because we are right in the middle of all the fun. I do have a cat in the home. Instant book in enabled so you can book right now without approval. Also, late check-in is fine because you self check-in. Sorry, I am not great at responding to questions. Chances are, most of your questions are answered in this description so please read it carefully.
transit: Many things are within walking distance. A Kauai Bus stop is located nearby. Although you will not need a car in this location, it is recommended in order to see the island's gorgeous natural scenery. Parking is $9/night directly in front of the front door or you can find it in the neighborhood for free.
access: This is a simple one person room in my home with one twin bed. The room is private and has an AC unit. The bathroom is shared. Guests have living area, kitchen, and laundry privileges (the home is shared). Yes, one person only and children of all ages are people too. There are absolutely no exceptions to the one person rule so please do not ask.
interaction: Guests self check-in. Sometimes I am there, sometimes I am not. Accordingly, late check-in is just fine. Also, it is VERY IMPORTANT that you thoroughly read all correspondence regarding any reservation before arriving on Kauai. This will help you find and access the property.
house_rules: Please do not book this stay if you do not speak English and will not have cell phone coverage with the Airbnb app. The ability to send messages via the app is mandatory since that is how you will communicate with us.   You will need to have internet on your phone to find the home. I understand that Maps is not accurate without this. Also, all directions are on Airbnb or emailed.  Please do not create drama in the neighborhood because you are not prepared to navigate to the home and please text if you need assistance.  Please be respectful and don't bring any strangers into the home. There are tons of fun places to meet new friends around the home. This room has a very firm maximum occupancy of one. Please do not ask to have more people in the room. Please do not take anything away from the home except for beach towels (and please return them). This is a no-smoking property.  Relax and have fun!

host.host_about: I traveled extensively when I was younger and adore learning about other cultures. I am often on adventures so it is likely that you won't see me. My favorite things are great food, fun people, and I love living near the beach!

reviews.comments:
Solveig's home can be noisy at night as she already mentioned, however the provided earplugs do help. And this place has a lot of benefits: location, price, very clean, laundry capability, wifi; access to the beach within 3 min stroll and to the nearby hotel pool within 4 min walk; again location: parking space if you have a car; Restaurants, Bars and shopping opportunities in walking distance.

Solveig and her team are very helpfull and interested in optimizing your experience of staying in this place. So yeah, go for it. I think it's an ideal starting point for your island explorations.

(English) I've stayed in Solveig's house for 4 nights and I had wonderful moments in Kaua'i. The house is very well located in Kalapaki Beach, close to good restaurants and just a few minutes from Lihue's airport. The house is clean and confortable. She is also installing air conditioned on the single room, what will make it even more confortable. Considering the location and price, I highly recomend staying there.

(Português-BR) Fiquei hospedado na casa da Solveig por quatro noites e tive ótimos momentos em Kaua'i. A casa está muito bem localizada na praia de  Kalapaki, perto de bons restaurantes e há apenas alguns minutos do aeroporto de Lihue. O ambiente é limpo e confortável. Ela está instalando ar-condicionado no quarto de solteiro, o que vai torná-lo ainda mais agradável. Considerando o preço e a localização, recomendo fortemente se hospedar neste local.

Felt like i had a condo on the best beach on Kauai....you have the shops, 3 or 4 great restaurants, the shave ice and the pizza slice&salad across the syreet. You are in the middle of all the attractions on Kauai from the canyon west to the beautiful north shore. The house is a gem, clean and nice vibe. This is the place you want to stay. Mahalo to Solveig

My place was clean and nice. Every time, I contacted Solveig to fix something, she responded quickly and efficiently. The beach is right next to the beach. There is some noise in the evening due to the karaoke and bars around. It was a nice experience.

What an awesome hostess! The place was clean as could be. Conveniently located - lots of restaurants and other activity near-by. The Kareoke can be a bit annoying if you need silence to go to sleep early, but I'm not an early riser so it was not an issue to me.

I loved my experience on Kauai and a big reason for that was because of Solveig. She is a great host and made me feel very comfortable from the moment I arrived. Her apartment was in a great location right next to a nice beach as well as several restaurants and bars, ensuring that you have plenty of options for diversions just moments away. I didn't have any trouble sleeping even with the nearby bars and I found the room to be perfect for my needs. 

Her apartment was also conveniently located for touring the whole island as it is very close to the airport and centrally located between great locales on the West or North sides of the island. I had no problems getting anywhere and there was plenty of parking available around the apartment. 

Mahalo Solveig!

Staying in Solveig's Beach Cabana was a home away from home experience.  From the moment I walked in, I felt extremely comfortable.   The apartment was nicely furnished, very clean, with care taken so that guests would not need for anything.  The location is perfectly in the middle of the action in Lihue, with plenty to do, but enough flexibility to relax on the beach. Within walking distance there are excellent restaurants, ABC market and island activities.  Parking is not an issue, with plenty on the street and in the adjacent parking lot.

The best part of the stay is your host Solveig.  She is the best hostess!  This was my first ever airbnb experience and I am now spoiled!  I am hoping the next time I stay at another home, I have a wonderful hostess such as Solveig.  (even though she made me eat Hula Pie at Duke's!)

For this visit, I was in town for the Kauai Marathon.  Solveig made my race weekend a priority by asking how she could make sure that I had rest and food prior to race.  Post race, she was also genuiely concerned for my return.  Traveling solo, it was nice to have this support!

And BTW - the music from the bar nextdoor wasn't too loud.  Just in case, there are earplugs.

Mahalo Solveig!

A very nice stay,Solveig was very helpful,very clean,very convenient located,close to the airport and in spite of at the beach and in the center,coffee in the morning,washing machine.Room was small but sufficient.Even a AC,if you wanted.Good description of everything,how to reach the place how to use the house.Great stay! :-)
The reservation was canceled 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This being my first experience as a Air BB user, it possibly could be the best I will ever have. The room was cozy, clean and spacious enough for one as I was traveling alone. Great desk with chair. A dresser and ceiling fan. Beach towels were available as were all the essentials one would find in there own home. Besides that the beach is literally 54 second walk from the front door. I timed it. Very accommodating it was a fantastic place to rest and relax when the days events where over for me.  Highly recommend it!

I really enjoyed staying at this place. Solveig is very nice and makes you feel at home. The place is very well located. I would definitely stay here again if I had the chance to go back to Kauai again!

Solveig is a great host and her house is really nice. I felt really comfortable during my stay. Solveig is very helpful and friendly. I saw her a few times and she always asked me if I need something or she gave me some tips where to go. 
The room is not so big but it's enough space for one person. There is an AC in the room which is perfect. The house is perfectly located to the nice beach, some shops (also an ABC) and some restaurants/bars. The music from the bar is not too loud otherwise there are earplugs in the room. 

I definetly would stay again in Solveigs house

Solveig's cabana by the beach was a really nice and comfortable place for my short stay on Kauai, and yes, the place is basically one minute walk to the beach were you can rent a surf board or hang out.

Solveig herself was a great host and was really helpful in providing tips about where to go sightseeing, car rental, etc. She just made sure in general that the guest felt at home.

The location is about 5 minutes from the airport and about 45 minutes from Poipu/Koloa.

The room itself as well as the place was well kept and clean, so was the bathroom. There were fresh towels available in the room which was extra nice.

Due to the proximity of a karaoke bar, you might hear some light noises, but it was not a problem for my sleep. She does however provide earplugs in the room in case you need them.

Additional amenities : WiFi,  washer and dryer and AC if you need it, were also available for guests.

If you are looking for a room for one on the island, I'd say go for this one.

I certainly would book again.

Thanks Solveig!

Solveig was very welcoming, the room was perfectly prepared, and literally seconds from the beach (and Duke's barefoot bar).

Anytime again!

Solveig's place was in a great location for the meetings I had in town. It's also close to a lot of restaurants and bars in the area where you can let loose. You don't even need a car and plus the resort is close by in case you want to walk over there for some fun.  The room was exactly what I needed for my business trip. 

Solveig is great as well. She gets back to you if you have questions about the area an is attentive to her guests needs. I will be back. Thanks again.

Solveig was a great host! She was very helpful and nice! I was very comfortable in the room. It felt really home. This was my first experience and she definitely set the bar high!  Her place is in the middle of Kaua'i and it was easy to drive around and explore the island. I would recommend this place to everyone! Great host!

I loved this place! In fact, I will plan my next trip to Kauai around this place being available. It's on the prettiest beach and an excellent locations---really close to the airport. Solveig's directions and instructions were crystal clear. She was very available via text. The room was clean and comfortable as was the rest of the house. It's near a Marriott resort, so yes, as she says, there is some activity but the earplugs worked like a charm. This was my first Airbnb and a great introduction! I will be back!

This was a great experience. Everyone associated with the property was great.  (Solveig as well as two lovely ladies who work with her). The listing was as advertised. noisy but nice....right in the middle of things.
I had a very easy time here. Although I only spent one night check in was a breeze, parking easy to find, and Solveig was super sweet!
Clean rooms, easy access from the airport, and a 2-second walk to the beach... A real keeper!

The place was exactly as shared and I was very satisfied during my two night stay. I booked this  trip very last minute and Solveig was accessible and very responsive. Throughout the stay, she shared tips about the island, local area, and was accessible and very positive. If I came back to the island, I definitely would stay here again. If you plan to spend most of your time exploring and just need a cozy, very central location to stay that's near the airport and beaches, this it it.

Solveig was a great host and her place was perfect! Location was excellent. She met me when I checked in, showed me around. I had had a frustrating day and her warmth and kindness was much appreciated. She would pop in occasionally and was accessible when I had questions for recommendations/ suggestions. I would highly recommend Solveig and would stay here again! Thank you Solveig!

Very easy check in, and a great location close to the airport and right next to the Marriott hotel and the beach right there.  Location was clean and as described, and Solveig was proactive about making sure I had everything I needed.  Plenty of parking very close by.  Would definitely stay again.

Simply loved staying at Solveig's AirBnB. It's even better than described and the little touches are great: from dedicated shelf space in the fridge and in the bathroom, to little welcome messages and gifts. Plus, freely available laundry (inc. detergent) and beach towels! And then there is the wonderful benefit of having a welcoming hostess, Solveig herself: always smiling, happy to help, and stopping by every day to check up and make sure the guests are happy.
Solveig was a gracious host and was very knowledgeable anout things to see and do in kauai. Would def recommend her place. Very clean and secure and great proximity to the beach.

Solveig and my time in her beach cabana were amazing! There is not a better place to stay with bars, food, safe beach, and beauty while feeling at home. 

Solveig sat down to visit every time we crossed paths and was not only super friendly but knowledgable about the island and willing to try to make your trip the best as possible. I felt like I was hanging with a friend every time we talked. 

Without a doubt I will be staying there again next time I visit Kauai. Clean, comfortable, and perfect. And just an FYI the no guest rule is for your own safety and for the best! Thanks Solveig!!

I had a great stay in Solveig's home. Solveig was a charming and organized host who embodies the island's aloha spirit. I felt like a welcomed guest in her home. Her place is located just a short walk from a Kalapaki Bay, a great beach for swimming, sunning, surfing and Paddleboarding (rent a board or book and adventures with Kauai Beach Boys (Website hidden by Airbnb) I did their Wet Rappelling on a 60ft waterfall, Awesome!) and several good restaurants (Love the simple Ahi wrap at Duke's barefoot bar).  Solveig's home is located in the center of the action and I was worried the evening noise of the the nearby bars/restaurants might be a bother, but for me it wasn't an issue. Solveig thoughtfully offers earplugs in the room, and it might have been fine without, but I went ahead popped those in and turned on the white noise of the air con and it was no problem. My days were very active so I pretty much passed out each night! ; ) My room was small and simple, perfect for one, with a dresser and hanging room for clothes. The bed and comforter were nice and comfortable and I appreciated that she provided an extra blanket. I always bring my electronics so wifi was a plus! Solveig provides fridge and cupboard space in the kitchen, so if you're the type that looks to cook or just want to have some basics on hand, make a stop at Costco first and you'll be set for the week! I arrived when Solveig was out, but she provided great detailed info before my arrival and all worked out smoothly. I had a rental car and had no issue finding parking nearby, and as a single female, I felt comfortable walking around the neighborhood(normal caution of course), even on busy bar nights.  I would definitely stay here again. Aloha!

Solveig was organized and prompt. Everything was there that I needed and I am sure if I needed something else she would have taken care of it. The place was clean and neat with lots of little amenities.
Fantastic place as described. Very friendly and responsive host, I even got a small welcome gift! Would definitely stay there again. I can strongly recommend the room.
Nice clean place in the heart of Lihue harbor area. The host makes you feel welcome and there is a beautiful sand beach a short walk away. It is noisy around there at night.

I couldn't have asked for a better host Solveig is the most pure kindest soul I have had the pleasure to meet.  I wasn't feeling well after my flight and she offered to personally take me to the hospital I couldn't believe her generosity and even left me a beautiful birthday gift at my door when I checked in. Can't say enough good things about her and her hospitality. She becomes insta-family!

I had brief last minute one night stay here.  Solveig's self check-in process were well communicated and extremely efficient for me.  Debra was on-site though making final touches to the property and welcomed me and answered any questions I had.  Solveig has clear written instructions for most essential items/processes within the home.  My room was well appointed with a desk, wardrobe, bureau and TV.  The kitchen and bathroom are also well appointed as well and have clearly marked areas for guest storage if needed.  The location is a short walk to Kalapaki beach (with Marriott adjacent) and many reasonably priced restaurants and shops.  Solveig was gracious and provided area dining amd recreation tips to enhance my visit.  Use of provided earplugs abated nearly all noise and made for a restful slumber.  Solveig imbues the spirit of aloha and both she and her property are true assets to airbnb, my only regret is not spending more time here.

Solveig made me immediately feel at home, and was incredibly helpful in pointing out what the area had to offer.  The space itself was clean, airy, and perfectly situated for all of the exploring I did while on Kauai.  I highly recommend staying with Solveig!  Thanks again for such a lovely stay!

The reviews are filled with glowing praise for Solveig and the immaculately kept beach house. It's all true!  The property description possibly undersells the location.  Being a short stroll to Duke's, the Marriott, and the great Kalapaki beach views made me feel like I was living in a 1960s Elvis, Hawaiian movie.   The karaoke bar is a plus in my book.   It was all part of a great experience!

As a customer, most of us just ask for is for a fair deal.  If we hope for a bonus, it comes in the form of  little extra considerations, or just something unique about the experience.  My stay at the Beach Cabana House and Solveig's friendly professionalism delivered on all this and more!!  Solveig and her Beach house are certainly adding their share of joy to this world.   For all this, I am very grateful and would without hesitation recommend  others to stay here.  -Tom

Solveig's house was great and she was an awesome host. Super central -- super easy to get to the airport -- a nice spot to base out of and explore the island. She is very easy to communicate with and nice to talk to. Would definitely go back!

The place is conveniently located to access all the spots in Kauai. Solveig was very helpful and attentive during my stay and the home was well kept and clean. 
Smart choice for discovering the island.

I stayed in room #1 and I had a fantastic time. The room was clean and tidy and the AC worked well. There was definitely noise from the adjacent bar but that was clearly described before I booked. The kitchen area was very useful and I was able to cook all of my own meals (saving a ton vs. going out to eat). Solveig was also a great host, checking in multiple times to ensure I had everything I needed.

The highest praise I can give is that I felt like this was my home for the week. I sometimes hesitate to use airbnb if I think it will feel like I am invading someone's space. this was not the case here. She checked in regularly but there was plenty of time that I was alone in the house. The house is lovely and clean. The room is small but a single person will be perfectly comfortable. The noise was not a problem for me and I go to bed early. Ear plugs and white noise were fine. The location is really fun. Technically you could stay here with no rental car and have access to beach and restaurants....but you will want a car for at least some of your days to tour around. Burgers at the beach hut a stone's throw away are delish.

I had a wonderful time staying at Solveig's place.  It's in a great spot, the room and house is very comfy, clean, and welcoming.  Solveig was very welcoming and accommodating, and was very quick to respond to any questions/needs I had.  As explained in the room description, there is a loud tavern next door, but honestly I'm a bit of a night owl and the loudness had pretty much stopped before I went to bed around 12:30 or 1 AM.  (I stayed Monday through Wednesday nights) I didn't even use the ear plugs or AC/noise machine provided.  All in all a beautiful experience, would definitely stay here again!

This was a great location, for getting around and also for the options in nearby restaurants and hangouts.  As described, you can definitely hear the sounds of nightlife.  Cruise ships dock on Thursday nights, so the night I arrived was the noisiest. But it's worth it considering the convenience, comfort and cleanliness of the place, and very nice to have access to a washer and dryer.

I only met Solveig briefly, but she was kind and welcoming and made sure I had all the information I needed.  Plus she was more than happy to offer suggestions on what to do around Kauai to guests who asked.
I had a very pleasant stay, you have everything you need in the house, it's very well located and Solveig is a wonderful host, very kind and helpful. Love Kauai!

Staying at Solveig's was the perfect choice for my first experience using this application. Her home was extremely welcoming and the room she provided gave me the peace and rest I needed. Even the other travelers that stayed there were cool and inviting. I will definitely request staying here again when in Kauai!

Wonderful hostess. Perfect place for those on a budget. Clean bed, cozy space, central location. kitchen has all needed for cooking. Beach towels, books to read and a bar next door. Only minus besides the nightly noise from bar was parking situation. Park close for a few dollars more or expect to spend time waiting in parking lot for space to open up. Other than that it's more than expected for the price.

Everything was as it was described there. Karaoke was only twice in the 5 days and I was able to sleep well with this music. Debra is the cleaning lady and she was wonderful! Solveig and Debra were very friendly and helpful! Mahalo! Was a good time!

I didn't see Solveig during my 1 night stay but it was well organised and directions were clear. The home is very clean, comfortable and exactly as described. I met some lovely travellers and as it was my last night on Kauai, was an extremely close and easy trip to the airport, being the reason for my stay. A good central location - thank you Solveig!

After attempting to cancel my reservation based on the stated policy for the room, getting a message saying my cancellation was being processed, then getting a text from the host asking if I was out so the room could be cleaned the next day after I was gone, I still didn't get any refund.  Airbnb claims I should have directly contacted the host.  The host then informed me that the room was cleaned on the last day of my initial reservation, not the day I got that text.  All these errors turned out to benefit Airbnb and the host, while I threw away money not being there.

Best Bang for the Buck. In simple terms, but so much more! Location, easily accessible, all the perks of a , larger rental, ie washer , dryer. Boogie board, etc. Restaurants, airport. Beaches and shopping all there. Sort of a European Hostel environment, but you know  that going in, so it is not a problem, but a opportunity.

The place was great. Very clean, easy to find and comfortable. The AC worked great and the location is hard to beat. It was only a 2 min walk to the beach which was awesome.
It was loud at night, but earplugs were in the room and it didn't bother me. 
Perfect if you like the nightlife, probably not as great if you wanted to go to sleep at 9pm.

I just finished a 6 week trip out to Kauai and stayed at Solveig's place. I cant say how great of a time I had. The place is clean, comfortable, and in a great location to get around the entire island. This should be your choice when hunting.

Solveig's place was absolutely perfect for my stay on kauai, it's right on a lovely quiet beach and near some cute shops and restaurants. Could drive to kapaa, a bigger town, in 15 minutes. The house itself was beautiful and clean, and I found it really quiet at night (didn't  hear the karaoke or bars at all, which I had expected to from other reviews). Will definitely be coming back to stay and would highly recommend this place!
Ich war zufrieden mit meinem Zimmer. Es gab Probleme mit der Dusche, aber mir wurde eine Lösung angeboten. Ein Tag später war die Dusche wie neu. Kann es gut weiter empfehlen.

Solveig's airbnb space was the really well organized.
My room had my name and duration of stay hanging on the door.
There is a very clear sheet in the room with all the questions one might have regarding the space, laundry as well as car rentals and the surrounding businesses.
The room was really comfortable and having an AC there was a blessing in the hot weather.
The room as well as the shared bathroom are really clean.
There's also a refrigerator where you can out your food in.
There was also some food that Solveig had kept for the people staying in the rooms which was very nice.
She is very sweet and patient, even with my asking questions regarding things that were mentioned on the sheet sometimes.
I also got to interact with a few guests which was great.
The house is about 2 blocks away from a beach and you have really good places to go have dinner, shaved ice, coconut water or just to rent kayaks for touring around.
There's also a really nice bar to go and have drinks at night.

All in all, I was personally really happy with my stay there.

Had a great stay at Solveig's place. Accurate description regarding the karoake (had me laughing though) but I could see some people having trouble sleeping if they are light sleepers. 

The place is neat, bed was clean (no sign of bed bugs or critters), room was clean, and bathroom stayed clean with a full house. However, the last part is going to be more guest dependent. Solveig offers one set of towels for your stay but you have access to the washer and dryer downstairs and she offers soap. A nice touch for my 9 day stay in Hawaii. 

There is plenty of room to eat if you decide to bring carry out back to the place and she opened up her kitchen (I used the fridge) if you decide to get some light groceries. The fridge is segmented by room so I wouldn't buy too much stuff unless it was OK with other roomates.

My room had a desk which was very useful for my video capture/editing needs. I even had a aerial craft and found it to be enough room with a laptop and a few small cameras. Anybody who is traveling with gear might find that very useful to know.

Parking was very easy in the lot next to the apartment. 

One thing to note is the front door lock -- it took awhile to make sure it was locked properly so I would make sure to check this when entering/exiting the place. Same goes for the laundry room. 

Air conditioning is very cold in my room but keep in mind, island electricity is so expensive that it's best to run it when you are there. My room also had a fan. 

This room is great for a solo traveler who is looking to explore the island most days and crash at nights. It's also in a good location for walking to get food. The bed is a twin bed so for you very tall people (I'm 5'8) it may be worth considering what room may be more comfortable for you.

I traveled to Kauai on business and in order to avoid the ridiculous hotel prices I decided to try Solveig's accommodations. I will say that this place was perfect and everything I needed. It is in a very central location, close to food, entertainment and the beach, which is challenging to find on Kauai without a large expense attached to it. The room and house in general was very clean and organized. I have absolutely no complaints, however I do have a couple of suggestions: 

You will most likely not meet Solveig, which was a bit weird for me to go into someones house without actually meeting the host. With that being said, you MUST read her extensive instructions so you are clear on how this situation works. I would also suggest getting there during the day because it can leave you a bit confused if you arrive at night, especially if you have a car. 

If you have a vehicle, which I highly recommend then remember not to park in front of the house. If you are standing on the road looking at the house, the big lot across the little bridge to the right is not only public parking, but you can leave your car there over night without being towed. This was quite a source of confusion for me because I was very concerned about parking in an area where I would be towed. I didn't feel like it was completely conveyed where it would be safe to park over night without the risk of being towed so I hope this helps a few people. 

Another piece of information you need to know is that although Solveig leaves her local number to text her on or call, she does not respond to it at all and seems to only communicate via the messaging system provided by Airbnb, you also need to know this in case you have questions. 

You may also have a very pleasant and friendly lady approach you and follow you into the house at some point. She knows who you are, but of course you have no idea who she is. Most likely this is Debra who takes care of the cleaning at the house. She is a very nice lady so don't be alarmed. 

Lastly, especially if you are staying in room #2, I highly suggest having the air conditioner on fan mode all night to drown out the noise coming from the bar next door. With the fan on, you barely hear anything at all, which makes it possible to sleep. 

Once again, these last pieces of information are NOT complaints. I was very happy with my stay and it was perfect for what I needed. I will definitely stay there again on my next business trip. I hope this information helps you in enjoy your stay.

Solvieg was not sighted, but sent a few texts. The actual location and room were excellent apart from the noise of the dump trucks at 4.00am most nights. The house has a lot to offer for your stay. The free percolated coffee was a great hit with me. You can lie on the beach on the grass as in the picture though it is right outside the marmot Hotel. I surfed every day on the waves you can see in the picture. Bored hire and the surf is within 200m of this Air BNB.

Solveig's Place is very well organized so that it works also when she herself is not always present. The house is located very close to the beach, restos and shops. Everything is clean and I loved to stay there very much. For noise-sensitive people it could be a bit difficult because of a karaoke bar near Solveig's house. But I 'd certainly stay there again when returning to Hawaii one day.
Solveig's spot was exactly as described. I love this part of Kauai and enjoyed my stay thoroughly. Will be back if have need on this part of the island again.

Solveig is very kind, available and accommodating. The place, bedroom and bathroom are very clean and comfortable with all the needed amenities. You just need to be ok with noise because of next door tavern/kareoke bar. Overall it was a lovely experience.

I scheduled a random last minute trip with Solveig. Booked the room a day before arrival. I was happy to see how neat and clean her home was kept. I only met Solveig briefly, she was very nice. 
The place is as she describes, very conveniently located almost on the beach next to restaurants and surf/sup rentals. 
 However as she describes it is right next to a place of people enjoying their night time festivities. I would definitely stay there again.

Solveig and the place were awesome! The room was comfortable, clean and organized and it was perfect because it's central to everything in that local area. It also provided a great jumping-off location to explore the rest of island to the north and the west by car. The karaoke issue is real - but not as bad as I had expected and I never really needed ear plugs, but I was on island-time so maybe I had a better attitude :-) Anyway: Highly recommend! Thanks again Solveig!

Awesome place to stay. It's right on the beach! I only ran in to solveig once because of our busy schedules but she is super nice and welcoming. 

The twin bed I had was pretty small if you're taller than 5"9' (that's a guess) your feet may hang off. 

I would definitely stay with solveig again! Her home looks just like the photos. It's cozy and in a great spot. It's not one of those places that looks good in photos but you get there and it's a dump, it is actually nice and clean. 

The bars nearby really aren't that loud, there are earplugs that solveig provides in your room, and your room has a fan so with that combo I didn't hear anything that kept me awake at night.
Everything here went well. Neat place to stay. Very convenient and clean. Near a few places to eat and the beach is right there.

Greeted by Kate from Fun Cars and a welcome sign on Room
#1 was a nice place to start. 
However after that the noisy street noise was
More
Than I like. Even with earplugs and white noise. It felt a bit outdated and its
Main
Redeeming quality was proximity to the beach. I won't stay here again.
Nice, clean, easy to come and go.
Great spot and awesome location. Definitely a good deal.
