A great place to stay in Lihue. Casual and comfortable, only a short walk to the bay. Plenty of shops nearby, more of the tourist type granted. Know the bedroom is on the smaller size, with only a twin bed. This size is not a problem but it's good to know in case you plan to travel with lots of luggage. Also, it's upstairs. The other features of the apartment are shared amongst the other guests as well as the host. Free parking is located nearby but not on the premises. Would love to stay again!

Due to late flight, didn't arrive until nearly midnight.  Directions for locations and entry were good.  Managed to let myself into the house and  find my to room with a minimum of stumbling around in the dark being the directionally challenged person I am.  Public parking is across short 2 lane bridge opposite Nawiliwili Tavern.  Room was basic, twin bed with desk, fine for me as I was alone on short business trip.  Beach shown in picture is 100 meters from house.  Close to airport and shops, restaurants.  Met Solveig very briefly as I was leaving.  Good value, location, and much aloha.

Clean and comfortable. Access to WIFI when you get to your room. Read the instructions carefully to avoid getting lost. My first AirBNB stay and it was great. 

Please note there is a tavern next door so light sleepers might want to use the provided earplugs.

I had a wonderful stay at Solveig's Beach Cabana! It was a lovely place next to many restaurants and provided easy access to get around the island. An ideal location! The room was perfect. . . very clean and comfortable. The house was also wonderful and also very clean. The location was close to a lot of restaurants which was also nice. Solveig, it was great to meet you! Thank you for everything. I had a wonderful stay! I would definitely recommend this listing to anyone visiting Kauai!

Wonderful place in a perfect location right in the middle of the action in Lihue.  A good selection of shops and restaurants are in walkable distance. It's central location is also very useful as a base for trips to all parts of the island.

Everything about this AirBnB was as described, and very welcoming. The home is clean, a very short walk to the beach, in a neighborhood with much to offer, and an appropriate stay for people of all agea.  The host is extremely pleasant.

The place is clean and in a location that is fun to enjoy Kalapaki Bay. The host made the check in easy and convenient. The only negative is that it is very noisy at night (as advertised) being right next to a karaoke bar.

I appreciated the quality sheets and towels and esthetic furnishings.
The directions were clear and it was easy to find the house.
Thanks for a lovely stay!

The Stay was well and everything was as described.
The house is clean and well located.
I didnt get to meet Solveig but everything was set so i could have a nice and confortable stay.
Instructions were to the point. It is a great location. Close to the beach! Kitchen is super nice! Thank you for the great time!
It was a good place to stay.
Place was very central, close to the airport. Very orbited and clean. Very cute room with a great beach right behind.

The room was a perfect base for exploring Kauai! Central on the island, steps from the beach, and comfortable to get your eight hours. Solveig has represented it well here--it can be noisy at night, but she graciously provides good earplugs. With the ac fan on and ear plugs, I slept great. The house is clean and everything you could need is well-labeled or explained in the manual.
Clean place and great location. Really close to the beach and to restaurants nearby.
Great stay at Solveig's place. I was working most of the time and didnt get to meet Solveig, but everything was as expected. Would stay again.
Loved this place. Awesome room to myself, perfect AC and comfortable bed. Only complaint is the noise from the tavern next door, but this was well accommodated by the given earplugs.

Solveig's place was great! It was right next to the beach and had tons of shops around. The Tavern "karaoke" bar wasn't too bad. I even went in my last night at Solveig's and met some cool people! I would highly recommend staying at Solveig's.

Debra, Solveig's neighbor, was incredibly sweet and welcoming when I arrived. She gave me some great places to check out. The area is incredibly well kept, with a kitchen available for full use. My room was spacious and cozy and had multiple cooling options to use if it got hot. The house is shared with another Airbnb user, but its a great way to meet new people. If you want someplace perfectly central, is very reasonably priced, is a very quick walk to the beach, several restaurants and central to everywhere, this is the place to stay. Its perfectly central to the north and west part of the island. If you don't mind wearing ear plugs (they provide good ones) this place is great. I had no problems getting a very restful nights sleep even with all the night life!

The room and home were as described everything was clean and ready for your stay.   The location is amazing! You are only steps away from the beach and restaurants which is a plus if you don't plan on getting a car. The room is also equipped with an air conditioning unit which is very rare in kauai and a huge plus. I didn't get to meet Solveig but she had made sure everything was ready for you.
Loved the welcoming coffee mug, room was GREAT for the price! You are in the middle of everything. Beach, bars and restaurants.  Would not hesitate recommending to friends.

The room was great, much better than expected. The noise from the bar and the beach that she warned about were pretty nonexistent with the AC on. I met the cleaning lady (Debra, I think) and she was super nice as well. Such a great location and price, perfect for the single traveler. Her instructions posted around made it easy to avoid any issues. Very happy with my experience.

My Airbnb was great. I couldn't of asked for a better place to stay. It was clean, very centrally located and cozy. As a single female traveler there was many places to walk to and get breakfast.. Lunch and dinner. Public parking very near the apartment . I didn't have really any interactions with my host, but she was a text away from any questions or concerns. 
The only confusion I had was when I first arrived , I had a slight hard time figuring out what door to enter in, but again, solveig was there to walk me thru it step by step. 
My bedroom had a lock with a key you took with you so you had your mind at ease the your belongings where safe. 
I highly recommend staying here and also I highly recommend renting a car so you can see the true beauty of Kauai. 
Mahalo and hope to be back in the future.
The stay was great. The location is amazing! The apartment was very clean. I had a great time with the other Airbnb guests.
I really enjoyed my stay here. The location was awesome and the room was clean. Perfection

This stay was superb. I felt very comfortable and I really appreciated the clean & organized space. The house rules were clearly communicated & all made sense. The way it is setup, guest could be very self-sufficient.

I had a wonderful experience staying here! The room is perfect size and includes AC. I was lucky to have an awesome roommate during my stay! The ABC store is located at the end of the anchor mall which has everything you need. The Nawilliwilli tavern next door is a great spot to grab a drink. I slept perfectly,  didn't hear a peep at night. I would recommend renting a car if you want to explore the island along with booking excursions ahead of time. I did purchase the helicopter trip through island helicopters. Best experience of my life! My favorite place to eat was dukes which is located on the beach. Everything is within walking distance which makes this the perfect place to stay! I will be back again!

Amazing! It is literally in the middle of everything and is super convenient! Room and bed was comfortable, beach accessories provided, Debra the caretaker is a sweetheart, and there was no issue with noise at night. Solveig always responded to my messages in a timely manner, unfortunately I did not get a chance to meet her. I highly recommend this space for individual travelers without a car!

I didint see any host and the self check-in worked like a charm. You can park you car on the other side of the bridge near by with no problem. Everything was well explained with the instruction manuel. And about the karaoke, well I was having a good time there so it was not disturbing to me ;) thanks again!

My stay was great. No surprises here. Photos are exactly what you get and perfect for one person. I didn't realize until my last day but there are beach mats, towels, etc behind the futon for use. I rented a car from the enterprise location at the Marriott next door, made it easy to drop off too. I just took the hotel shuttle back to the airport. I'd easily stay here again. It really is the perfect location.
Debra, the cleaning lady, invited me along with her to a farmer's market.  It enabled me to get the produce I needed to eat healthy all week.  Thanks Debra!
My experience was okay. I left specific feedback on my survey suggestions. I loved most the Hawaii mug as a gift! Thank you for it!

My experience was great! I booked Solveig's place last minute, and everything was just as described! Her directions were straight forward. I had absolutely no problems! As an added bonus, I met a really nice gal from Germany who was also staying there :) Restaurants are right across the street. Everything is convenient! Don't hesitate booking!
Perfect set up for one traveling alone. Clean, comfortable and in the middle of everything. The beach is beautiful and easily accessible. Would definitely stay there again.
This was my first experience with a bnb.  And, it worked out great for me traveling alone.  The flexible check in and convenient check out procedures were perfect.

Great place, great location! Everything was exactly as described and the house was easy too find. The noise from next door is not an issue and the music stops around 11pm anyways. The house is clean and has everything you need. I highly recommend it because from Lihue it is easy to get around the island!

This was the perfect spot for my solo vacation! Right next to the beach and a few restaurants and I always felt safe and secure! I didn't see Solveig during my stay, but she was a wonderful host anyway! :) Everything in the house is clearly marked and I instantly felt comfortable finding my way around. I would definitely stay here again if I venture to Kauai on my own for another adventure!
It's noisy, beware the loud bars next door at night and loud roosters in the morning. Minimal interaction with host.
Solveig was a good host.   All needed information was provided, and the room was exactly what I expected.
Overall, very happy with this rental. Karaoke was tolerable, but roosters from 1am on were difficult.
Very beautiful place. My evenings were the most spectacular at this location. Try the mariachi reastu they have good food. wish I could spend more time here. Thank you sloveig.

A quaint little room for a solo traveler. Nice location steps away from the beach and right off the highway for easy exploring. Everything was very clean and organized. It was also nice and affordable as well. Overall, I was very pleased with my time on Kauai.

Solveig's place is right next to the beach and surrounded by nice restaurants due to its proximity to the Marriott hotel. There are some more affordable eats too if you're looking to save money. The location is also very close to the airport, so for those who don't have a car, my taxi ride to the airport cost about $10.

As for the accommodation, I enjoyed coming back to the scent of candles and am a sound sleeper so the late night karaoke didn't bother me. There were magazines about Kaua'i and places to see in case you had more time to explore. Thank you for letting me stay in your home, it was everything I needed.
Right in the missile of the action.  Close to the beach.  Has Wifi.
Ich habe mich wohl gefühlt
I really enjoyed my stay! It was perfect, good location, very comfi and clean room/bathroom. I can higly recomend this place.
good location

Great stay, noise coming from bar next door did not bother me at all as I sleep like a rock.  Super convenient and close to restaurants, beach, shopping.  Great host, super clean room, shared bath, AC worked great.  Host made the booking process very easy.
Very clean and comfortable apartment. Perfect location on Kauai: Restaurants, Beach and Parking in 3-5 min Walking distance. Highly recommended!!

Minimal contact with host. Debra (cleaning lady) was a sweetheart and very helpful. The noise from the bar next door didn't bother me, but the roosters were rather annoying. Earplugs were provided, plus AC to reduce noise. In addition to the other room being rented out on Air B&B, someone lives in the third bedroom. There was minimal interaction with this individual, but she was speaking loudly on the phone in her room one afternoon, plus her heavy footsteps in the evening did manage to wake me up. Aside from that, the place is great for a solo traveler and the location is very central.

Central location a mile from the airport, right near Marriott Kauai and Duke's/Pietro's Pizza. Easy to walk to Kalapaki Beach. Same distance to Na Pali Coast and to the Waimea Canyon hikes. Best suited for backpackers/the hostel crowd.
Great place to unwind after a busy day. Love the beach being so close. I went to many of the restaurants and shops near by. Don't pass this place by, definitely worth checking out and checking in.
Perfect place for a stay over. The noise level wasn't bad at all.

Great stay in a lovely little part of town. I was only here for one night, but I really enjoyed it. The bed is very comfortable and I rested well. The place is extremely clean and tidy. And the kitchen was easy to make use of in the morning for breakfast. Thanks a bunch!
Good central location, but lively and noisy at night... But that was spelled out in the description and knew what I was getting into so no issues....  Host was honest and upfront about this....

Solveig's home is a delight. Everything has been catered for so that you feel welcome, safe and comfortable. The home is clean and light, the room was comfortable and well thought out for the traveller. The location is fabulous. I shared with wonderful people and meeting them was a trip highlight. Staying there was a truly enjoyable experience and one I would repeat in a heartbeat. Solveig has done a wonderful job of setting everything up with attention to detail and care.  Thank you Solveig!
A wonderful sweet space :)

This place was great!! Really good location!! Exactly as described and very comfortable for my stay. The directions and house info were clear and accurate. I would recommend and would stay here again.

The perfect place for a solo traveler. Solveig did a great job of making me feel right at home. The location is very ideal. I was able to explore the North and West sides of the island with my rental car very easily! There is a small beach just a minute walk from her place...which made for a great place for a morning walk! Delicious restaurants right at the door. Clean and well taken care of. Would recommend this place for sure!

I loved my stay here! Great hub spot for the rest of the island. If you need a pool day, walk over to the Marriot and get a pool pass. You can rent a car there as well. The space is clean and simple, and the communication is clear. I would recommend this spot to solo travelers for sure.
Sweet house, with all amenities you need, very clean, really central. Air condition is a plus! I recommend this place, and I'll be back for sure!

Solveig was a great host and this is a wonderful place to stay for solo travelers. The only thing I wish is that it didn't seem like I was being such a hassle if I wanted to reach out for any questions. It seems like everything has to be done by text and the only reason I should ask anything is for "emergency". However, when I did text Solveig was very very responsive. Everything is clearly put out there and worded correctly for what it is. I would highly reccomd this place!

Perfect for one last night on the island and need to stay close to the airport. Kauai bus stop is very close by and it goes straight to the airport. Couldn't be easier and costs a quarter!  I actually had two nights so welcomed access to free laundry facility so I could arrive my next stop (HNL) with all clean clothes. Yes it's noisy but at least noise dies down after 1 AM unlike Waikiki where the nightlife never ends even when it's no longer night!

Clean and comfortable place to stay for a solo traveller. The room is very cozy but I hope you aren't staying in the room all day while you are visiting the islands! :-O And, if you don't mind a short walk, there is a shuttle from the Marriot hotel to the Lihue airport....for free! (Not including a tip if you so choose)
Nice place right on the spot.

Solveigs place is an ideal location for exploring the south shores of Kauai without the cost of the hotels! The room was comfy and there is a decent amount of shared space to use as well. As mentioned in the advert there is a couple of bars nearby so it can be a bit noisy, but nothing that bad. I would definitely stay here again

This place was extremely clean, cute and cozy. Any type-A person would appreciate the level of detail that went into organizing things to make for a comfortable stay. There was even a cute coffee mug as a complimentary gift! Will stay here again if I am on the island alone again.

The place was exactly as described. The only thing I would add is that there are narrow stairs to come into the condo if you have a lot of luggage that can be tricky. The bar next door didn't bother me and I ended up there one of the nights. Nice local people. Didn't meet Solveig. I recommend this spot if you need to be near Lihue or the airport.
Awesome place, second time guest.  Look forward to staying many more times.

I stayed at Solveig's for 1 night, the place is clean and in a good location for one night in and out of Kauai, close to the airport and a couple of restaurants and bars. I read about the noise from other reviews, it does get noisy from a karaoke bar next door, I didn't really mind as noise doesn't bother me. The room as a single bed and has the basics. 
If you are in a budget this a good place to stay, however i don't think I would stay  in this part of the island during my entire stay in Kauai.

Solveig was always available to assist me with any questions. She was very timely and well organized.  Her place is very clean and comfortable. I had an amazing experience for my first ever air bnb !!!! Thank you so much!
Very clean place, and super easy check-in. Was very happy with my stay and recommend. Thanks, Solveig!

Location is good with restaurants nearby.
The biggest inconvenience is the electric circuit breaker getting tripped many times during the day which caused the room unbearable hot.

This was a perfect spot for my first time traveling alone.  It was a quick taxi ride from the airport and I could rent a car from Enterprise that was in the Marriott next door.  I felt safe and enjoyed exploring the island.  Debra was really helpful with any questions.
Great communication and place to stay. Thanks so much Solveig!!

I had a quick two night stay here and will be back!  As some of the other reviews mentioned, the karaoke bar can be quite loud but there are earplugs provided and that's a very small price to pay for the proximity of this place to a GREAT beach and plenty of restaurants.  It's an excellent value for the price.

Thats very nice place in the middle of the town.  Close to the beach and surrounded with Restaurants. 
Kind of community style in the house which i liked very much.

This is the perfect spot for the solo traveler many bars and restaurants within a 5 minutiae walk where you can meet people and grab a drink. The beach is about a 30 second walk and absolutely gorgeous!

Great place to stay. Very vlose to the beach (a 2 minute walk), a few bars, restaurants, and plenty of shops. Very family friendly. I came for my 21st birthday and i loved the location. I get to relax, shop, and drink whenever i want. I felt very safe here. She is very detailed about rules and information. Follow her instructions and you wont have a single problem. Everything is clearly labeled for convenience. I had no trouble (and little interaction) with others in the house. The pace is slow in this area, very relaxed which was perfect for me. However, if you're looking for a big city feel this is not the island for you. I had no issue with the noise.

The home is very clean. I ran into a couple bugs and quite a few lizards on the property. It was expected, it is a tropical island after all lol. Theres a few stray cats that hang around the shop next to the house & plenty of chickens.
Everything is thought out in the house, location can be thought of as mid way to Napali, Kalalau, poipu, and airport, unless you want the Hanalei Bay experiences itself.

Solveig’s place is literally just a couple minutes walk to the beach. It's not the bluest beach but it's local, tamed, and more/less a quieter stretch of sand good for paddle-boarding and easy swimming. Sunrise is amazing if you can wake up for it. I think many of the people from the neighboring chain hotel do that. 

The room itself is good for someone who is going to be in-and-out. As in the description, if you are looking for a peaceful night's sleep...this isn't for you. Earplugs are supplied because of the tavern next door (you will hear the cars, and yes, you will hear all the songs to sing along to). With that said, sunrise made up for all of that. 

Check in and check out is a breeze. I left my things in the laundry room easily while waiting for a flight later in the day. I walked around the beach if you don't have a car (the limited number of shops and cafes around aren't too special).

Nice place for easy access to a quiet beach near the Marriot and several casual or fancier restaurants near by...   There were beach towels and even extras such as snorkeling and body board although the waves at the bay where the place is located were not strong enough to make use of it and the bays water is a bit murky but if you had a car it would be great!
The room is small and simple but comfortable and gets very warm in the afternoon and one of the nights I stayed the air did not seem to work right, but otherwise it was very organized and clean.  The karaoke did not seem noisy at all with the fan on:). 
There are 3 rooms that are rented out separately and all felt safe and comfortable.  
Debra, the lady who helps manage affairs at the place, was AMAZING!  She went out of her way to be kind and help me settle in- she offered and went to the store for me for groceries and helped me even after I left.  Debra was the greatest gift of my stay in Hawaii, can't say enough how much her kindness touched me:)
Also there was a small gift of a Souvenir from Hawaii  which was a very seeet and thoughtful touch.
Would stay again and for the price being so near the beach was great:)
Everything was as described. Perfect for the solo traveler.

Staying at Solveig's Beach Cabana was great! Her house is tidy and very much beach themed making it a perfect place to just chill and relax. Everything-from kitchen cabinets to bathroom fixtures are labeled for convenience and to eliminate confusion.  It's right next to one of the many small shopping centers in Lihue--you can have breakfast on the beach and then shopping afterward. It's also a short walk away from a Lihue shuttle stop that goes all around town. Solveig herself is a great host and always accessible over Airbnb or text to help with any concerns.  I can't think of a better place place to stay in Lihue that's reasonably affordable!

Stayed here for two nights and really enjoyed my time. Everything is very well organized from check-in to check-out. Super clean house in a great location. Offers perfect laundry facilities and everything else you could need. The other guests at my time were also very friendly and quiet. Didn’t get the chance to meet Solveig, but everything was well explained beforehand. 

As she states in the description, the place can get a bit noisy due to a couple of pubs and bars in the immediate proximity. With the AC on, I personally didn’t find this disturbing at all. Close to the house, you have very nice restaurants, a beautiful beach, and a small shopping area. 

Highly recommended place in Lihue!
Hübsches Häuschen, schnell am Strand. Laut wegen Bar nebenan. Vis a vis das beste Restaurant mit schönem Ausblick.
A perfect place to stay, right on the beach. Nice, clean apartment with all facilities!
Great location. Really enjoyed myself.
It’s right at the beach which I loved, I only met Debra but she is a total sweetheart! At night it gets really loud tho and I had trouble sleeping even tho we had ear plugs in the rooms.
Solveig's place is exactly as she described. It was comfortable and located in a great area with some night life.

This place is fantastic. It's a clean and simple place right next door to a small shopping area, a few bars and the beach. It is noisy some nights, but the most problem i had was all the roosters kicking off at first light. You WILL need a car to enjoy all Kauai has to offer though, so keep that in mind. Thanks so much!
Extremely convenient location and a great space to stay for a few days or even longer. An easy place to recommend for the solo traveler

Solveig’s place was perfect for my 4 nights in Kaua‘i. The entire place was clean and exactly as described. The bedroom was small but comfortable. I was in the room facing the tavern and I actually enjoyed hearing some of the music at night. The earplugs work great and you can always close the window and use the AC if you want. Laundry was free and convenient which was great after my dirty hikes. I paid for parking so I could park right outside of the house, well worth it. The bathroom was spotless and the toilet and shower worked great. The beach, restaurants, and shops are only a few feet away and driving to other parts of the island is easy. Solveig was quick to reply when I had any questions. This place is a steal! Don’t hesitate to book.
Great place!

Perfect place for budget minded singles to stay.  Wonderful location except for the tavern being so close and the night action continuing into the wee hours.  In spite of that, close to swimming beach & resort and very convenient.  Clean and well appointed.  Really enjoyed exploring this part of the island!!  I'd do it again.
This place was nice, really close to the beach. Noise from the bar next door is definitely noticeable though
Very convenient location to the beach and shops. Perfect for anyone traveling solo to the island if you’re looking for something other than a traditional hotel.

I was surprised!   Yes there was the noisy bar but that died down earlier than I thought it would.  The location is unique. And the accommodations were very comfortable and we'll accessorized.  A super clean and cozy beach bungalow.   I definitely would stay again.
All as expected! Good location to meetup with friends staying at the Marriott. The patio was a good spot to read as well :)

Great location within walking distance to several restaurants and shops. You are literally on Kalapaki Beach which is a very nice beach with surf/sup rentals etc. right there. It's less than a 5 minute walk to the Marriott Kauai resort as well. The rooms had everything you could need for your stay and everything is clearly marked in the common areas so you know what you can and cannot use. The bathroom and fridge even have separate and clearly marked shelves for each room. Beach towels, boogie boards are provided as well. I had to store my luggage for a bit and she let me put it in the laudry room which is locked and secure. I would highly recommend for a single traveler.

Great place for singles to stay for the price and convenience to the beach, food, and souvenirs. You’ll still need a car if you plan to see other parts of the island. There is some noise from the local bars at night but the provided ear plugs made this not an issue.
I checked in late and left early but everything was in order, convenient and exactly as described. Nice place to stay.

This was a great place to stay! If traveling solo again I would rebook to stay here. Everything about the description was accurate. Like others have stated there is a karaoke bar next door so it's not the most quiet of rooms. Despite that, awesome. Thanks!
Great location, great people, just have a sense of adventure ready for kauai
Good experience- I stayed one night to bridge from my resort to my flight, would definitely recommend

Great room to rent! Very clean. Lots of beach items for you to use - towels, chairs, snorkel. House is extremely well organized and very comfortable. Would be a great place to rent for short-term and especially long-term stays. Very central to everything. Be aware though that when the description says it can noisy at night, this is quite true.
Perfect for solo/independent travelers. Homey vibe while vacationing
This location is so central to the Līhue area! Lively neighborhood and access to the beach.

Great location and very thoughtful touches through the flat like swimming gear and toiletries, loved the aloe vera for my sunburn! The code made check in easy, more specific information about nearby free parking would have been handy though as it wasn’t clear when arriving at night and I almost got booked. Very handy to be 5 min from the airport.

La chambre dans laquelle je dormais était très propre. Le trajet en voiture de l’aéroport à la maison fut très simple et rapide (5 minutes). Une petite attention m’attendaient sur ma table de chevet! Cela a très bien commencé mon voyage!

Solveig's house is a great place to stay for a solo traveller. Instructions for accessing the space were very clear and the room was clean and comfortable with all of the necessities. I brought earplugs as suggested as Solveig's place is right in the heart of all of the action true to her description, but there were some in the room as well, which was a nice touch. It was also nice to have access to the kitchen and my own space for storing food. Beach items were also available, although the weather wasn't the best in Lihue during my stay so I didn't get a chance to use anything. I enjoyed my stay and would stay again.

Location is great for those in need of shopping, restaurants and the beach within walking distance. Right in the middle of all the action from nearby resorts and just minutes from the airport. I spent most of my time in other parts of the island exploring but this was a great central location to start and end my days.
Conveniently located, clean, and comfortable, with fast internet. Great place to stay, and great value for the price!
Everything was awesome. Very nice place. Much better than the experience hotels everywhere. Thank you!
Everything she describes is accurate. My only fault was the bed. It is very  uncomfortable. I can't even say why but is was very.
Great location! Awesome set up for single travelers. Good price and cozy place.

Solveig's place was a great place to stay, with only a 5-10 minute drive from the airport. Debra was very helpful upon check in, and the place had everything I needed for my weekend stay in Kauai. The place is super clean. I thoroughly enjoyed my visit here. Mahalo!

A very great spot if you’re looking for a one bedroom for a night or two. There is a camera recording the entrance; so the owner really takes the “No visitors” rule quite seriously. But the space and one bedroom is nice + there is A/C! And you can walk down to one of the few spots which is open until midnight!
Great Location, can only recommend
Perfect place to stay while traveling alone. The beach is super close and the beach hut, right out front, had great food.
Great location to awesome Lihue and to the golf!

I had a wonderful times in Sloveig’s place. The room is so clean and quiet. I know there’s restaurants and bars in front of the house, but I have to say that I’d spent all my energies on daytime for exploring around, so I was too tired to get those noises z actually not that bad! The location is perfect, only less than 10 mins from airport, and 30 mins to Poipu beach. ABC store is right in neighborhood, only take you 3 mins to get to beach as well. Highly recommend! Loved it, will visit again! Thank you

This room is great for a solo traveler who needs a place to stay and shower--like your own private hostel room. The room comes with a big fan which can be handy on the hotter nights. There is street parking in front of the building. The area is very walkable.
clean and comfy was just what I needed, a place to rest between adventures!!!

Solveig offers one of the most affordable beachside spots on the island. It is clean and comfortable, very near the airport, and walking distance to plenty of restaurants and shops. People outside the bar next door (Nawiliwili Tavern) can be a little noisy some nights, but it didn't bother me despite my room being the nearest to it. This central location is perfect, although you really do need a car to see all the sights on Kauai. Solveig's communication was clear and prompt, including regarding my last minute request for a parking spot out front (additional charge). I would definitely stay there again. :)
Simple, clean but very cluttered accommodations in a noisy area.

Solveig's place is located near a beautiful beach in Lihue and smack in the middle of a lot of local action. The description of the place is very detailed and accurate; I was not surprised by late night revelry from the neighboring bar. The location was ideal and the orderliness of the place and communication by the host prior to check-in made my quick stay easy and comfortable. I recommend this place to the single traveler who is not too concerned about noise from the bar lasting into the wee hours of the night.

Solveig's home was such a perfect spot for my stay. The location is such a quick drive to Lihue Airport, a 2 minute walk to the sea, less than one minute walk to bars and restaurants, and overall a comfortable and safe place. I was impressed with her organization around the home, labeling amenities and notes for guests to best understand functionality of her place. The bed was comfortable, the AC in my room worked great, I enjoyed the private lock on my door, and in general everything was super easy to understand. I would recommend this to any solo travelers passing through!
Great location, worked for me!
Super cozy cabana! Perfect for traveling solo, a place to sleep and close to so many attractions

This place is just as the description reads, clean, fully stocked, and in a convenient location. I came in at night so a bit tricky finding the door in and plodding my way upstairs, but the directions provided adequate detail to help me. The small rooms have great fans and a small but modern air condition unit for comfortable night time sleeping. I didn’t find it noisy as described but lucked out and my stay was Sunday through Wednesday evening. The cruise ship docks on Thursdays causing the night life noise increase on Thursday nights. Great location and nice place.

PERFECT location in Lihue. You're steps from the beach and tons of restaurants. You're also right next to the Marriott which has a beautiful large outdoor patio area overlooking the water. I highly recommend buying coffee and breakfast there in the morning. The room was small but perfect and had everything I needed. Most importantly it's sparkling clean! I would certainly recommend staying here to any other solo travelers. It is ideal.

Great spot for a solo traveler looking to crash inexpensively on Kauai. I liked the flexible self check-in policy and appreciated that there was plenty of lot parking nearby. The place was very well represented both in the photos and host description. Everything was clean and there was cozy common space should you choose to use it. It felt like there were a lot of rules at this location, more than any other Airbnb I’ve stayed in, but they ultimately contributed to a comfortable stay in a shared unit and clear expectations about behavior and respecting other tenants.
Well located condo with a very useful kitchen and comfortable bedrooms.

Perfect little house and super clean! Although, the place is surrounded by bars and is a very rough area at night.  Fights broke out and police were called 2/3 of the nights i stayed. Don’t expect an easy night’s sleep in this area.
Great location! Exactly as described and communication through Airbnb app was great.
Amazing location, great room,  lovely host.
As long as you follow the instructions, you will have a good time. This has got to be one of the best locations in the city. It is literally in the middle of everything.

This Airbnb was adequate for my needs, which was a place to de-jetlag for two nights. Pros: Location close to a beautiful beach and several good places to eat (loved the beach hut across the way). Room and bathroom were decently clean if a bit dated/cluttered. Cons: Host was very slow to respond. Common areas were cluttered and fridge was a bit smelly. Felt a bit colder (mood/mahalo-wise) compared to most Airbnbs in the way there were so many house rules and the tone in which they were written was sometimes condescending. Loud roosters but earplugs provided. For just a night or two as a solo traveler it'll do the trick.

This little cabana is well located to get around from and backs onto a beautiful swimming bay. There are a few walkable restaurants and breakfast places.

The place is clean and has most things you need for comfort. I didn’t experience much noise from local bar at night and only encountered one other guest briefly.
The host is not visible but does answer emails, not always immediately,  but she did come through for me when needed.

Would stay here again for convenience, budget and for swimming :)

This place is wonderful for solo travelers. You enter via code, there are books, towels and beach gear for common use in common home areas. You have a laundry, optional parking (I parked across the bridge everytime and had no problems), a hose to rinse off when coming in, steps on entry. This place was very clean other than some mess in the kitchen. There was no mirror in my room and it would have really helped. There’s no ac in the house so it’s warm but there is ac in the rooms and fans making optimal sleeping conditions possible.

This is a great place for a solo traveler. Location is great but you will definitely need a car to go around, there is a few things around but not that much. It’s a 3 bedrooms flat so expect roommates, the bathroom is big and clean. There is AC is the rooms but the common room can be really hot. Internet works well. I didn’t found it super noisy as expected, maybe being there in September is quieter. Overall a great place!

Wonderful choice for solo travelers! One of the best deals on the island I could find. The room was private and had an air conditioning unit which was great. Solveig thought of everything to make a guest’s stay comfortable and convenient. Host was very welcoming. Very clean, a bit cluttered but I didn’t mind, still very clean and well kept. 

Location is GREAT, BUT that area is very congested. I recommend taking her up on $9 parking/day if you decide to rent a car- otherwise you will need to park elsewhere and walk to the unit. 

The noise wasn’t bad- earplugs are provided if needed. Great restaurants within walking distance and Kalapaki Beach is absolutely beautiful. I highly recommend this beach cabana for solo travelers looking to save a little $$.
Great place to stay very close to the beach!

Small room in shared home in downtown Lihue, and exactly what I needed for this trip. Noise wasn't an issue if you had ear plugs, and the AC worked well in covering up outside noise and cooling down the space. The bathroom was great, and there weren't any issues with folks needing the bathroom at the same time (to be honest I was there a whole week and didn't see either of the other guests).  Only issue was when I got in after an 18hr trip at 9pm, the room wasn't cleaned made and I had to wait about 30 mins to get that resolved. 
Life happens, it was just frustrating. Abby (the cat) is such a sweetheart. It was hard to see how lonely she was though while I was there since Solveig wasn't around.

Solveig's place was as close as you could get to the beach. Plenty of parking and really, the karaoke was mildly noticeable and with the earplugs supplied absolutely not an issue. Shave ice place 15m from door an unexpected and welcome bonus.
If you want convenience to the Airport and perfect local amenities this place is perfect.A little noisy outside at nite did not bother me
Fantastic Air BnB!

A simple, but clean, twin bed space in a home shared by others.
Basic. but truly adequate, especially for someone hardly there.

The location was absolutely perfect. The beach is right there, the Marriott is right next door and I loved doing karaoke at the tavern. Everything I wanted to do was within walking distance. Check-in was really smooth.
This place is the best!! Prime location and has everything you need :)

Solveig's place was a delight to stay at. If you are traveling on your own and appreciate the at-home feel of coming and going on your own time, you will love this place! Clean and accommodating. Mahalo for the hospitable stay!

Die Lage ist toll, allerdings sehr laut. Es liegen aber Ohrstöpsel bereit, falls jemand den Lärm der Bar und der Hühner nicht ertragen kann. Für mich war es in Ordnung. Die Dusche war schlimm. Der Duschkopf und seine gesamte Anlage ist abgebrochen und nicht brauchbar. Wenn man duschen will, muss man unter den harten Strahl stehen, der direkt aus der Wand kommt. Regulieren kann man die Stärke des Strahls nicht, ausser man will kalt duschen. Ich habe durch die Bilder und Ausschreibung xefinitiv mehr erwartet und würde nicht noch einmal dort hin gehen.

Solveig’s place was great for the price and location! You will have noise problems with the tavern, even with the earplugs and white noise. This is definitely a great price to get compared to the rest of the area, though!
Great location and very clean place!

Perfect for a solo traveler, comfortable bed, air conditioning, full kitchen, living room, and bathroom shared by 3 guests. Was able to find street parking with a few waits for a spot to open up. Friendly cat. Very clean, and centrally located for visiting all parts of Kauai. I stayed 5 nights; unfortunately did not get to meet Solveig.  Noise from traffic/bar was a little annoying, but using the air conditioning as "white noise" helped block most of it out (and ear plugs are provided if you want them).

Great place , close to everything. I did however forget about the bay around the corner , would have been great for a snorkle. Which you should do while visiting ,the Pacific is so full of life. Go to dukes for hula pie and the beach hut across the street for breakfast. Don’t   miss the Portuguese sausage . Abby the house cat is super sweet and vocal, I enjoyed her company. The bar next door had some good local beers , the noise wasn’t a bother at all. If your like me you’ll be to tired from running all , you’ll be fast asleep. Higly recommend this location!!
It was difficult to find the house but the room was so comfortable and had good amenities.

The description given is accurate, but room 1 is very small and I felt cramped-even for 1 person. Everything was clean and well decorated. I only stayed 1 night and enjoyed how close it is to the airport  (just 6 minutes, driving!), and restaurants, all very conveniently literally next door.   I’d recommend paying for the parking offered. Room 2 looked much more spacious.

The check-in was smooth and easy, and the room and shared spaces had everything I wanted or needed.  The location is great, being close to one of the most popular beaches on the island as well as a good selection of places to eat.  I especially recommend the taro fries at the food stand next door.  I know it sounds weird, but they were delicious!  I had a great stay!

This place is great! Essentially right on the beach, and next to a Marriott hotel. Check-in was well explained. On -site parking was worth the $9 per night. Not for light sleepers, but noise didn’t bother me
Nice apartment. Close to the action (and earplugs are offered in case of any noise). Clean and simple.
A beautiful place, with  wonderful host.

Great value for the money especially compared to hotels in Kawai that are charging at least 3 to 5 times more than the Cabana. You can actually get a good night's sleep if you don't forget to use the ear plugs. There lots of good restaurants and bars to choose from that are just a stone's throw away.
Ich kann die Unterkunft von Zollberg nur empfehlen. Die Nähe zum Strand und das quirlige Leben in der Nähe hat mir sehr gefallen. Außerdem war es ein guter Standort um die Insel zu erkunden.

Great place to stay when travelling alone. The location is a perfect starting place on the island, in between the North and South shores - I personally preferred travelling to South-West (Waimea ftw! and the alternate route to hwy50 via Hulemalu rd was also a fun drive - but don't head there to go W during rush hour around 4pm as you would have to turn L onto a busy highway) but both directions have their goods. Definitely recommend a car to really explore the island, worth the rental and gas though going past Hanelei is currently closed from last year's landslide. Beach is close by and well taken care of with beach vball courts, surfers to watch and rental equipment available. Lots of towels, boogie boards, etc. are provided - even board games in the home. There is a friendly cat chilling in the place - just be careful to shut your door in case you don't want it coming into your space. A/C is there if you need it, though when I was there opening the window was usually enough with the wind coming through. As to the parking -  there is parking across the bridge (watch out for the pot holes in the lot!) however I found that with people visiting the beach/restaurants, getting parking from 3-8pm (plus I was there from Thurs-Sat) can be very difficult - you may want to consider paying for parking if you might be arriving during these busy times. There is lots of parking farther down past the "paved" area but be prepared the HUGE potholes and dirt/water (as you would find at some of the other beach parking lots) . A local warned me not to park in that area overnight because of the risk to the vehicle as well as myself as the area is very dark. Overall, would stay here again if I were travelling by myself - this area is great for the first time traveller so that you can explore or for those who don't get a rental vehicle.

name: Douro Virtudes in the historical city center
summary: O edifício em que o apartamento está inserido é um edifício recentemente renovado para os padrões contemporâneos, localizado numa das ruas mais históricas da "cidade velha". A localização é muito central e mantém a vida de vizinhança autêntica. Uma localização de excelência onde se pode percorrer as principais artérias da cidade a pé. Brilho e design tornam este apartamento num lugar excecional.
space: Todo o apartamento fica acessível para os hóspedes e fica no 4ºpiso do edifício . O apartamento está totalmente mobilado e tem todas as comodidades: - área de quarto com cama king-size (160 X 200)  - cama de viagem para crianças até 4 anos ( a pedido) - casa de banho com duche e secador de cabelo  - Roupa de cama e toalhas  - cozinha aberta bem equipada, com fogão, frigorífico, microondas, jarro eléctrico, torradeira, máquina de café, e todos os utensílios de cozinha, pratos, copos, talheres; - área de jantar para 3 pessoas; - sala com sofá-cama  (108 X 180) - TV e internet wi-fi gratuita; Todas as roupas de cama e toalhas incluídas. Após uma semana, será trocada a roupa de cama e feita uma limpeza geral ao apartamento sem custo extra.
description: O edifício em que o apartamento está inserido é um edifício recentemente renovado para os padrões contemporâneos, localizado numa das ruas mais históricas da "cidade velha". A localização é muito central e mantém a vida de vizinhança autêntica. Uma localização de excelência onde se pode percorrer as principais artérias da cidade a pé. Brilho e design tornam este apartamento num lugar excecional. Todo o apartamento fica acessível para os hóspedes e fica no 4ºpiso do edifício . O apartamento está totalmente mobilado e tem todas as comodidades: - área de quarto com cama king-size (160 X 200)  - cama de viagem para crianças até 4 anos ( a pedido) - casa de banho com duche e secador de cabelo  - Roupa de cama e toalhas  - cozinha aberta bem equipada, com fogão, frigorífico, microondas, jarro eléctrico, torradeira, máquina de café, e todos os utensílios de cozinha, pratos, copos, talheres; - área de jantar para 3 pessoas; - sala com sofá-cama  (108 X 180) - TV e internet wi-fi gratuita; Toda
neighborhood_overview: O bairro fica no coração da cidade: lojas, bares e restaurantes, lojas de design ou boutiques vintage, o metro e comboio estão nas proximidades. Em poucos minutos a pé, pode chegar a locais históricos emblemáticos da cidade: Clérigos, Livraria Lello, Praça da Liberdade, Rua das Flores, Sé Catedral, ... O rio Douro fica a cerca de 10 minutos a pé. O Porto é  a cidade perfeita para explorar a pé. Em cerca de 10/15 minutos a pé, consegue alcançar: - Avenida dos Aliados e o emblemático Café Guarany; - Mercado do Bolhão, Rua de Santa Catarina (shopping) e café Majestic; - Sé Catedral e várias outras igrejas, como a Igreja do Carmo, Igreja de São Francisco, Igreja de Santo Ildefonso, etc; - Caves do Vinho do Porto; - Jardins do Palácio de Cristal.  Não perca o por do sol nas Virtudes! um ótimo local para apreciar o pôr do sol ou apenas relaxar. Pequeno jardim com uma excelente vista sobre o rio. É um ponto de encontro no final do dia, depois do trabalho …  Excelente ambiente, música e cervej
transit: Em transporte público (estação de metro Trindade, com ligação ao Aeroporto - 15 minutos a pé; estação de S. Bento, de comboio e de metro - 10 minutos a pé; autocarros urbanos, turísticos e o eléctrico Porto Tram City Tour -  estão a poucos minutos de distância: - Casa da Música (concertos); - Museu de Serralves (Museu de Arte Moderna); - Parque da Cidade e Foz do Douro. Esperamos por si, com a melhor tradição da hospitalidade portuguesa!
access: Eu estarei sempre disponível pela plataforma AirBnB, tentando responder no melhor prazo de tempo possível. Eu irei receber-vos, mostrar o apartamento e falar um pouco sobre a minha cidade, dando algumas dicas de sítios para visitar, comer e beber!  No caso de alguma emergência podem sempre contar comigo.
interaction: Aproveitem e desfrutem, caminhem e descubram esta cidade fantástica!
house_rules: No check-in todos os hospedes estrangeiros, independentemente da idade, têm que mostrar identificação.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: I stayed with a couple of friend and it was a very nice surprise. The house is brand new, had everything we needed and the location is perfect. It is a 5 minute walk from the city center (Torre dos Clérigos) and it is 50m way from a beautiful viewpoint over the Douro river. Florinda was a very though full host and she even received was with a few nice surprises!

Amazing! What a great place. Nice and very handsome host, stylish rooms. I enjoyed my vacation in that apartment very well. I can highly recommend this host. A nice hint for German tourists, Florinda speaks fluent German, that is good for local tips. 

Amazing time, and beautiful in every detail.
Florinda is a great host! Her place is beautiful, very clean, and the space is in an ideal part of town—very close to everything, great restaurants and night life!

Super séjour à Porto. Florinda est très accueillante et très disponible pour fournir des conseils sur Porto et répondre aux questions. L'appartement est très bien placé dans Porto, très propre et très bien aménagé. Très bonne expérience. Je recommande

The apartment is small, but perfect for 2-3 people, located centrally, very new, clean and has all the basic things in the kitchen. Florinda is a super nice and warm person, who was able to help us with anything, had personal recommendations and also sells tickets to the main attractions. If you choose Porto, it is a really nice place to stay! Thank you Florinda for making our stay like at home :)
Florinda is a very lovely and welcoming host with a cozy and stylish apartment at an excellent location! We really enjoyed our stay and will be back soon! Thanks again! :)

This is an amazing stay. Florinda is a very friendly and nice woman. She gave us local tips and explain everything to us. I felt so welcomed and enjoy the stay so much. I would rate it as a 5 stars accommodation! Amazing and excellent!

Notre séjour chez florinda a été notre meilleure expérience airbnb depuis 8 ans. Tout est comme sur les photos, parfaitement situé, très propre et en excellent état. Mais ce qui ne peut pas apparaître sur les photos c'est l’extrême gentillesse de florinda, sa disponibilité et l’amour qu’elle porte à son travail. Nous reviendrons c’est sûr et nous recommanderons à toutes les personnes voulant découvrir Porto !

Séjour exceptionnel !
L'appartement de Florinda est parfait !   Moderne, lumineux, propre, fonctionnel à proximité de tous les centre d'intérêt de Porto
Florinda est une hôte exceptionnelle elle est accueillante, sympathique, disponible et fournit de très bons conseils 
Appartement à recommander sans aucune réserve 
Tout y est parfait ! 
Qu'une envie : y retourner !

Nous avons adoré notre séjour chez Florinda. C’était notre deuxième venue à Porto donc nous savions que c’était notre quartier préféré. Florinda est très gentille et parle parfaitement français. L’appartement est propre et très joliment décoré. En bref, nous vous conseillons ce logement au cœur de Porto.

숙소는 생 벤투역과 렐루 서점 가까이 위치해 있고, 저희는 교통편을 이용한 적 없이 포루토 시내는 다 걸어다닐 수 있었습니다.
아주 깨끗했고요, 침대도 편안 했어요 ! 베란다가 있어서 아침이면 포루토 대성당을 바라 보는데 좋았어요. 무엇보다도 가장 좋았던 점은 호스트 분이 정말 정말 친절하세요.
필요한 정보를 다 알려주셨고, 포루토 여행을 잘 할 수 있도록 도움을 많이 주셨습니다. 제 친구는 지금까지 만난 최고의 호스트였대요. 정말 너무 좋은 호스트를 만나 포루토의 좋은 기억만 안고 갑니다. 

Appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier historique. 
Florinda est très sympa et responsable. Elle nous a donné tous les informations sur Porto. 
C'était très belle expérience !
Superbe host !

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Florinda.
L’appartement est très bien situé.Très cosy et très propre.
Nous sommes à quelques minutes à pied des rives du quartier Ribeira et du pont Luis.
Nous recommandons le logement de Florinda!

Très bel appartement, joliment décoré, très pratique, très propre. L'emplacement est idéal : tout est accessible à pied. Nombreux (bons) restaurants à proximité (CanaVerde, Intrigo, Hungry biker...). Florinda est une hôte d'une grande gentillesse, très attentionnée et qui fourni de très bons renseignements (merci, sincèrement). Nous recommandons fortement !

Florindas apartment is modern decorated, comfortable and very clean. You have all you need to prepare a meal, it feels like home. 
Location is perfect, everything is very close (city center and all the main attractions), so you can enjoy and explore Porto by foot.
For breakfast or brunch there is a great place called "Hungry biker" which is only 30meters from the building.
Florinda is nice, helpful and sweet host with great tips for exploring the town.
We had a great time Porto, left few places unesen so that we have to come back and of course we will sleep in Florindas place. Highly recommended!

name: Aos pés da praia de Ipanema, compacto e econômico
summary: Localizado em rua nobre do bairro, a 50 metros do mar de Ipanema ! Região excelente para quem planeja fazer tudo a pé, cercado de mercados, bares, restaurantes, metrô e o melhor: a menos de 5 minutos de caminhada da Praia de Ipanema.
space: Este aconchegante apartamento fica localizado em um dos melhores "Points" do Rio de Janeiro. Uma ótima opção para quem quer ficar em um ponto estratégico com o charme de Carioca. Localizado no charmoso bairro de Ipanema, conta uma grande diversidade de bares , restaurantes chiques, supermercados, boates e academias. O apartamento é um loft com uma cama de casal (super confortável) e banheiro.  Oferecemos roupas de cama e banho de excelente qualidade. Além disso também tem: WiFi de alta velocidade, TV , ar condicionado e TV a cabo. Apesar de não ter cozinha, disponibilizamos frigobar e um microondas. É solicitado cópia do passaporte ou da identidade.

É solicitado cópia do passaporte ou da identidade. Todo o Apartamento Estou sempre disponível para o que precisarem, antes e durante a estadia! Assim que a res
neighborhood_overview: Próximo a restaurantes, bares, supermercados, academias, metro e na quadra da Praia de Ipanema
transit: Ônibus, metrô, taxi e bicicleta
access: Todo o Apartamento
interaction: Estou sempre disponível para o que precisarem, antes e durante a estadia! Assim que a reserva for efetuada, você receberá minhas informações de contato. :)
house_rules: 1) O apartamento situa-se em edifício residencial. Não é permitido fazer barulho no apartamento que possa incomodar os vizinhos. (Lei do Silêncio -22:00 Hs) 2) Não jogue papel higiênico/absorvente/etc. no vaso sanitário; 3) O Locatário se compromete a enviar uma lista com nome completo e documento de identidade de todas as pessoas que ficarão no apartamento durante o período contratado, não podendo exceder o número de pessoas estipuladas na reserva. Não é permitida a entrada no prédio de pessoas que não constem na lista fornecida. Para receber eventuais convidados, o Locatário deverá informar o nome completo e identidade do visitante, com pelo menos 48 horas de antecedência, para aprovação do Locador e autorização de entrada na portaria. O não cumprimento dessa regra está sujeito ao cancelamento da reserva, sem reembolso da mesma.; 4) Separe o lixo orgânico do reciclável, dispensando-os em sacos de lixo diferentes; 5) Não é permitido circulação de pessoas com trajes desapropriados no c

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde 2011 e sou um grande fã da Plataforma. Tudo que conquistei foi graças ao sucesso no Airbnb!

Minha experiência começou quando recebi um flat da minha avó através de herança (em vida!!), investi pesado na reforma do apartamento para poder oferecer o maior conforto possível aos meus hóspedes. Comecei a administrar seu aluguel e o sucesso foi tão grande que mudou a minha vida!

Meus amigos e familiares viram como o meu “negócio” estava dando certo e começaram a pedir para que eu também administrasse o aluguel dos apartamentos deles (nessa época ainda não existia a figura do co-host). 

Topei o desafio e o número de apartamentos foi se multiplicando! O resultado foi ótimo e percebi que me sentia muito realizado com as experiências que estava ganhando como empreendedor e ao conhecer pessoas de tantos lugares do mundo! De tal maneira que decidi largar meu emprego como gestor em marketing para me dedicar exclusivamente a vocês!

Fiz um curso de guia de turismo para ter mais conhecimento sobre a cidade e abri a All in Rio, uma Agência de Turismo que oferece tours culturais, naturais e de aventura, além do aluguel de apartamentos de temporada.

Meu objetivo é oferecer uma estadia segura, confortável e poder fornecer todas as informações necessárias para você desfrutar ao máximo a sua experiência em nossa cidade maravilhosa! 

Obrigado pela atenção!

Fabio

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi!

I've been on Airbnb since 2011 and I’m a big fan of the Platform. All I got was thanks to my success on Airbnb!

My experience began when I received a flat from my grandmother through inheritance (in life!!). I invested heavily in the renovation of the apartment to be able to offer the greatest comfort possible to my guests. I started managing the rent and the success was so amazing that it changed my life!

My friends and family noticed how well my "business" was going and started to ask me to manage their apartment’s rent too (at the time, the figure of  the co-host didn’t exist).

I accepted the challenge and the number of apartments was multiplying! The result was great and I realized that I felt very fulfilled with the experiences I was gaining as an entrepreneur and by meeting people from so many places in the world! So I decided to leave my job as a marketing manager to dedicate myself exclusively to you!

I took a tour guide course to gain more knowledge about the city and opened the All in Rio, a Tourism Agency that offers cultural, natural and adventure tours, as well as apartments for seasonal rents.

My goal is to offer you a safe and comfortable stay and to be able to provide all the information necessary so you can enjoy your experience in our wonderful city to the fullest!

Thank you for your time!

Fabio
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from my guests:

“This apartment is in the most amazing location. Leblon is beautiful, safe, and packed with fabulous restaurants. The apartment is just by the ocean - couldn't really be better. Communicating with Fabio was super-easy. He was really responsive and helpful. We are missing it already!” - Ed Pilkington (UK)
“Fabio goes far and beyond the average host, my trip was a day earlier than I booked and I would have been stuck with no place to stay but Fabio personally went out of his way to get the place ready for me, great guy and will always go to him first when traveling to Rio. Thank again Fabio abs!!” - Darren Sanford (USA)
“O apartamento é lindo como nas fotos e a localização é perfeita! O Fábio é super atencioso e respondeu super rápido nossas dúvidas. Recomendo muito!” - Bruna Ferrary Deniz (Brasil)
“The apartment was better than we could have imagined. The photos don't do it justice. The place is huge, in a great location. Fabio was a very accommodating host. I would definitely stay there again.” - Jordan Giordano (USA)
“Our stay at Fabio’s place was fantastic! The apartment is simply beautiful and it made us feel at home. Super stylish and cozy. We are very particular about the properties we stay at, and this one exceeded our expectations The apartment description was very accurate! We loved being so close to the beach and all the great restaurants around. Thank you very much!”- Pablo Perez (Canadá)
“Fabio was a perfect host.  He answered promptly all our questions and is a really nice guy!”- Daniela (Brasil)
 “Fabio is the perfect host. Friendly and extremely helpful”.- Soren (Denmark)
 “It is really difficult for me to put down in words how grateful I am to Fabio! He is a wonderful host and a GREAT person!”- Justine (Dubai)
“Más que anfitriones, hicimos una linda amistad. Gracias por todo... “- Leo y Aura (Colombia)
“Fabio is a very friendly and considerate person and clearly takes great care of the apartment”.- Jonathan (Spain)
“New to Rio? You should definitely speak to these guys.”- Vitaly (Russia)
 “Fabio is an amazing host with a deep concern for his guests' comfort. We feel that we now have a good friend in Rio!”- Ali (Canada)

reviews.comments: Ótima localização, local seguro.

name: CHARMING APARTMENT IN MONTREAL FOR 4 PEOPLE
summary: Charming apartment in the district of the Spectacles in Montreal, for 4 people.
space: Bright, modern and fully equipped 1100sf condo suited for a maximum of 4 people... You will be located in the much coveted “Quartier des Spectacles” sector, close to the Champs de Mars metro station located on the Orange line. Perfect for couples, families or business travelers! - ACCOMMODATION –  Bright, modern and fully equipped 1100sf condo suited for a maximum of 4 people... You will be located in the much coveted “Quartier des Spectacles” sector, close to the Champs de Mars metro station located on the Orange line. Amenities: • Living-room: television, dining table for 4 people and comfortable couches. • Kitchen: fridge, kettle, dishwasher, Nespresso coffee pod machine, toaster, microwave, oven. • 1st bedroom: queen size bed, dresser, nightstand and access to private balcony. • 2nd bedroom: queen size bed, dresser, nightstand. • Full ensuite washroom: bathtub, shower and toilet. • Half bath in main hallway. Outside: • Terrace: 2 balconies on either side of the condo with comfortab

house_rules: IMPORTANT : check in is between 3pm and 9pm, check out is at last at 11am. You will be asked to provide an official ID upon arrival, in the name of the person who did the reservation. If you have booked in the name of a friend or family member, please tell me the soonest possible and inform the person that an official ID will be asked on arrival. I count on you and your friend/family to take care of my apartment as you would do for yours! The cleaning is included but I kindly ask you to take out the trash and wash your dishes. Thank you for your understanding :slightly_smiling_face: I look forward to welcoming you!

Robert

reviews.comments:
Robert’s apartment was very spacious and easily accommodates four. My experience was very clean, and tastefully minimalist.

The location is unrivaled- a five minute walk from Old Montreal, and truly in the heart of the city.

I highly recommend to anyone exploring the area for the first time.

Our stay was perfect! No other words. 
The apt is as described, sunny, well equipped, very quiet although super close to the main busy areas! We will come back and book again!
We had a great stay at Robert's place, the location was fantastic and the apartment was super clean and spacious. Would definitely stay here again. Recommended!

Robert's place was great and he was very quick with responses! Also, the location was great--I would not hesitate to stay here again. The place was so close to public transportation and an IGA to stock up on food. It was clean and spacious. The internet was a bit on the slow side at times, but we could stream Netflix (there was some buffering required).

There are a few things that I think could be improved. We were two couples staying at the apartment, but we were only supplied with one set of keys and we told we could not have another set. This was very inconvenient for two different couples that wanted to do different things. Also, there was an issue with the oven--we used it to make a frozen pizza, but whoever installed it had left the paper instructions (which were on top of the broiler coil as this is an electric stove) and some other debris in it, like a hard piece of plastic and metal (which were underneath the oven coil at the bottom in the far back corner). We did not see these before we turned the oven on due to their specific locations, so a small fire broke out in the oven. There was no fire extinguisher, so we had to throw water on it. No damage occurred, but it was scary and annoying that no one took these flammable materials out of the oven. Plus there was an awful burning plastic smell after due to the plastic starting on fire. We were lucky the paper instructions did not ignite.
Great place, in a great location. Would definitely recommend.

Robert's place was in a great location to explore Montreal and enjoy the comedy festival.  The home was extremely clean and very spacious.  Beds were a little low but comfortable and we had no issues sleeping.  Air Conditioning worked fine. Having the 1 1/2 bathrooms made getting ready much quicker.  Have the washer\dryer was also nice though we did not use them.  

The highlights like i said was that it was clean and the location.  We were able to walk to most all locations.  We did take metro which was nearby (Champs de Mar 1 Block away).   Street parking was not clear where we could park nearby so we parked at Complexe Desjardins nearby for the duration of our stay.

I would stay here again when we visit Montreal.

Robert's place is well located in Montreal, it takes less than 5 min to the next Metro station and less than 10 min to the Old Town. Berri UQAM area, China town and the Quartier de Spectacles are also within walking distance. 
The place is very spacious and clean, and provided a perfect Homebase for a family of 4 during our stay.
Wonderful location for city tour. Stylish furnishings.  Washer/drier on site. Bring your own coffee pot or plan on using individual kcup pot on-site.
Great location! Basic amenities in well maintained condo.
Great location near Old Montreal and the metro but apartment could be cleaner. Check your towels on check in. WiFi very slow.
Superbe appartement en plein coeur de Montréal! Je recommande vivement!
Great place to stay with the subway right across the street which made things extremely convenient.

Robert's place was just right for our visit.  The location was ideal for traveling by subway and the airport bus was just a couple blocks away.  We would love to visit again, as Montreal was a wonderful city with lots of places to explore.
Robert’s Place was clean and spacious and in a great location, walking distance to old Montreal and easy walk to the metro station.  We had a great time in Montreal and would stay there again.

Unit was spotless and airy. Well appointed apartment with comfortable furniture and high end appliances in the kitchen, including Nespresso coffee maker. Large main bathroom with separate tub and shower and decent half bath. Lots of space for two couples or small family. Very close to Metro station and within walking distance to coffee shops, grocery store and many restaurants. Close proximity to Old Montreal and all its perks. Excellent communication with owner and unit manager. Highly recommend for anyone needing a home away from home while visiting Montréal.
trés beau logement , trés bien situé
Roberts place is in a great location.  However, It could have been cleaner.  With a bit more effort this place could get a much better review from me.

Very nice, clean centrally located apartment. Luckey Homes did the great job with everything and Robert's communication was good. Highly recommend if you want a spot that's in close proximity to everything and has some old building charm.

Good apartment, well located.  Basically furnished.  Quiet despite being very centrally located.  Easy access to Metro.  Luckey Homes easily contacted and responded quickly when we had an issue with Wi-Fi (quickly resolved).
Great spot!

Robert and his team were amazing! They made sure we were prepared every step of the way. The location is prime for all tourist attractions and for taking the subway. It was exactly what was listed. I wouldn’t change a thing.
I would never stay anywhere else again! Momo!!!!

We had a wonderful time in Montreal. Robert’s flat is in a great part of town and we enjoyed the neighbourhood. Apartment is spacious, quiet, and kitchen had necessities for cooking. 
On the downside, we found the beds and pillows very uncomfortable and the wifi did not work well.
Nice place. very clean. Good communication prior to arriving.

Robert’s place was very clean and the location to the metro was perfect (less than 5 min walk).  The apartment had lots of light and very comfortable.  The second bathroom was nice to have.  Checking in and out was very easy.  We were contacted regarding check in a couple of days before arrival and again a day before departure.  We would definitely like to stay there again.  I would recommend staying here.
Great place, super clean and tidy.  Highly recommend it.
O espaço é muito organizado, limpo e moderno. Ficamos felizes com a hospedagem quanto a localização e a beleza da vista panorâmica! O apartamento é incrível!
Great location.
Very clean condo, close to downtown, Chinatown, and a subway station close to the subway hub.
Wifi is not so great and bed mattresses aren't that great, but the location and price is amazing
Propre et très bien situé, il manque par contre d'accessoires, il a fallu aller s'acheter du papier de toilette par exemple, pour le reste c'étais ok
Lots of open space and great value.

The location was great and the apartment is located on a quiet side street, which is nice when you’re staying in downtown Montreal.  The price was fair for the location and quality of the home.  The mattresses were incredibly uncomfortable and the beds were so loud, I would be woken up any time my husband rolled over during the night.  Robert was very quick to respond to any of our questions and concerns which was a great benefit especially when our check-in time was changed (delayed flights) and he was extremely accommodating with changing the check-in time to suit our needs.
Good location and nice space
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour. Le logement est spacieux, propre et bien situé. Bonne communication. La décoration mériterait d'être remise au goût du jour.
Grand logement bien situé et tranquille. Prix compétitif. Accueil bien organisé. Toutefois, propreté qui laissait malheureusement à désirer lors de notre séjour.

Loved staying in Robert’s apartment! Very fair price for the place, which is located in a great spot. Most popular attractions in Montreal are within walking distance, and the place is in close proximity to a grocery store. Having Netflix, along with other apps, available on the TV was a pleasant surprise. The WiFi also worked very well. The only thing to be wary of if traveling by car and looking for somewhere to park it for your stay, street parking is not available, so research parking garages ahead (there are some available within walking distance). I’d recommend doing a parking garage especially if you are staying during the winter season.

Super zentral gelegene und geräumige Wohnung. Sehr ordentlich und sauber. Die Küche und das Geschirr waren teilweise etwas klebrig. Robert war jederzeit erreichbar und der Check-In verlief reibungslos. Einzigstes Problem: Wer mit dem Auto anreist sollte sich auf massive Parkplatzprobleme gefasst machen. Teilweise muss man bis zu eine Stunde suchen, da man vor dem Haus nicht parken kann und allgemein fast überall am Tag bezahlen muss.

Location of Roberts apartment was perfect and within walking distance to many areas in Montreal. Check in was easy and the place was clean on arrival. Wifi, tv and all mentioned amenities worked perfect. Would stay again!!

name: Cozy Luxury Apartment Downtown MTL
summary: *****REVEW: There are 4 pools and great outdoor living areas.The outside pool was great and was open even when it was snowing and the hot tub and cold tub made it even nicer. The building is right next to the old Forum and is close to everything. There is direct access to a super market right from the elevator.The apartment is very clean, the bed with sheets ultra soft and some details like the Nespresso makes it like a 5 star hotel Perfect. We had a great time Thanks Vincent
space: Ce condo est généreusement équipé de toutes les commodités qui seront certainement à votre goût:  • Situé au 9 ème étage 1ere phase donnant une très belle vue  • Salon, salle à manger et cuisine style américaine en espace ouvert avec des proportions généreuses.  •Aussi, vous pouvez profiter de l'immeuble: - 3 piscines sur le toit et une piscine 4 saisons. - Barbecue et salle de jeux.  • Chalet urbain ( plus cheminée ) avec des vues à couper le souffle sur tout Montréal -  • Salle de sport, gym, musculation, salle de yoga. • Une grande chambre à coucher.  • Salle de bain moderne avec douche et bain Superbe.  • laveuse / sécheuse dans l'appartement • Cuisinière, réfrigérateur fourni, lave vaisselle.  • Chauffage central et a/c avec contrôle individuel et climatiseur avec contrôle individuele . • Wi-Fi, TV et télévision. ( NETFLIX ) L'emplacement est vraiment idéal: Une des zones les plus populaires et les plus désirables de Montréal.  Sur la rue Sainte-Catherine, la principale rue commer

access: Ils auront accès à tout ce qui est écrit dans la description.  parking public devant l immeuble.
interaction: Nous pourrons communiquer en Live, par e-mail, telephone etc. Tous les moyens sont possible.

reviews.comments: Excellent emplacement, hôte très fiable. Équipements très complets dans la cuisine, même des flûtes à champagne
