Hello...you can contact me anytime and I am a helpful person.
Welcome to Hongkong

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: Sunseekers Walk To Kamaole Beach I
summary: One Bedroom Apartment With Large Lanai With Ground floor, super clean unit in one of maui's favorite south kihei complexes. Across the street from the great kamaole beach park. Six tennis courts, three pools and lots of barbecues.Rate includes 14.42% local taxes.
description: One Bedroom Apartment With Large Lanai With Ground floor, super clean unit in one of maui's favorite south kihei complexes. Across the street from the great kamaole beach park. Six tennis courts, three pools and lots of barbecues.Rate includes 14.42% local taxes.

reviews.comments: The wife and I spent five days at Mark's apartment in Kihei. It is a great place - very comfortable, clean, well furnished and well lit, a couple of minutes walk from Charley Young beach and located close to the major highways of Maui. Mark was super responsive to emails and our entire stay went very smoothly. Would definitely recommend this place to any of our friends.
Great location with well stocked apt.
Our host, Mark was very prompt and friendly in our communications. He shared information about his place as well as giving us some advice about nearby restaurants.
Nice and clean place to stay in Kihei.a lot of amenities...great location... Absolutely recommend

The description of the apartment was very accurate. Mark gave us all the resources necessary to enjoy our stay in Maui and really let us do our own thing. You get a real local feel of Maui and it served as the perfect home base for when we decided to check out other parts of the island. All in all, you get what you pay for, and I'd recommend this apartment to friends & family.
We enjoyed the stay and proximity to everything!
Mark answered my questions quickly and provided the items that I needed. He resolved the door code issue fairly quickly.

L'acces au logement se fait vraiment facilement et ce, via un code. Un beau panier de produits locaux nous attendait pour notre arrivée. Tous les produits ménagers (papier toilette, savon vaiselle, savon linge, etc.) étaient fournis. Tous les articles de plage ainsi qu'un lit de bébé étaient disponible. 
Belle piscine! A proximité de belles plages, restaurants et supermarché. 
Le complexe date des annees 70 et l'appartement ne semble pas avoir été renové depuis.
Host was very responsive and communication was clear. Place was just as  described but could have been a bit cleaner.
交通很便利,马路对面就是海滩｡房间设施很全,房东想得很周到｡房东很友善,我们误把房间的东西带走丢在租车公司,房东还主动去取回了,很感谢｡在基黑的几天很愉快!

Ladies and Gentlemen,

this condo is superb! It is so well located in Kihei, a pretty laidback town with lots of nice restaurants and spare time activity offers, right next to the beach.
The appartment is fully equipped with everything you need for an outstanding beach vacation. Chairs, towels and snorkeling equipment. First we were worried, because we flew only with carry-ons but Marks appartment had everything we needed and did not bring by ourselves. 

Also, it is very clean and has an AC. The tennis court is right next to the appartment door as well as the BBQ area. 

Mark did provide us with all required information upfront so that a smooth check-in was possible.

There is nothing left to say besides: Thank You for this amazing experience Mark.

Mark's Sunseekers apartment is a wonderful place to stay! Mark is a fantastic host and went beyond expectations to make us feel very welcomed (and special!). The apartment has everything you need to relax, make dinner, enjoy breakfasts on the lanai. Plus there is a pool and a BBQ area very close by - both of which are very nice and we made good use of them. The apartment is clean and well equipped. The location is great. We spent a day in our car exploring the beaches and snorkel spots north of Kihei, and the next day doing the same south of Kihei. Just wonderful. Highly recommend both this accommodation and this location. I hope we can come back sometime.

Great Location Your will not have to go looking for amenities Mark has thought of everything you will need. He also took extra step by leaving such a nice gift for your arrival. We will definitely come back here.

Mark's house is very good!
so, recommend

Perfect place to stay with my little family.  It had a nice pool to cool off, all the things you need for dining in.  Close to the beach and to resteraunts and stores.  When I had an issue with chevking out in time (totally my fault) Mark was there wen I called and was understanding snd helpful.  I would totally stay here again if the opportunity ever arose.

Great location! Super clean, comfortable and well furnished. Responsive host who provided unexpected condo amenities upon arrival. Look forward to staying again at Mark's place as soon as I am able to return to Kihei!

We loved our stay.  The place was great:  clean, nice furnishings, and well located.  We used the BBQs and the pool in the complex. Parking good: never had a problem finding a good spot near the unit.  Mark also provided beach toys (example boogie boards) which were a lot of fun for the kids.  The unit was spacious, with large closets.  The in-unit laundry was a huge bonus.  Great location - a short stroll away from a lovely beach to watch the sun set.  Highly recommended!  Would love to stay here again.

Bei Mark fühlt man sich vom ersten Augenblick an wohl! Alles ist sehr sauber und heimelig eingerichtet. Das Appartment hat Vollaustattung, es ist von der Waschmaschine bis zum Geschirrspüler alles da. 
Es wird auch alles für den Strand angeboten, inkl. der tollen Tommy Bahama-Stühle! 
Ein paar Willkommensgoodies machen das Ankommen sehr angenehm. Jederzeit wieder würden wir bei Mark einchecken!! Mahalo
OK place given the location.
The host canceled this reservation 248 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location, walkable to many beaches and restaurants. Well equipped with the things we needed.

Mark's location on the south portion of Maui was only walking distance from several beaches and restaurants. You will truly enjoy staying here. There are also several amenities which include a pool, BBQ, and tennis courts! This place was truly a nice "home away from home" to return to after a long day of exploring Maui. Mahalo and aloha for now!
Great place.  Great location.  EVERYTHING you need and more.

We were 3 girls and stayed a whole week in Marc's apparment. We had a blast. The condo had everything we needed. From beach towels and beach  umbrellas to kitchen supplies. Beach and pools we're super close. Marc responded immediately and was a great host. Definitely a good place to stay on Maui.

Great location in Kihei. The condo is nice and well kept. Close to amazing beaches and we loved the atmosphere in Kihei. Mark has everything you need. Snorkeling gear, body board, beach towels, chairs and umbrellas. We loved our stay!

Mark's place is really nice and practical! It has all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach holidays: beach towels, umbrella, and chairs. I even saw fins, which we did not use since we had ours.
It is quite big for 2 people, stays cool during the day so no need for AC, the terrace is directly on the grass so very nice to have breakfast, it has a washing machine in the apartment, it is quiet, and you do not need a key as it is a keypad with an access code so no risk to lose it. 
The kitchen is well equipped with everything you need and You can have a BBQ just 30 seconds away! 
The swimming pools are nice even if they are small. The best thing is going to the beach in 5 minutes, especially early in the morning. Plan on snorkeling and seeing turtles there!
There is plenty of parking spots. Don't forget to get your parking permit!
Being in Kihei allows to go easily everywhere on the island. One of the best spots to buy food is ABC (2 minutes drive).
Finally, Mark is easy to contact and replies in minutes to your questions and makes you arrival in Maui event nicer with a nice basket of gifts. He really practices the Aloha! 
If we ever come back, we will most probably contact him again.

Sehr schöne Wohnung, komplett ausgestattet, tolle Lage (auf der anderen Straßenseite schon der Strand; Restaurants/Kneipen + Einkaufsmöglichkeiten fußläufig erreichbar; Surf-Schulen fußläufig erreichbar).
Haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt. 
Vielen Dank für alles!

We had a great time at Mark's.  The location was great and we were within walking distance to a beautiful low key beach and to restaurants. Beach towels and chairs were provided as well as kitchen stuff. we had a wonderful time!

Everything was amazing as described.!!! :) I've enjoyed staying this place very much. Mark gave us 3 hrs early check in due to our early arrival from international flight. Super sweet!  One thing to remind to the party who might come as 4. (Only because it said this place could take 4 guests. )  Sofa bed in the living room .... is really not comfy. Me and my mom was trying to sleep in  the sofa bed. It felt like as though my body was floating on the top of bunch of squicky metal springs. It makes too much noise and sinks here and there.  So don't rely on the sofa bed. You might as well end up sleeping on dinner table chairs. Other than that I loved staying on this palce so much! ♥

Mark's place is at an amazing location since it's in between the west and east side of Maui. It's also a great place to catch the sunset at a clear day since the beach is right across it. It came with  a lot of amenities which my family and I did not expect and we are overall very impressed with his place.  I highly recommend this place to anyone looking to book an AirBnB
Great place in a great location. Mark has thought of everything and I would stay there again in a heartbeat

Mark's unit is fantastic, very clean, well kept up, and I enjoyed staying there. Large TV, Cable was fine and the WIFI worked great! Location/complex is a little old, but fairly close to a lot of shops and restaurants. Really quiet at night and overall positive experience.

This place was so well equipped for our week in Maui. 4 beach chairs, 2 body boards, large cooler bag for beach, 4 sets of fins/masks, beach towels, ketchup mustard and all the essentials in the fridge. Even sunscreen, makeup remover, mouse, bug spray and some toiletries! We also arrived to find a pineapple, bag of Maui coffee, Maui cookies and Maui chips! Can not say enough about how well stocked the place was. The parking was easy and always available, there were security guards patrolling constantly, the pool was the perfect temperature and the hose and bbq were super close to the room. The AC was super helpful for the hot trip. We didn’t need to reach out to our host during our stay bc we had everything we needed and he was super helpful when booking. I would stay here again. 
Kalie 
Mahalo
We had a great start at Mark’s location for our very first trip to Maui :) Highly recommended!
The apartment is fantastic! All necessary equipment is available and great beaches can be reached by foot. Many thanks for a great stay!

Grate place to stay, home away from home, very comfortable,  useful the chairs and the umbrellas for the beach, many towels available and grate the use of the washing and drying machine in the unit, nice the lanai on the ground floor with direct access to the outside and the table for having breakfast.
Wonderful experience!

Tv didn’t work, no signal.
Window air conditioner didn’t cool bedroom. Bedroom did not get below 79 degrees,  had to sleep on pullout couch

A really well sited apartment with everything you need for a great stay on the Kamaole Beach area of Kihei, you'll love staying here. With a cool and shady lanai looking out over a green lawn, comfortable living spaces, easy access to pool, tennis court and barbecue and plenty of parking, this is a top spot. We loved our stay here.
Loved the place and the location. Very quiet, close to the several beaches, walking distance to restaurants, supermarket, etc. Highly recommended!

This condo is everything you could need for your stay in Maui! The location is prime, the condo is clean and air conditioned. From beach towels to boogie boards, there is anything you’d need for a trip to the beach! Mark was very friendly and quick to respond to any questions or concerns about our stay! We felt extra welcome in the space with some local treats, and a delicious fresh pineapple! Mahalo, Mark!
A beautiful spot with the deck onto a great green space was lovely and close to the beach great tennis courts

Great unit and exactly as described and pictured.  Mark was a great host, accommodating to my check in time and quick to respond with any questions that I had.  Have been coming to Maui for many years and would definitely recommend Mark's condo.  Close to all amenities and literally across the road from the beach yet far enough away to avoid any road noise.  Even if you don't go to the beach, the complex has three on site pools and a few tennis courts.  The onsite BBQs were perfect for cooking and eating "at home".  There were plenty of nice extras in the unit from having a small amount of laundry soap to beach toys to a blender for making frozen drinks.  Would definitely stay again if available.

Such a great place! Perfect place for us four adults with one bedroom and the one pull out couch. Mark had everything we could possibly need, including beach chairs, umbrellas, shower and beach towels, and any type of kitchen supplies. He left a large note with all the best suggestions for the area as well as se
Hawaiian snacks and coffee! Having the laundry right there was great too. Right across the street from a great beach.

name: Appartement en face de Parc LaFontaine
summary: Cozy apartment in a central area. The parc is across the street and Mont-royal street it's 5 min walking for shopping, cafe, bars and restaurants. 15 min walking you have metro station  which bring you downtown in 5 min. Very closed to Ile-St-helene

The parc is across the street and Mont-royal street it's 5 min walking for shopping, cafe, bars and restaurants. 15 min walking you have metro station  which bring you downtown in 5 min. reviews.comments: Alina kept in contact with me through my trip to ensure everything was well. It’s a nice space and great location within Montreal.

Appartement de base, cuisine très sale, il y avait des mouches dans la poubelle qui volaient partout dans ma cuisine. Les planchers était sale. Pour ce qui concerne le parking, il est présent, mais pas privé. Sinon, pratique pour dormir et l'emplacement.
It was so so.
Alina est très accueillante et très serviable, l’appartement et bien situé et très pratique ! Très bonne communication et beaucoup de gentillesse , très arrangeante .. je recommande
Great location!!
Everything is as described!  Alina was quick to respond to all of my inquiries, check-in and -out was simple, and there were no unpleasant surprises.  Thank you again Alina!
Very kind host, communicated effectively and provided amenities such as wine, coffee, and snacks. Would recommend.
The apartment is clean and cozy. The location is great! Alina responses promptly. There’s parking behind the building.

Alina's place is close to public transportation and many of Montréal's Centre Ville attractions, with a relaxing walk through Parc La Fontaine beginning any adventure. Her home is cozy, quiet, and welcoming, especially for those traveling with a young child (toys!) Parking is competitive and challenging, if you're bringing a car, but would be par for the course to any city dweller. Our stay was wonderful and we'll be back to the city soon, I'm sure. À bientôt!
Perfect location, close to everything. Very cute building & apartment! Easy and clear check-in.
Great space right next to the park, easy access to downtown and very helpful and quick communication!
Alina's home is clean and the check-in process was very easy. We were lucky enough to book this Airbnb on the day of our arrival in Montreal and Alina was quick to respond to our inquiries.
Great communication with Host! Had so much fun! Thanks for the memories!!! ❤️

name: Rumours inn
summary: Located in Old City, this hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Hippodrome, Basilica Cistern, and Hagia Sophia. Blue Mosque and Cemberlitas Bath are also within 15 minutes. Along with a rooftop terrace, this smoke-free hotel has coffee/tea in a common area and concierge services. Free breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, dry cleaning, a 24-hour front desk, and a library are onsite. Breakfast included Free WiFi 24-hour front desk.
description: Located in Old City, this hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Hippodrome, Basilica Cistern, and Hagia Sophia. Blue Mosque and Cemberlitas Bath are also within 15 minutes. Along with a rooftop terrace, this smoke-free hotel has coffee/tea in a common area and concierge services. Free breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, dry cleaning, a 24-hour front desk, and a library are onsite. Breakfast included Free WiFi 24-hour front desk. From Ataturk Airport Taking the Tram - 50 min from the airport to the tram stop and a 10 minute walk – this is not an easy option if you are carrying luggage. At the airport, take the metro to "AKSARAY." Transfer at ZEYTINBURNU to the tram to KABATAS. Get off the tram at SULTANAHMET station. From Sultanahmet station, our Hotel just 10 min. by walk.

reviews.comments: Rumours Inn was a lovely break for us. It is a stylish and small hotel in the best location for walking to the big sights of Istanbul. The staff were friendly and helpful.

El alojamiento es impecable, tal cual las fotos, el hotel tiene una onda increíble, siempre impecable y limpio y la hospitalidad inmejorable. El desayuno súper completo y el área para desayunar se cuida en todos los detalles, desde las variedades para desayunar hasta en la música y decoración. Las habitaciones son pequeñas pero súper confortables y silenciosas, estábamos sobre la calle y no escuchábamos ningún ruido. Nos ayudaron con todas las preguntas que hicimos y también con equipaje que dejamos en guarda mientras viajamos a Capadocia. Volveremos a alojarnos en Rumours Inn en nuestra próxima visita a Estambul.
是老城区里很好的位置 距离蓝色清真寺非常的近 离酒店很近有一家味道还不错的中餐 房间很干净
If you want live in SultanAhmet near blue Mosk and Aisophia, this is best place for you.
The place was awesome. Very clean and newly refurbished. Great layout. Good bathroom and decent size room. Easy access to local facilities trams food etc.

The location of this Airbnb was amazing!! It was close to the metro and major attractions but but private enough that you didn't have to hear people at night (only some dogs). The breakfast and room was phenomenal. If I go back to Istanbul I would stay here again!
Great place to stay central to some of Istanbul's best and finest attractions. Great place to stay, meet other travellers and explore this wonderful city.
Thank you, very nice place.

We stayed 4 nights and the location of place was perfect. Within 5min you could reach any tourist destination. Rooms were clean, cleaning ladies were really nice, provided breakfasts were full range of choices. Also it was nice, that we could use private shuttle to go back to airport straight from this place's door.

name: A quiet place in the middle of Wan Chai
summary: Large comfortable room, very quiet and pleasant. The room is clean and equipped with everything you need. A good place to rest before a big day. the Mtr is at 10 min walk, 7eleven 2 min walk, tramway stop is 2 min walk, supermarket 3 min walk. The area is full of restaurants (sushi, noodels, duck). You are at 15 minutes from Central and 5 of Causeway Bay. Definitely a good spot!

neighborhood_overview: Kauai's north shore is unpoiled and serene, ideal for the outdoor enthusiast (even if your enthusiasm for the outdoors extends no further than the nearest sunny beach or a glass of wine on your private lanai).  The Princeville Shopping Center offers a grocery store, restaurants, boutiques, a yoga studio, and other businesses, and it's a pleasant walk along level ground to get there.  Several secluded beaches can be accessed by one of the beach paths (they're rather steep) that go down the bluff, or there's the lovely shady path to Anini Beach on the east side of Princeville.  The town of Hanalei, with its restaurants, bars, charming boutiques, and the fabulous beach at Hanalei Bay, is only about a 5 minute drive.  In the summer months, when the water is calm, you can even catch a boat tour of the Na Pali Coast out of Hanalei.  There are numerous hiking trails a short drive away.  You'll find beaches for whatever your favorite beach activity happens to be…surfing (or learning to surf),
notes: Your rental is protected by the damage waiver fee you paid.  If you should accidentally damage something during your stay, YOU MUST REPORT IT TO US  or it is not covered, and you will be charged the cost of repair or replacement.  Please be sure to report any accidental damage to us promptly to insure we do not charge you.  Note that lost keys or garage openers are not covered by the damage waiver, nor is any damage done in the course of activities that are illegal or in violation of your rental agreement.
transit: Public transportation is not widely available, and taxi cabs are extremely expensive.  We recommend that guests reserve a rental car for their visit.  Since you'll find many opportunities for shopping, dining, or beach-going within walking distance if you are staying on the east shore or the south shore, you may wish to use a rental car for only a part of your stay, on those days when you'll be sight-seeing farther afield.
access: Our Kauai rental properties are all equipped with either a lockbox or a keyless entry pad.  You will receive complete arrival instructions 30 - 60 days prior to arrival which will include the lockbox or keyless code.  Your arrival instructions will also include other important information about the property such as driving directions, where to stop-and-shop, wifi access, etc.  Our mobile phone app provides this information as well, without the need to print anything (other than parking passes for those locations that require a parking pass).  We encourage you to download the guest app.  It's free!
interaction: We don't wish to intrude on your privacy, but we will give you a quick call the day after your arrival to insure you've found everything to your satisfaction.  If you need our assistance, you may contact our office should you experience any problem with your rental property.  In case of a true after-hours emergency, you may call our emergency line. For all other questions, please contact our office during business hours.  Your arrival instructions, and our guest mobile phone app, will include our full contact information. If you'd like help arranging activities, tours, babysitting, pre-arrival grocery shopping, etc, please contact Jeannie Ricciardi.  Jeannie provides concierge services and is quite knowledgable and helpful.  You can reach her at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or (Email hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Aloha, and welcome to Kauai!  We hope you have a wonderful visit to the Garden Island.  We want you to have a pleasant and relaxing visit. While you are our guest, we ask that you observe the following items in order to make your stay more enjoyable. Please remember that your rental property is privately owned, it is someone's second home, so please treat it with the same respect you would show as an invited guest. - Kauai is a tropical climate. Rain showers occur from time to time, unexpectedly. When you are going to be gone for the day, close all the windows and doors.  This is very important as you may be held financially responsible for damage to flooring, walls, window sills, etc, that results from unsecured doors or windows. - For your convenience in arranging flights, dinner reservations, tee-off times, or for emergencies, in most cases the owner has provided a phone. You are welcome to use it for local (Kauai) calls and to receive calls. If you need to call off island, or to th

name: Sealodge F9: Top floor privacy, oceanfront vistas all around, affordable rate
summary: The only top floor condo in the building offers privacy, expansive oceanfront vistas, and affordable rates.  Shopping, dining, beaches are all just minutes away budget-friendly north shore Kauai vacation rental.
space: Sealodge F9 is the only top floor condo in the building.  It offers privacy, expansive white water oceanfront views, and welcoming comfort inside, all at affordable rates.  This one bedroom/one bathroom gem shares no common walls, so all you hear is the surf.  From your private lanai you can view the changing colors of ocean and sky at both sunrise and sunset.  In the living room, you'll find comfortable furnishings and a Hawaiian punee (twin size day bed in the alcove of the picture window).  You can use the punee if you need additional sleeping space for a child, or to relax at nap time as you watch for dolphins or whales while the tradewinds play softly over you.  There's a dining area with seating for 4, full kitchen, and washer and dryer.  There are yet more oceanfront views from the bedroom, with its comfortable queen bed and adjacent full bathroom.  In the bathroom, the tub/shower and commode area are private, while the vanity area with sink and mirror remain open to the bedroom

name: Mauna Kai 5A: Spacious and recently renovated, 8 min walk to Anini beach
summary: Completely updated inside, this elegant and spacious Mauna Kai rental is walking distance to beaches, and close to shopping, dining, and Hanalei.
space: Mauna Kai is a charming townhome complex in central Princeville.  The walk to north shore Anini Beach - a beautiful, uncrowded, white-sand beach - is a brief 12-minutes along a shady tree-lined path.  Shopping and dining in Princeville are also easy walking distance.  Just a few minutes by car is the charming town of Hanalei and spectacular Hanalei Bay.  The Mauna Kai complex includes a large swimming pool and a furnished cabana with a gas grill. Mauna Kai 5A has been completely updated and renovated inside. With its wood foors, updated kitchen and bathrooms, elegant dining area for 6, and bright attractive bedrooms, you'll stay in style and comfort here in Princeville.  The 2br/2ba condo provides (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sf of living space  Enjoy master bedroom with king size bed  and large modern master bathroom. reviews.comments: We loved our week in Kauai Kahuna, it was the perfect place in Princeville for our family vacation. This was our third trip to the island and we knew the area we wanted to stay in, and what I loved was being able to walk in the mornings around the area, onto the green or even down the rough-ish path down to the beach. The Westin is close by for stopping into for Starbucks and it was easy to get to Foodland to pick up groceries. The home was well laid out, private and easy to be in. We discovered lots of beach equipment and snorkel gear to use and my boys loved chasing the gekos around in the garden. We can't wait to come back.

name: 2641 - AB Premium Old Town E-2 - Modern, 2-bedroom Old Town apartment close to Las Ramblas and Plaça de Catalunya
summary: Situated in the vibrant Raval neighbourhood just 550m from the famous Mercat de Sant Antoni, this modern, stylish apartment offers air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Two metro stops, Universitat and Sant Antoni, are both a 5-minute walk away.   This trendy apartment sleeps up to 4 guests across 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with 2 single beds. The double bedroom boasts an en-suite bathroom. The apartment is just a 2-minute walk from the Museu d’Art Contemporani de Barcelona, also known as MACBA, and a 12-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas. Plaça de Catalunya, the most central point of Barcelona, is also less than a 10-minute walk from the apartment.  Within a short walk, you will find plenty of museums, restaurants, bars, cafés and shops. This neighbourhood is a great choice for those interested in the local culture and being in the heart of the city.Metro: Universitat (L1, L2) & Sant Antoni (L2)

house_rules: The client must pay one month's rent as a security deposit upon check-in.  Utility charges for monthly rentals are not included in the total cost of the rental. Utilities: You will be charged a minimum monthly rate for utilities such as gas, electricity, water and Internet according to the size of the apartment: 1 bedroom – 120€; 2 bedrooms – 200€, 3 bedrooms – 250€, 4 or more bedrooms: 300€. At the end of your stay we will check the bills and if there are any outstanding amounts that have not been covered by your monthly payments we will deduct these from your deposit.

host.host_about:
We are Robbie and Kay and we work in the real estate industry. The name of our company is AB Apartment Barcelona and what we aim to do is offer all of our guests the opportunity to live in Barcelona whether they are settling in the city, starting your own business, moving jobs or looking forward to start a new life. 

Unfortunately renting in an apartment in Barcelona can be a difficult experience, but with us you are in good hands :). Combined we have over 15 years of experience in the industry and our agency AB Apartment Barcelona manages over 400 apartments. If you have any problems finding accommodation, we will surely be able to help you!

name: The beautiful room for 2 in TAKSIM
summary: My place  is very centrally located Istanbul Taksim and offers you a great stay in Istanbul,Taksim. We are just a two minute walk to Taksim Square and the rich shopping district of Istiklal Street, the main pedestrian thoroughfare of Beyoglu. Public transit including various buses, metro trains, and ferrires are just a few minutes away. The new extension of the metro makes it very simple to get to historic Sultan Ahmet, the old town of Istanbul. If you need a shuttle service Inform me.

The room was clean, we had soe problemes with the bathroom, but over all its a good deal.

For this price not bad. But, in the toilet there were no soap.
I haven't receive an answer on my question.
Memnun kaldım tavsiye ederim tekrar konaklamayı düşünüyorum
Awesome location and great hospitality :)

name: Sweet room near to parc güell
summary: Welcome to our place! We are a young couple offering a room for you to have a nice stay in Barcelona. In the room you’ll find a nest-bed, which we can prepare  as two single beds or one double bed. The flat is close to parc Güell and to gracia neighbourhood! Is well communicated with the center, and around the house there are some hills to keep you fit. As important info,  I’d like to remind: WE HAVE TWO CATS in the apartment. They are super friendly with everyone. Please contact for any doubts!
description: Welcome to our place! We are a young couple offering a room for you to have a nice stay in Barcelona. In the room you’ll find a nest-bed, which we can prepare  as two single beds or one double bed. The flat is close to parc Güell and to gracia neighbourhood! Is well communicated with the center, and around the house there are some hills to keep you fit. As important info,  I’d like to remind: WE HAVE TWO CATS in the apartment. They are super friendly with everyone. Please contact for any doubts! While your stay, the room will be private for you. My partner, Esteban, and I are living in the flat, so we will share the toilet and the kitchen. We have restricted the use of the kitchen, it means that you can’t use it for cooking but you can use nearly anything you can find. We have things to prepare your breakfast like coffee maker, toaster, water-boiler... you can also use the fridge or the oven. You will also find glasses, dishes, and the basics of the kitchen as sugar, coffee,... will be
notes: I would like to make clear that we have to cats. They are so sweet and human friendly but sometime as they are animals is hard to control what the do, where they go, or the noise they make. They won’t come inside your room if you close the door,  there are around the house, so hopefully you’re not allergic!
access: While your stay, the room will be private for you. My partner, Esteban, and I are living in the flat, so we will share the toilet and the kitchen. We have restricted the use of the kitchen, it means that you can’t use it for cooking but you can use nearly anything you can find. We have things to prepare your breakfast like coffee maker, toaster, water-boiler... you can also use the fridge or the oven. You will also find glasses, dishes, and the basics of the kitchen as sugar, coffee,... will be available for you. If you have doubts about it, just let us know!
interaction: I will be available to answer any doubt you have, try to help with anything you need, and making my best for you to have a pleasant stay.
house_rules: The use of the kitchen is restricted. You can use it for saving things, including the fridge, and to prepare your breakfast or use anything you need like microwave, except cooking.

name: Lovely & cozy double room in the heart of BCN
summary: Spacious & luminous double bedroom in a large family flat. It is centrally located  in one of the best, safest and going out areas in Barcelona, just 10 min. walking from Plaza Catalunya and very well connected to every places, 3min from bus and underground (Urgell). Perfect for business and leisure time, fully equiped, WIFI and all the  amenities you might need, SPA near the flat and Barcelona Exhibition Center just at 10 min. The perfect place after a long day enjoying Barcelona.
space: This is a large family flat (130 m2) in one of the most significant building of the Eixample area, you will find all the amenities, wifi 300gb, sat tv and a helpful and kind assistance from us, you can enjoy Barcelona from your own or you can also join us in our spare time to know better about Barcelona and also to practice why not... your Spanish.
description: Spacious & luminous double bedroom in a large family flat. It is centrally located  in one of the best, safest and going out areas in Barcelona, just 10 min. walking from Plaza Catalunya and very well connected to every places, 3min from bus and underground (Urgell). Perfect for business and leisure time, fully equiped, WIFI and all the  amenities you might need, SPA near the flat and Barcelona Exhibition Center just at 10 min. The perfect place after a long day enjoying Barcelona. This is a large family flat (130 m2) in one of the most significant building of the Eixample area, you will find all the amenities, wifi 300gb, sat tv and a helpful and kind assistance from us, you can enjoy Barcelona from your own or you can also join us in our spare time to know better about Barcelona and also to practice why not... your Spanish. We will be available for any assitance or help you might need. The flat is located in one of the best, safest and coolest areas of Barcelona, is call the Eixample
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in one of the best, safest and coolest areas of Barcelona, is call the Eixample, is a very well know area with all the best amenities of the city, very good place for going out and just 10 minutes by walk (6 Blocks) from Plaza Catalunya.
notes: There is city tax of 1€ per person per night. This tax is excluded from the price.  Right to use the washing machine is about 5€ (include detergent).
transit: The flat is very well connected with all the bus lines and underground station (Urgell) is just 3 minutes away. Line 1 (Red). Also the Aerobus just stop two blocks away from the flat. There are also several pay parkings nearby.
interaction: We will be available for any assitance or help you might need.
house_rules: It is not about listing and endless set of rules, basically my philosophy about the house is letting my guests using their common sense, being respectful, making the people staying here comfortable and helping them to make the most of their stay with us. Our priority is always the comfort and wellbeing of my guests and I will go out of my way to achieve that goal. You will be given a set of keys after the check in process, giving you complete freedom to go in and out at your will.

name: Comfortable Private Studio
summary: Private entrance to attached studio has separate and private bathroom and large lanai (balcony). Queen size bed, full size refrigerator, kitchenette, access to pool/hottub/bbq area.  Princeville is centrally located near local beaches and commerce.
space: This comfortable and private space is the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing and/or adventurous holiday. With a comfortable bed for a good night's sleep, a spacious lanai for relaxing in between exploration, a simple kitchenette for preparing affordable meals at home, a pool/hottub/bbq area for unwinding after long beach days, and a convenient location to dining, shopping, golf, bus stop, post office, groceries, parks and beaches
description: Private entrance to attached studio has separate and private bathroom and large lanai (balcony). Queen size bed, full size refrigerator, kitchenette, access to pool/hottub/bbq area.  Princeville is centrally located near local beaches and commerce. This comfortable and private space is the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing and/or adventurous holiday. With a comfortable bed for a good night's sleep, a spacious lanai for relaxing in between exploration, a simple kitchenette for preparing affordable meals at home, a pool/hottub/bbq area for unwinding after long beach days, and a convenient location to dining, shopping, golf, bus stop, post office, groceries, parks and beaches Guests have their own private entrance adjacent to the owner's entrance. All apartments have equal access to grounds and keyed entry pool area. Parking is free, though some stalls are reserved. Your hosts, Dan and Erin, live part-time in Hawaii and part-time in the Bay Area, so the accommodations are set up to be sel
neighborhood_overview: Our condo is located within convenient walking distance to Anini Beach, Princeville Shopping Center and the Kauai Bus stop as well as just a few minutes drive to Hanalei Bay where we like to enjoy surfing, swimming and sunsets.  We also enjoy being just up the street from the St. Regis hotel, home to the Terrace restaurant and Kauai Grill as well as an open bar and lounge overlooking Hanalei Bay
notes: The closest laundromat is 20 mi (30 min) away in Kapaa, though laundry service is available at Princeville Mail Service Center in the Princeville Shopping Center
transit: Although Hawaii tends towards being very automobile-centric, we also have a public bus system ($2) and very expensive taxis available. Our condo is located just 1 mile from the Kauai Bus stop at Princeville Shopping Center. From there, you can get to either Hanalei or Kilauea in just one stop, or you can travel all the way to Kapaa, Coconut Marketplace and Kukui Grove Mall in Lihue on one bus. Using transfers, you can get to and from the airport and all the way to Poipu and Waimea. Bused are infrequentm have intermittent weekend & holiday schedules and call last run pretty early though, so be sure to check the schedule ahead of time.
access: Guests have their own private entrance adjacent to the owner's entrance. All apartments have equal access to grounds and keyed entry pool area. Parking is free, though some stalls are reserved.
interaction: Your hosts, Dan and Erin, live part-time in Hawaii and part-time in the Bay Area, so the accommodations are set up to be self-sufficient. When we are in town, we are next door and available to answer questions and offer suggestions.
house_rules: There is no smoking and no pets in our condo. Smoking is permitted on Complex property > 20 feet away from all buildings. Items are not permitted to hang from outside railings. Parking is only on property and not on adjacent roadways. Quiet hours are between 9 p.m. and 8 a.m. Please leave shoes, sand and critters outside.

host.host_about: Adventurous couple splitting time between the Bay Area and Kauai, blending technology and nature. Renting 1 studio full-time and occasionally seeking short-term home-trade for 1 bedroom apartment.

reviews.comments: We had a great stay at Erin's place. Even though we did not have the chance to meet with Erin in person, he was a great communicated and answered rapidly to all our inquiries. The studio is big, perfectly located and well equipped. We particularly enjoyed relaxing on the private Lanai (outdoor terrasse). There were towels and beach towels available which was very convenient. Hardly recommended!

My niece Jia Lani and I thoroughly enjoyed our visit to beautiful Kauai and our stay in the Princeville condo. The neighborhood was lovely and Dan, Erin and their nearby neigbors were friendly yet not overbearing, giving us our space and privacy. The studio is cute, clean, modern and though small, it has a light airy feel and been set up in such a way as to maximize space and comfort. We really enjoyed the nearby hot, bubbly jacuzzi and pool as well. It is a great North Shore deal for budget minded travelers who want their own space. Mahalo, Dan and Erin, we hope to see you again soon!

We stated at Erin's for 3 days: the space was very private and cozy and had everything we needed. The layout isn't typical of an apartment - there was no kitchen per se, but there was a full sized fridge, along with a hot plate and other kitchen supplies if you want to cook in the suite. Alternatively, there is a BBQ in the pool area which you can use. The lanai was large and furnished, and a fan kept the room cool at night. There were also beach chairs, a cooler, towels for guest use, which was excellent. The suite itself was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The only downfall was the parking - if you didn't get there early enough all the non-reserved spaces were full. We got a warning for parking on the grass, with a message that we'd be fined and our tires booted if we did it again. Re: location - Princeville is a super posh resort area and you kind of have to drive to go anywhere cool (e.g. Hanelei) so we didn't love it, but it definitely depends what you are into. There are restaurants, shops and groceries nearby, and the suite is within walking distance to Queen's Bath and Anini beach (long walks, but walks nonetheless).

Everything about the studio in Princeville met our needs. Erin was in contact with us before we got there, and was available for anything we needed once we arrived. The studio was clean, and all the essentials were there for us.  We appreciated the beach towels, and chairs, as that cut down on things we needed to bring/rent. Also, the pool area was a huge plus, having a hot tub and bbq to use at night was a real positive...and having a wireless connection was key for my wife to keep up with her work needs.  We also loved the lanai, very relaxing and comfortable.

Small, cozy, comfortable and affordable little studio.  The Airbnb description of the place is spot on with what you get.  Place has a small kitchenette where you can cook basic meals for breakfast/lunch.  A big dinner may be tough to do since you only have 1 hot plate to work with but there are a couple of grills at the pool that you can use to make a feast if you want.  Location also is very good.  It is less than a 10 minute drive from Hanalei Bay and just a few minutes from Princeville Shopping Center.  You can also drive a few minutes or walk 15 minutes to the ocean, in particular Queen's Bath, which is a beautiful area - just be careful if surf is up and waves crashing high on rocks. You definitely need a car to enjoy the area, though, unless you're willing to wait for bus or good at hitching a ride.

Overall, we were very happy with the place and would stay here again.

Room was exactly as described. Private entrance, plenty of towels for beach/shower, great location on north shore, very soft bed, parking lot fills up fast, was forced to park in a reserved spot and woke up to a nasty note, luckily wasn't towed tho, enjoyed the guide books in the room and the sea shells that welcomed my arrival. Only complaint was a broken alarm clock. Would def stay again.

Dan and Erin were wonderful hosts! Our unit was exactly as described on airbnb.  It was clean and comfortable. The wireless internet was fast! Princeville is such a wonderful place to be in! The lanai was spacious and the pool and hot tub were an added bonus! Had a great time staying at Dan and Erin's place.

The condo was as described and in a perfect Princeville location! The community has quiet hours that were respectfully observed, which made it a peaceful place to unwind at night. The pool & hot tub area are beautifully done and just a few steps from your door. The condo is a great deal for seeing the beauty of the north shore...convenient to charming Hanalei & Queen's Bath.

The studio was as represented in the photos and description. It was self-sufficient, well equipped, had towels and a small cooler for the beach.  We did not meet the hosts; we had no need to ring them as everything went smoothly. The location is convenient and located in an apartment complex with families and children. We always found parking available in the lot near the studio without a problem. 
Thanks.

Nice studio. Very close to facilities, to Hanelei and beautiful  beaches. Great pool, hot tub & BBQ available.

Erin and Dan are very kind and were a very useleful ressource to give us advices especialy for the Kalalau trail ;-)

Mahalo :-)

I loved the space!  The studio did not feel small at all with the soaring wooden ceiling and the airy windows.  The shower had great water pressure and actually got hot.  A perfect location to explore the North Shore, I wish we'd had more time here.  Would come back in a heartbeat!

Erins apartment was an excellent and safe area of Princeville. Great for our cousins wedding,which was just a mile down the road. Erin was communicative before our stay to recommend sites and places for us to visit. Apartment was a good size with all you need.  Definitely keep your screen door closed to avoid getting bitten by mosquitos.

What a great place to stay! We went surfing, explored the Na Pali coast, ate amazing food, and went skydiving. All great location to this space. Exactly as described on the site. Had a little outside porch that we used at night to wind down. 

The hosts were very responsive and helpful.

Our host Erin was present when we arrived. She was helpful when we asked for a second set of pillowcases.
We expected a kitchenette as the property was listed as a studio. We were only able to heat water for tea in the coffee maker. It would be nice to have a hot plate . We didn't like washing dishes in the bathroom sink.
The place was pretty noisy with noise from neighbors and the parking lot at all hours.
All was done well. Erin was gracious and welcoming. Location is great, access to beaches, etc.. Breakfast was easy, lunch and dinner best done in  a local restaurant.

Simple, comfy unit, just as described. My husband and I stayed for two nights at the tail end of a week long visit to Kauai. Honestly, we weren't there at the unit much, we just needed a place to sleep, shower, and maybe cook a little bit of breakfast or dinner.  Who needs more than that in beautiful Kauai? There is so much to do and see! We left the unit early each morning, and always managed to be back to by 7 PM, so we didn't have any trouble with the parking. If we needed food after that, we just walked to the market or restaurants in Princeville. We couldn't get the electrical outlet near the sink to work (The most convenient for cooking, or hairstyling devices), but it wasn't important enough for us to contact the owners. It's an apartment complex, and just as you would expect, you can hear people talking and shouting to their friends and kids. Although we never met, directions from Dan and Erin were clear and easy, and all communication was friendly.

The studio was comfortable.   There is no air conditioning so we were a little to warm, especially sleeping at night.    The studio was clean and there were plenty of towels.    There is an outside deck to sit and relax.
Perfect studio, very comfortable, spacious terrace, quiet, luxury residential well located to take advantage of Hanalei and northern Napali Coast. Excellent organization. In short, perfection!

This place was perfect! Good location. Only a ten minute drive down the hill to Hanalei Bay. Super close to Princeville shops for supplies. We cooked in the unit a few nights and had everything we needed. The place is way nicer and newer than the photos suggest. The bed was really comfortable and nice clean sheets and towels. We used the pool which was great and the lanai was also awesome to hang out on. Didn't hear a peep from the owners. Only their extremely well written and informative guest book. Would definitely stay here again. These guys have a awesome place!! Thanks for having us!!
Nice place to stay. We enjoyed the large room and balcony.

The studio is exactly as listed on the site.  Comfortable and fairly convenient as long as you have a car.  Parking is easy in the lot and the pool is right down the stairs and didn't seem to get too busy.  We were able to use the grill there to BBQ one night and eat at one of the tables by the pool - although, there isn't really enough lighting and it gets buggy, so I can understand people cooking out and carrying back to their flats to eat.  There isn't really any space in the flat to sit or eat though - that is one downside.  For breakfasts we ended up perching on the sofas outside and using the corner of the table that is out on the lanai.  Also the condo management seem quite strict so be careful about leaving your towels out to dry -- we ended up having to go home with a bag full of wet towels and bathing suits because there is no place suitable to hang them to dry.  Other than that, this is good value for the money and you can drive easily into Hanalei (which is much more laid back than Princeville).  Erin was a good hostess - generous and easy to communicate with, and the flat was clean.

Thanks for letting us stay at your place! It was comfortable and clean, great landing spot for us as we started our Kauai experience.  It feels great to sleep with the windows open at night.  We appreciated the space and it is conveniently located to lots of beaches, trails, and restaurants.

Wir haben uns dort nicht so richtig wohl gefühlt. Alles war schon sehr abgewohnt. Das Fenster im Bad konnte nicht geschlossen werden und die Duschwanne und der Duschkopf sahen schon etwas eckelig aus. Das Toilettenpapier hat nicht gereicht und wir mussten neues kaufen. Küchenrolle gabs leider gar nicht. Die Handtücher hatten ihre beste Zeit auch schon hinter sich. Der Fernseher hatte keine Fernbedienung und das Bild war schlecht. Das Internet hat aber gut funktioniert. Es gab einen großen Kühlschrank mit Eisfach. Leider gab es drinnen keinen Tisch und keine Stühle an dem man essen konnte. Es gibt statt einer Klimaanlage einen Deckenventilator, der aber nach einer Weile nervige Geräusche macht, deswegen haben wir ihn nachts ausgeschaltet. Ohne ist es aber sehr warm. Die Fliegengittertür ist uns mehrmals raus gerutscht, die Balkontür lässt sich nicht vollständig schließen und auch nicht abschließen. Der Lamellenvorgang ist auch schon kaputt und man kann an einer Stelle durch sehen. Als wir uns mal ausgesperrt hatten haben wir nach einem Anruf schnelle Hilfe bekommen. Die Umgebung ist ganz nett. Ein Haus weiter wohnen Kinder, somit ist es morgens und abends etwas lauter,aber das hat uns nicht gestört. Wir durften während unseres Aufenthalts den PKW-Stellplatz benutzen. Wir würden dort nicht nochmal übernachten, aber wer keine hohen Ansprüche hat kommt damit vielleicht klar.
The studio was perfect! Great location, clean, parking, safe. I really enjoyed my stay there. I highly recommend this space!

The studio was homely and comfortable and well-located. We didn't meet our hosts but access was easy via a code on a lockbox on the door. The studio was clean and the pool area was fantastic. We wish we'd found this place before staying at an over-priced hotel for a week!

Dan and Erin's place did the trick for its price point.  Not a big place but had all the basics you needed for a relaxing vacation.  Towels, pool/hot tub, and lanai were nice touches.  Kitchenette, sliding door, and freezer door were a lil janky.  Prime location for the north shore.

We were not looking for anything super fancy, as we knew we would be out and about on Kauai during our trip. This studio was clean, comfortable and in a nice group of condos in Princeville, minutes away from Hanalei Bay and beaches. The bed was very comfortable with warm blankets for the cooler, rainy weather at night. The owners were incredibly helpful and responsive with questions and directions. The neighboring units were quiet (we never even heard anyone!) and it was a very nice vacation for an incredible price! We will definitely come back again!
Great hosts, nice place, and an amazing location. Recommended.

HIGHLIGHT: It is a full studio apartment with a hottub. You cannot get this kinda bargain anywhere else.

LOCATION: great location in the heart of quiet Princeville. A really short drive away from Hanalei and Kilaeua, which is nice because these streets (with their lack of streetlights) get pitch dark at night. 

THE SPOT: Hot tub, which we took full advantage of. A private, comfortable and clean balcony complete with a couch (that is totally nap-able) and surfboards.

NOISE/CLEANLINESS: Clean (even cleaner than things look in the photos). Walls are a bit thin and your host does live right next door, so no loud shenanigans. Pretty quiet apartment complex (with the exception of the roosters)
The listing was as described and quiet except for the roosters which are everywhere on the island.

Great place. Location was superb.  Most of our time was spent on the road visiting destinations. If parking, try to get home early as after 8:00pm parking is scarce. Erin was sweet and accommodating. 
The pool on site was very convenient as well. (Just remember no glass by the pool)

Tip: if this is your first stop on your trip make note that they have items to borrow on site during your stay. (Cooler, boogie boards, some sunscreen and towels) 

Cheers,

Brad and Katheryne

It's a nice little room with a private bath in an apartment complex. It's right near the pool but you can't hear it from the room. I wouldn't say it's a studio, though, as it doesn't have a real kitchen. It's more of a hotel room-like kitchenette, although they do outfit it with some hotplates and whatnot. It was very clean and Dan and Erin were kind and helpful. Although they had a baby, as did we, I didn't hear much from next door and we all slept well.

This was a small unit, well-located in a quiet group of condos.  It was comfortable for two with a nice bed and pleasant roofed porch overlooking the parking lot. It is perfect for someone looking for a convenient location and a good place to sleep at a low price.  A pool, gas grill, and jacuzzi were on the premises.  It is not a place for people who want luxury, to entertain guests, or cook indoors.

This rental was perfectly comfortable for two people. In fact, it seemed larger in person than I initially thought. Dan and Erin were very nice and welcoming. Also, the location is awesome, as we discovered the North Side and Hanalei Bay to be our favorite location on the island.

Everything you could need (towels, silverware, a cooler, etc.) for your stay is already there, otherwise It's an easy walk to shops, restaurants, and a grocery store. Queen's Bath is nearby and fun to see. There's a pretty cool waterfall on that trail as well. Although to see the best waterfalls you'll need to hike a ways or take a ride in a helicopter!

We really didn't hang around the rental during the day... We would leave early to beach it, hike, explore and come back at night to sleep. But for less active people, I think spending more time around these condominiums would be extremely easy. The noise level is fine, the pool is quality, the grills are brand new, too. 

Whether you spend lots of time at this rental or not, its extremely affordable and livable for two people. I give our stay five stars!

Nous avons passé une très belle semaine à ce studio. Dan & Erin ont été très sympathique dès notre arrivé. La ville de Princeville est très bien situé sur l'île de Kauaï alors les déplacements étaient simple. Tout ce qui a été promis a bien été livré et le balcon fût très apprécié également. 
Merci encore à Dan & Erin.

Dan & Erin's studio was clean and had everything we needed for our stay in Princeville!  It is located very close to Hanalei and North Shore sights.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay with them again :)

Great location on the North shore; no problem with parking. The apartment was very clean, as in the pictures. We especially loved the patio and the hot tub.

We would recommend it. We enjoyed the stay here much more than in a similarly priced hotel on the East shore.

An ideal place to stay for vacation! The town of Hanalei is only a short drive away with the beach and many places to eat and hang out. Room is clean and comes with towels, beach chairs, WiFi, basic kitchenware, and beach chairs. Comfy couches outside on the balcony, too. I never met the host, but contact via messaging was speedy.

I felt very welcome and comfortable in this condo.  The neighborhood is excellent -- very safe and close to many good beaches, restaurants and stores.  It was well-equipped with all the kitchen utensils, beach towels, sunscreen, beach chairs, brochures about activities in the area.  Although the condo is a small studio, it is well-appointed and feels spacious, especially with the sliding door open to the porch.  I would highly recommend this condo.

Bright, clean, spacious apartment. We felt comfortable and at home at this place. The location is a short drive to shops and restaurants. The owners also provided extensive tips on what to see and where is good to eat which was very helpful.

Very cozy studio, nicely located, perfect for a couple. It actually is better looking in person than on the pictures! The little terrace on the back is wonderful. Dan & Erin made everything very easy and enjoyable for us. Great experience overall.
Great studio close to the beautiful north Kauai experience.  Wonderful community with pool and BBQ available after a day spent in the natural beauty of Kauai's north shore beaches and trails.
We had lovely stay here! Thanks a lot.

Dan and Erin welcomed us with email messages and texts that were helpful and worked well. the neighborhood was good in parking worked well I don't remember hearing about the long stairwell going up to the door but it was ok. The first two nights of our stay we really wished we had air conditioning then the weather changed and it was not an issue it would have been nice to have a fan.

Erin and Dan have a great space in a good location! Exactly what I needed to rest my head at night and come-and-go in between activities. If you're planning on spending more time on the North Shore, this is definitely the right spot for you. It's 10 minutes to Hanalei and 25-30 to Kalalau Trail!

Both of our hosts were very friendly and Erin made sure we had everything that we needed. The highlight of this studio was a nice warm shower and more kitchen gadgets than you could ever need. The location was good and their extensive directions were easy to follow in finding the place.    
The unit is up a large flight of steps and due to the arrangement and island style construction its not very sound private to other neighbors or the weed maintenance in the morning. 
Really appreciated the hosts.

Dan & Erin were amazing hosts! We saw them a few times while we were leaving or coming back from our adventures on the island and Erin always checked to make sure all our needs were being met.  As a side note, as with everywhere in Kauai, there are roosters and they can be a tad bit loud in the morning but this is nothing against our hosts! The room is actually quite a bit larger than we were expecting and was well appointed. There are enough kitchen gadgets to make any food you'd like and there are really nice grills out by the pool (which is literally right out your door). The stairway wasn't any longer than any other apartment stairway but it is a tad narrow if you have really large luggage. You do get very nice trade winds coming through and at night we actually found we needed to close the windows as it would get a bit chilly. There were a few days that the trade winds were gone but it didn't make the room unbearable. You are about a 5 minute drive from a Foodmart and about a 15 minute drive from Hanalei! The neighborhood is high end and you are right next door to a gorgeous golf course! We would definitely stay again!

The studio is great and the location is convienient for the north shore.  There is a grocery store that is very close and the studio has all the kitchen things you need to make meals in if you so desire.  We loved sitting out on the lanai in the morning and the evenings.
Erin was super helpful and friendly.  I'd definitely recommend staying here.

We had a great time in Kauai and Dan and Erin's place was a good place to recover after hiking the Na Pali coast. The pool and hot tub were wonderful for our aching feet. It was a good launching point to explore the rest of the island - we drove to as many parts of the island as possible and were glad we chose to stay in the area we did. It was close to the things and places that we enjoyed the most during our stay. The space was comfortable for us, even without the A/C - there was a good cross wind that kept us cool enough at night and we were usually out and about during the day anyway. The only trouble we had was the neighbors dog - they must have had a new puppy or something but it didn't sleep through one of the two nights we were there, so neither did we. It would have been totally manageable except we needed to leave the windows open to keep the cross-breeze, so we couldn't shut it out by closing them. Someone left a note on their door, so apparently we weren't the only ones disturbed and hopefully it will be figured out soon. Despite that issue, we still give it 4 stars. As many others said, there were plenty of kitchen items to use, and we put them to good use with the amazing fruit available from the fruit stands around, and we enjoyed sitting on the lanai one evening as the rain fell and in the mornings with our tea as the sun came up.

We stayed at Dan and Erin's place for a weekend and loved it! Great location (really close to Hanalei where we spent most of the time), and a perfect place for a weekend away. The place was very clean and it was nice to have a pool. We arrived late at night so we appreciated having Dan and Erin's detailed directions to their place. Would definitely stay there again.

Great little studio in Princeville. Simply can't beat it for the price. The location is good, and there is a nice pool. No full kitchen (i.e. no stove) if you're into serious cooking (which I'm not), but it has a fridge and some kitchen gadgets which is plenty for me. This was my first time using airbnb and Erin made everything very easy. Would recommend!

The residence was very nice; it was roomier and more livable than the picture let on. It had everything we needed to use as a comfortable basecamp for our activities on the north side of Kauai in between camping trips. Erin was friendly and accessible for anything we needed. Great stay, overall, and definitely recommended.

The room was very clean, comfortable and welcoming. The lanai had a wonderful cross breeze. The location of the condo was convenient for visiting the North Shore and it was great to have such easy access to the lovely pool and hot tub area. Erin is a helpful and friendly hostess.

We spent Two nights at Dan & Erin studios and it was ok. Is in princeville, next to Hanaley. It's quite big with a nice lanai , clean and well equipped. You can buy your own food and cook it if you want. There is just one missing amenity ... Hair drier but the rest is very good. They are very responsive and the let us check out a little bit later. In my opinion the north shore is the best part of the island, if you want to hike remember to be equipped and well trained, the trails are not for everybody.
So Kauai is north shore and the studio is a right place to stay.

We had a very nice stay! The studio is comfortable and well equipped. We enjoyed the close proximity to many attractions on the north shore. Erin was very friendly and helpful. We really enjoyed the pool and hot tub in the evenings. We would definitely recommend this spot!

We were here for 8 days and had a great stay! This studio is definitely cuter in person than the pictures give away. Even though we were constantly driving across the island for certain activities, we were so happy we chose to stay in this area. It is absolutely beautiful and this location is a short drive away to some of the best views and beaches on the island!

I imagine it might feel a little weird trying to do much cooking in the room, as it's not really an actual kitchen, but I was surprised at how many utensils were available if needed. There is a cute pool with bbq's if needed. 

If you're a light sleeper, I'd suggest bringing earplugs. You will definitely be hearing roosters at odd hours and the neighbor kids like to play outside in the mornings.  If for some reason the power were to go out, there is an LED candle by the bed that's got some pretty major power, just an fyi. haha!

Our hosts were pleasant, the price was great, and we would definitely stay here again!

The hosts weren't available during my stay, but Erin left phone numbers and helped me find the condo and also when I had an issue with my pool key. They were always available and helpful. The studio is a completely separate and self sufficient space. It is thoughtfully appointed and a found everything that I needed. It's in close quarters with other condos, but also very close to the swimming pool and some very nice beaches. Shopping and restaurants are just a short drive away. It's a great place in a lovely area.

My partner and I got engaged on this beautiful Kauai vacation so their place will always leave us with fond memories. Dan and Erin's place was perfect for us and suited all of our needs and desires. We made use of the kitchenette which was super convenient. The lanai was perfect for relaxing with a beer during the afternoon rain shower. We would definitely stay there again!

Le studio est dans un beau quartier tranquille. La piscine et le jacuzzi sont très agréables. Le studio est tel que présenté sur les photos, salle de bain privée et accessoires de cuisine disponibles. Le balcon fut très apprécié et le studio est bien situé pour visiter le nord de l'île. Nous n'avons pas rencontré les hôtes mais l'information disponible était claire.

1) PRICE: A very good deal! Comparable condos in Princeville can be much more expensive, and we found that this condo served our purposes very well. 

2) COOKING FRIENDLY: We like to cook, and that’s why this was even better than staying at a hotel. There are conveniently located supermarkets in Princeville and Hanalei that made it very feasible to cook our own meals. At the condo we used the community BBQ (there are two) and within the room we used their hotplate, full-sized fridge, and microwave. They have plates and cutlery, but don’t expect any common household basics like oil, paper towels, and seasonings. 

3) BEACH ACCESSORIES: They also have a small cooler that we brought to the beach and three beach chairs. They have two sets of towels for both beach and bath. 

4) OTHER AMENITIES: Even though there is no AC, there is one ceiling fan that kept us comfortably cool. We also made use of the community pool and the room’s lanai/porch, which has a couch, multiple chairs and a table. 

5) NOISE LEVEL: It’s a family friendly area and close to the pool, which means it’s not uncommon to hear children and neighbors through the window. On the other hand, this area had very few roosters (which in Kauai, is a rare find). We stayed at other places on the island and had many roosters wake us up, but this was not the case here.
Very nice location for a very reasonable price! It was wonderful to have complimentary guest parking and speedy wifi!
Wonderful, homey, and clean apartment with a cozy outdoor balcony. We had a great time here!

The perfect place when exploring the North Shore! Comfortable bed, great use of space and the perfect balcony to enjoy a few drinks in the evening. The photos don't do it justice. There isn't any air con but the fan did the job with the breeze from the balcony. I would recommend renting a car when staying on the island as there isn't much public transport and taxis are pricey. We loved it here!

Our stay here was very nice. Great location, Queens bath is blocks away and Hideaway Beach is just down the street (def check out both if your are in good shape!). We ate in several nights after some grocery shopping at the super close Foodland but also dined out a few times. Hideaways Pizza was AMAZING. Super fresh food and fantastic service at the bar top. We were up early and out exploring all day long so the hot tub was very nice to have in the evenings for our tired bodies. The only downsides to this unit are by no means the owners fault. Be forewarned Kauai has lots of chickens! This goes for anywhere you stay. Bring earplugs to sleep with if you don't want a 4am wake up call from the dumb rooster who thinks its sunrise. This was to be expected, however the neighbors here have LOTS of children. If you are not an early riser be prepared for squealing and screaming at 7 am sharp. We used it as our alarm clock and didn't mind so much but they are LOUD. Everything else is amazing, lovely balcony clean bathroom tons of cookware and utensils. Would absolutely  stay here again, you can't beat this price at this location! I fell in love with the north shore of Kauai 100%!
Geräumiges Zimmer mit einfacher Ausstattung in einer schönen Anlage mit Pool und Grillmöglichkeit. Einkaufs-und Ausgehmöglichkeiten in der näheren Umgebung.

Nice simple studio with kitchenette. Comfy bed, fridge, wifi, ceiling fan. Easy parking and central to north shore activities. Hosts were responsive to questions and provided all the details for the stay in advance. There were a few items missing I expected, like a kitchen sponge and (more than half roll of) toilet paper. No biggie.

This was a perfect place for our trip. The studio was spacious and very comfortable, the bed was large and had a great mattress. While we only made breakfast there, it had everything we needed if we wanted to do a lot more cooking (Glad we stopped at Costco right off the airport so we had very little food shopping to do while we were there). The balcony provided a lovely place to relax outside. My husband went to the pool and said it was great. The complex is very quiet. The parking is right off the unit. The location on the north shore is ideal, lots of trails to walk to, good beaches to relax and the St Regis Hotel right next door. Will rent there again if we go to Kauai. Thanks to the owner for making this place available and comfortable.
Dan and Erin's studio was exactly what we were looking for.  We wanted a relatively inexpensive home base for  that portion of our trip that was clean and comfortable.  That is exactly what we got.

I loved the location of this condo. The pool and hot tub were great bonuses to my trip. The room was spacious, the lanai was relaxing, and everything was clean and ready for my arrival. The chickens can be heard in the morning, they're part of the experience of Kauai. No complaints at all! Perfect for a solo traveler like myself, I could see it being great for a couple too.

This is tropical living. I truly felt like I belonged on this island after my stay at Dan & Erin's! Although I never met with either of the two, communication was efficient enough and the directions to get to the property and inside the building were simple and easy to follow. The apartment itself was clean and had the basic amenities. No A/C which was no problem for me, as i had all the windows and doors open to get a nice breeze throughout the place. It's in a big neighborhood with lots of families throughout. Safe and clean and quiet. You need to drive a little bit to get anywhere like a restaurant or a hiking trail or the beach but that was well worth it; the sights on Kauai are unbeatable.

We felt very welcome. We received detailed emails and there was a binder at the unit including everything we needed to know. It's in a good neighbourhood, safe and friendly. 
Thank you for an excellent stay.

We had a slight mix up with the key to get into the apartment but once we called Erin, the neighbour came to let us in and after a few hours the apartment was cleaned. 
Princeville is a good area to stay and the apartment is good for a couple, although if you plan to cook, it would possibly be better to find somewhere with a proper kitchen as this is better suited to making hot drinks rather than food.
There is only one sink in the property which we found a bit odd, as you need to was your hands in the same place as you prepare food, but otherwise it is fine.

The place was amazing, well furnished, large, a great temperature with just the fan, and very close to amazing views. Overall, we absolutely loved the place.

As other reviewers have mentioned, be prepared for the chickens and other birds to wake you up early. They start crowing between 4-6AM and though it's possible to sleep through it, it's hard. I'd recommend earbuds!

The apartment has an amazing porch with an okay view of the jungle, but a very comfortable and nice place to eat meals. Large bathroom, and living room.  We had some issues with the hotplate (wouldn't work in a couple of outlets, so we had to cook on the floor), but other than that and the noise, it's a great place.

Thanks for the great place!

Kauai is a magical little place and this location was perfect.  The place is accurately described. I was only there 3 nights but found it had everything that I needed as I was only there to sleep basically.
What a gorgeous place! We had a great stay.

Dan and Erin were easy to get a hold of.  Their directions to their condo were exact and easy to follow.  The condo was perfect fit for us, single room with bathroom to the side and a lovely outdoor patio which was covered.  Nice, relaxing stay.  They have a binder to go through which lets you know more about the parking situation and when we had an issue with it Dan was quick to respond and help out!
Great place for us to be close to all of the surf spots. Convenient, clean and basic.

Erin and Dan provided an accurate description of their unit as well as directions to locate and access the space. They responded to our inquiry and other communications promptly. This was a good fit for us because we were able to make breakfast each day before we started on our planned activities. Thanks for having the grocery store frequent shopper card attached to the keys - we didn't have to "join" anything to purchase sale items.

Nice and clean space that looks like the photos.  I'd been traveling for a while in Hawai'i and appreciated the fast wifi and Erin and Dan's clear directions about getting to their apartment and navigating the area. It's also a great location.  

For other travelers, I feel obliged to I note that it's a pretty lively community so between the chickens and the kids leaving for school, it's not a place that you can easily sleep late (though the bed is very comfortable).  And while I appreciated having a fridge and many other small kitchen appliances provided, though found the lack of garbage cans (I realize it's to prevent pests, but having something I could put stuff in and then bring it to the dumpster would have been nice) and a drying rack a bit limiting in being able to use all the kitchen supplies.

We really enjoyed the location the barbecue the pool and the hot tub.  Host was great about giving recs. for the area.  Place was spacious and clean and nicely decorated.  Lanai was best we've had.  Parking fills up early and we had to park on grass.  Our white noise machine was beneficial in drowning out outside noise.

Nice studio. Good location. Comfortable. Fairly well appointed with plenty of towels, including beach towels. The place was clean & spacious.  Erin was easy and timely to work with. There is limited indoor lighting in the living area, so if you want to read it is a problem. Parking is a major issue. We never found a real parking spot but managed to find small corners to wedge our tiny rental car into except one night.  I would love to see a small dining table with a couple of chairs rather than a single large easy chair and ottoman. The porch has a sofa, easy chair, & rattan chair upon which to lounge. This is where we had to do reading, as there is lighting there. The multi-use sink/food prep area was nice, although small for any real cooking. There is a full size refrigerator, microwave, rice cooker, toaster, electric skillet, hot plate, coffee maker, and toaster, plus a couple plates, cups, glasses, tableware, and cooking utensils. We had to use an extension cord hanging down from the outlet high on the wall because the lower one didn't work. But everything worked out OK. There are two large frying pans to use, so plan meals accordingly. One pan is a badly torn up teflon, which I would never use, so I opted for the badly burned stainless steel. It cooked fine, just looked bad. The downstairs children are a great 7:00 AM alarm

The host was very helpful in the whole process (though directions were a bit vague on the final approach).  The unit was very nice and met my needs completely.  Location was perfect on the North Shore for my time in Hanalea and hiking the Kalalau trail.

Easy directions provided for us. Great area of the island. Nice walking path down to ocean. Studio was comfy. Complex was a bit noisy until 10-11 pm, then settled down. Parking quite a challenge. Overall, good experience!

Dan & Erin's condo met our needs, staying on the North Shore of Kauai. The location threw us off a bit, as it is nestled in a very nice community surrounded by golf courses and beautifully manicured lawns. While beautiful and convenient to much of the North Shore attractions, it had the feel of a retirement community therefore recommend this space to an older crowd or avid golfers, not necessarily young to mid age travelers. Contrary to other reviews, the kids and chickens were not a problem, as we were up early and stayed during the week, while the kiddos were in school however parking was definitely a thorn in our side as mentioned by a few reviewers. Additionally,  the neighbors were less than friendly, as we overheard a couple unwelcoming comments (seemingly unaware that the room was an airbnb?). The actual space was great. Clean with some dishes and basic appliances and the porch was a great space to enjoy the morning cup of coffee.
