The space was fine, lanai very comfortable. We didn't really know Princeville before--always avoided it--so this was a great place to use to explore it. Didn't run into owners, contact was good.

The place was actually much better than we expected, and more private than expected. It was well stocked with anything we might need for small kitchen essentials. We did not get a chance  to meet the owners, but check in was simple and we didn't need help with anything. The location was great. Very near places to eat and shop, also a couple of nice beaches and queen's bath. Also great access to our favorite beach ke'e. We had a great time!

Perfect place for two people! Located in a very nice place- and everyone we encountered were friendly. You can take an afternoon walk down the main road and you get amazing views where St Regis is located. Pool and jacuzzi was awesome after a long day of hiking. Also, having that lanai was a plus. Would definitely consider staying here again if I come back to Kauai.

Directions and key exchange was super easy and done by email. Dan and Erin were very helpful. The neighborhood is in a great location. We felt very safe. The neighborhood was friendly and appeared exactly as pictured. Parking was easy and the beaches were very very close. The accommodations were economical and simple.
Dan and Erin's place was great - just as advertised. The private entrance/exit made coming and going a breeze and the room was large and very comfortable. Great spot on a gorgeous island.

Dan and Erin's place was absolutely perfect for what we needed ! The location was amazing with tons of beautiful beaches near by. The apartment had everything we needed to enjoy our stay and the lanai was a great added bonus. Would definitely stay here again. Dan and Erin were also super friendly and lovely.

We truly enjoyed our stay at Dan and Erin's place. The apartment was exactly as described and everything was organized so well. We did not get a chance to meet the hosts but they arranged for us to get into the unit very conveniently. So everything was self sufficient. In our opinion the apartment was even better looking than the pictures here on Airbnb. We especially enjoyed the lanai and the small kitchen space. Even though it is not a real full kitchen we could always prepare our meals conveniently which saved a lot of money. Also the amenities like the hot tub or the swimming pool were great after a day of hiking.

The location in Princeville is very convenient to explore the whole island with a rental car (in our eyes you definitely need one here on Kauai). Beautiful beaches such as Hideaways and Ke'e Beach are just a short drive away. 

Dan and Erin also provided beach chairs and enough towels which was very nice.

Be aware that it can rain a lot on Kauai. However, we always found a way to enjoy our time anyway (for example on the nice lanai). 

All in all it was a perfect week in the private little apartment. We would definitely recommend it.

Mahalo Dan and Erin.

Dan and Erin's place was a good homebase for driving to the various sites on the north shore. Princeville is very different from the impression I got from other parts of the island. Orderly, great for families with kidsand, tugged away in what feels like a gated community. Our hosts provided plenty of detailed information and instructions via email and in a binder. Loved the large fridge and shady balcony with a comfy couch.

Dan and Erin were very nice hosts and a very interesting persons to talk to. They did everything for us to feel welcome which they achieved. The accommodation itself has everything you need and even more.
Others complained about noise (children, roosters) we did not hear such noise at all, only some children during daytime. Also parking, which supposed to be an issue on earlier reviews was not trouble at all, lots of space available, also in the evening.
We can definitely recommend the place.
We could tell what we were getting from the pictures but I feel the place was very overpriced for a bedroom.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Dan and Erin's place. The space was comfortable, the lanai was cozy and the location was perfect. We would definitely stay there again.

My wife and I spent one of two weeks of our honeymoon in Hawaii and wanted a place off the beaten path that was affordable and in a picturesque Kaua'i setting. Erin's second floor place had a cozy tropical cabin feel with a beautiful lanai (covered porch), and we opened the screen door to allow for a cross-breeze when the place got hot. The listing was exactly as described, including a full fridge, coffeemaker, utensils, towels, a huge shower area, Internet, and we had a great conversation with Erin about the region and Hawaiian lifestyle. We'll keep Erin in mind when we visit Kaua'i again to hike the NaPali Coast.

Dan & Erin gave very clear instructions for arrival.  The room was very self-sufficient but it was comforting to know that Dan & Erin were next door if we needed anything.  In the room, there was a great hiking guide book which was a fantastic resource.  
The full size fridge was very useful for us -- we stored lots of tropical fruits in it! And we enjoyed eating our tropical fruits on the deck outside :)
Super expérience!
Un séjour agreable dans une résidence un peu excentrée,  mais très bien située pour découvrir la napali coast et les plages environnantes.

Nous trouvions que le logement avait l'air mieux en vrai que sur les photos. La chambre et le balcon sont très spacieux. La zone piscine/barbecue est très proche du logement. La clef est accrochée à la porte dans un cadenas, ce qui nous permet de ne pas avoir à la traîner.
We loved our apartment in Princeville, conveniently located near beautiful spots in Hanalei. Our favorite part of staying there was having breakfast in the balcony (lanai). Mahalo Dan & Erin!
We never met Dan and Erin but their directions to the studio were accurate and we found everything as described.

It was so easy to check in - on time with everything clean and ready for us. We booked last minute and they were able to quickly accommodate our arrival which was greatly appreciated. The bed was comfortable, the bathroom was clean and the wifi was fast. We loved the seating area on the balcony, the surprise discovery of a hot plate so we could fry eggs and the use of the pool/hot tub on property. They had beach towels available for us which came in very handy!

Le studio est situé dans un quartier résidentiel. Il a un grand balcon et nous avions accès à la piscine et au jaccuzzi qui était fort agréable. La cuisine est très petite et pas évident de cuisiner. Nous avons dû acheter le nécessaire pour laver la vaisselle. Même absent de l'île Erin a répondu rapidement à toutes mes questions. Le studio est confortable.

The overall experience was absolutely fantastic. I couldn't have asked for a better stay. Everything was provided and Dan and Erin went above and beyond in helping know what the surrounding area had to offer.
Dan & Erin's place was in a central location in the Princeville area. The place was cozy and looked exactly like the photos on Airbnb.
It was an awesome stay! Super close to hanalei bay and convenient to grocery stores, shops and restaurants. The studio was clean and quiet. I would definitely recommend staying here.

This apartment was well worth the money. we throughly enjoyed the accessability to everything on the north side of the island. the appartment itself had everything we needed. it was a wonderful experience.
The location was wonderful and the place itself was perfectly described

Directions were perfect. Check-in was easy. We never used the pool or BBQ area, but it always seemed to be active. I could see parking being an issue if the property was busier, but not something that would have stopped me from renting this place.

We didn't meet Erin or Dan, but the studio apartment was exactly as advertised and is very well situated for activities on the North coast. If you plan on cooking, there is sufficient kitchen equipment but very little prep space and no table and chairs. The sink is shared with the bathroom. Eating on the lanai on the comfy sofa and chair is pleasant and works fairly well, and the community hot tub is great!

All in all, we thought it was a very good value.

The room was accurately described, although it should be noted that it is a second-floor studio with access only by stairs.  It was clean, reasonably spacious, and well located on the north shore, although not within walking distance of much, which is true of pretty much all of Kauai.  It is relatively close (about a mile) from the only shopping center in the area.

The hosts communicated well, and everything met our expectations.  In particular, it was very fairly priced, which is important for someone on a budget.  The lanai was very nice to sit out on.  There is also access to a pool, which we did not use.

The room includes a refrigerator and microwave, but there really isn't a kitchen (there are lots of kitchen utensils, including plates, glasses, cutlery, a coffee maker, etc., and a hot plate which we did not use).  There also really isn't a table at which to eat.  There are grills next to the pool which we believe can be used and would probably be better than trying to cook in the room.

There is a single sink outside the bathroom.  The bathroom itself was fine, with a good shower.  The hosts supply four bath size towels (two for the bath, two for the beach), but they are getting old and could be replaced.  They also supply two beach chairs, which were very much appreciated.  There is no real closet, but there are hangers and hooks on which to hang things.  There is adequate drawer space for things that don't need to hang.  Our only real issue is that several slats were missing from the vertical blinds on the door to the lanai, reducing privacy.

Also, there is limited parking -- if you expect to be out late at night, it may be a problem finding a space when you return.

We enjoyed our stay and would return.
A

I did not meet Dan & Erin, but the check in process was simple and easy-with a lockbox code to get into the apartment. The home was clean and had everything we would need for a perfect stay. The neighborhood was calm and quiet and the complex had a really nice pool and hot tub to enjoy. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Quaint little apartment with just what we needed.  It's located in a nice area and felt secure.  We were able to cook a few meals using the hotplate and cookware provided.  There is not a full kitchen but we didn't need that.  The lanai provided a nice spot to hang out in the evenings and enjoy the warm weather. Overall, a perfect little place for one or two people.

Our stay at Dan & Erin's place was great.  The private studio had everything we needed and I loved sleeping with the cool breezes flowing through.  It is only a short drive to beautiful Hanalei, which has a great vibe, spectacular beaches, shops and restaurants.
Princeville itself has some wonderful eateries and a fabulous shopping center that is a comfortable walking distance away.  The studio is clean and cosy, in a safe area, exactly as described.!  The pool and hot tub an added bonus.  Highly recommend seeking out the Happy Talk Bar at Hanalei Bay Resort for an ice cold beer, the staff are brilliant! Mahalo Dan & Erin we loved Kauai!

Dan and Erin's place was a very cute and clean studio. It had everything that we needed from kitchenware and a grill down in the pool area to even a small cooler that we used everyday for beach trips! The studio is close to Hanalei with cute shops and the most beautiful beaches! We had the best time in Kauai and would definitely recommend Dan and Erin's place!
Dan & Erin's place was great.  The location was very convenient for north shore, and they gave us great tips for what to do in the area.
Super séjour, merci

The location was terrific in terms of getting to some really nice beaches on the north side of the island.  Very convenient to the shops as well.  The kitchen facilities are a bit awkward If you like to prepare your own meals as opposed to dining out. I value a quiet place during the evening and I was pleasantly surprised that the complex was very quiet after 9:00pm.  Most appreciated.  All in all, the location and value make this a good stay.

In a good spot to reach Hanalei and travel to Kapaa.
Would recommend to anyone looking to explore the North of Kauai.
Check in was easy with minimal fuss.
Very accurate listing, great location, pool, hot tub, grill very clean, nice.  Had everything we needed to cook in room, much appreciated.

This place was perfect for a home base to go out and explore from. The space was lovely. We especially enjoyed the large balcony. The room was on the smaller side but plenty of space for us. The bed was extra comfy! We cooked some meals on the hot plate which worked out well.

Dan and Erin were not on site but communicated everything clearly and were very quick to respond. After being in Kauai for 10 days we could not imagine staying anywhere else. Princeville was and absolutely perfect location for everything we wanted to do on the island and the room was exactly what we needed. It was comfortable, clean, and in an extremely quiet community. It's right down the road from dining and shopping and a short drive to Hanalei, one of the best neighborhoods on the Island. We really felt at home in the studio and couldn't be more pleased with our choice.

We had an enjoyable stay in this place.
Location is very convenient to visit north of kauai. However no wifi found and amenities are minimum (few dishes, no shampoo., no hairdryer..).
Mastress was too soft for us.
Pool and barbecue are available in the complex.
1851 Latham st
Clean and nice place to stay, it was very easy to get to all the hiking and fun activities on the North shore from the place.

This place is  a terrific find! We stayed 8 days and it was like living there. It is very convenient for getting to beaches, shopping and restaurants. A short drive to Hanalei and a half a dozen beaches. The apartment was quiet, clean and comfy with all we needed during our stay. The pool is gorgeous and the perfect temperature for relaxing around in the evening. Say meow to Pickles the cat! Thanks so much Dan & Erin! Aloha!
This was a quiet and comfortable spot. Great amenities like the deck, pool and parking spot. Not far from the Princeville Center with Foodland and many other shops.

Well located place in Princeville - definitely need a car but close to beautiful beaches and shops. Clean and well looked after place to stay in, absolute treat. Would recommend everyone to stay there! Kauai is beautiful.

Dan and Erin were great and made our stay very easy and comfortable. The apt is located well with a quick drive to many restaurants etc as well as Hanalei and all of the great beaches around. Highly recommend.

We had a great time! The place is cozy, relax, clean, perfect for a couple. We enjoy the terrace. The swimming pool at the center is great. Near a grocerie store, some restaurant, 10min (car driving) from Hanalai bay. Quiet all day
We really enjoy the studio and the island of Kauai. Amazing trip !!

Location is great. Close to Hanalei Bay and all the beaches on the north shore. We were very pleased that we could use the beach chairs and mats. We loved that we could make breakfast at home (coffee machine, plates etc.). 
Pool and condo is nice and calm. There was no noise at all. 
Dan and Erin were quick to respond to any questions.
We loved our stay and would definitely book this again!

Wow, great experience all around! Dan & Erin's place exceeded our expectations. Loved everything the space had to offer, including the large fridge space and cooking items to make some meals at home. We also were so appreciative of the beach chairs, umbrella, and cooler, which made for some great days on the beach. Highly recommend staying here! Princeville and the North Shore were incredible and we can't wait to book another trip here in the future.

Dan & Erin's place is absolutely lovely - perfect little studio local in Princeville. They were immediately very communicative regarding instructions for entry. Comfy, comfy bed and clean. The second floor outdoor balcony is so nice - has a comfy couch, great for morning yoga. Oh and the pool / hot tub is close and AWESOME, nice and warm, 3-7 feet deep. Would love to stay here again! :)

Dan and Erin were great hosts!  Very much appreciated the cleanliness of their place,  self-sufficiency of check in/out,  ease of communication, and visitor info provided to guests.  Nice location in Princeville.

The rental unit was as described for the most part. The "amenities" within the unit, specifically the kitchenette utilities and utensils, were fairly outdated. However, the pool and location of Dan and Erin's place was worth the money!

My husband accidentally broke a plate while washing it, so I messaged our hosts immediately. They did not seem concerned and for that, we are so gracious.

Although we did not meet the couple, their level of communication was unmatched. They made check-in and out a breeze, and responded quickly when messaged.

Mahalo! :)

Dan and Erin's place is a cozy and comfortable second floor apartment in a very quiet neighborhood in Princeville. It had everything my partner and I needed. We saved a little money and cooked dinner in the apartment a few of nights we stayed with the electric rice cooker and hot plate they had provided. Perfect! 

The community pool, jacuzzi and BBQ grills were all a very nice option for us and everyone we met in the complex (just a few) were super friendly and either retired, vacationers or families. 

Best part of their place is the breezy balcony and plenty of drying hooks for all of your wet things. 

Super timely response and communicative to the one question we had (where's the pool key? near the door of course!).

This place was great. We really enjoyed our stay. The condo is nice and cozy and the location is fantastic. You are close to all the most beautiful places along the North Shore of Kauai. Keep in mind that you need a rental car to get around, but if you have one, you can basically get anywhere on the island in a short amount of time.

Thank you Dan & Erin. Princeville is a beautiful location. Make sure to rent a car to get around the island with ease,  the beauty will take your breath away. The studio was small, comfortable,  clean, quiet and easily accessible. All the necessities were provided and we had great communication from Erin, although our hosts were not on the island during our stay, we were able to check in and out with ease and had no problems throughout our 9 day stay.  We thoroughly enjoyed barbecuing at the pool and spa and sitting on the lanai drinking our coffee every day. We will be back again!

Dan and Erin's studio is exactly as promised.  It is clean, comfortable, and very relaxing.  The bed is super comfy and the mornings are cool and quiet!  We enjoyed the location and easily visited the nearby beaches and Hanalei town.  Unfortunately, we were out too late to make it back in time to thoroughly enjoy the nice public hot tub (closes at 9pm). Dan and Erin were easy to reach and responded to questions promptly.  I am grateful for their flexibility when I had to make changes to my itinerary.  I would love to return to Kauai soon and hope to stay in their place again!
The host canceled this reservation 53 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Dan & Erin’s place is perfect for anyone looking for a quiet place in a great location. Only a few minutes drive from all the main beaches, we had a blast staying here and the hot tub and community grill are definitely a +! We would return in a heartbeat!
Good location, everything was as described, parking can be a bit of a challenge a times,  it is noisy early, so no sleeping in.   Good value for the price.

This is a nice little studio at the heart of Princeville. The location is all one could ask for. Hosts have provided most of the amenities including every little thing one might need for cooking meals but there is really not any space to make use of all that. There isn't a dedicated parking spot. We were a little disappointed with the cleanliness. There was dust all over, couple of unclean towels, utensils, dirty shower floor and curtains. The place missed few basic necessities like hand soap, kitchen towel, tissue paper. We were informed of missing toiletries when asked so we were prepared accordingly. Shower is low for tall people. There isn't any closet space in the entire studio.

The stay started on a bad note as we had a check in time of 3pm but were unable to get ahold of the hosts and couldn’t actually check in until 6:40pm which changed our plans for the evening/night. This was unprofessional and disappointing. When we did get the access code to check in we arrived to a lovely studio apartment with a nice balcony area. The studio was very small but had everything we needed. We ultimately enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to others. I hope the communication issue is taken as constructive criticism and they fix that bit.
Nice, affordable place in a great spot of Kauai. Very close to shops, restaurants, and beaches. We were very comfortable and will definitely be back.

Dan & Erin's place was perfect. The price was fantastic for what you get and everything was clean. Loved chilling out on the furnished lanai after a long day of exploring. Princeville is a nice area as well. Very close to the fantastic little town of Hanalei. I would definitely stay here again. Mahalo Dan & Erin.
Great location in Princeville. Excellent amenities. Dan and Erin have a lovely place and I would definitely stay there again.

Great place! The studio itself is perfect! The only draw back is the complex has a lot of people and they were loud at times. We also had no luck getting into the hot tub because it was being heavily used or closed for cleaning. But overall we had a super positive experience and would definitely come back!

We appreciated having access to the space for the duration of our stay. It was adequate for our needs and was mostly "as advertised". There were, however, a few things that would have made our stay more comfortable (ie, sufficient enough toilet paper, clean towels [towels smelled of being wet in a washing machine for too long], more hooks or racks to hang things on, sharpened knives, a dish sponge/brush, dish soap, shower soap, a deck of cards etc.). The hosts were responsive when we asked about the toilet paper and clean towels; the neighbor brought us one more roll (three rolls for a nine day trip for two women) and washed/dried the towels for us. Overall, the space was sufficient for our needs and accurately advertised, but certainly didn't provide any extras to make it more comfortable/homey.

Erin's place is a great self-contained studio in a residential area (the pictures don't do it justice)! It is an ideal spot for exploring Hanalei, the Napali coast and the occasional trip to Lihue. We loved having breakfast on the covered balcony each morning!

Dan and Erin's was an A+! Huge bang for your buck in terms of what you're getting for going rental rates on the island on AirBnB! If there is any downside at all it's that the location is a bit of a drive from the airport on the South Shore end, otherwise everything was exceptional. Pool/hot tub area on site is far nicer than even the pics posted in the listing give it credit for! Relaxing spot to wind down each night before heading off to sleep. The shower area is spacious! Very big advantage when washing all the sand off from our beach adventures each day! Hot water availability was never an issue. Porch area is a nice amenity, unfortunately it's not screened in so mosquitoes were plentiful out there at night given the time of year we visited (early April) as things were rather damp outside all trip. All necessary amenities were exactly as listed (if not better). Beach chairs and beach cooler were an added bonus that we got full use out of every day. Place is fairly easy to find and parking was never an issue. Cannot beat the price for those looking to get a taste of the North Shore life, as it was only a 5-10 minute drive up to Hanalei Bay and all of its little store fronts/restaurants. Very outdoorsy, more scenic part of the island compared to the other parts and we explored it all! We would stay here again and certainly recommend to others looking for a nice place to simply lay your head at night at an affordable rate!
Excellent location for the north shore and enough kitchen supplies to cook some meals. Clean and comfy.
Everything was great, the apartment was as described, Dan and Erin were quick to answer any questions we had. We will definitely come back and refer this place to our friends.

Great location, can walk all around Princeville down to Hideaways beach, Queen's Baths and the St. Regis for a sneaky sunset cocktail. Basic in terms of amenities but otherwise everything needed for a convenient Kauai pad! Dan & Erin were great communicators and hosts.

Excellent place, great location, can not possibly beat the value. Not ideal if you have a car because parking can be unavailable unexpectedly. But if you don’t, this place is absolutely perfect and a gem.

Nice neighborhood (neighbors were a bit loud at times but not constantly) , pool/BBQ area was a nice plus too.  The studio itself was falling apart in places/dated.  Coffee maker didn't work, screen door and a few other things didn't work properly.  It was clean and they did have a blender, toaster, fridge, pot and pan which made it helpful for eating in. Nice outdoor deck where you can eat and watch the rain. :)
cozy place for an overnight stay. the location is unbeatable, and everything you need to have a comfortable morning. coffee, hot plates, and all the dishes to get going in the morning

Dan and Erin are were quality hosts.  They're both relaxed and offered good advice when we talked with them about local spots, issues, and everything in between.  Their kids were adorable and brightened our day every time we saw them!  My wife and I found walking and public transit to be an awesome way around the Princeville and Hanalei areas (we enjoyed slowing down; Princeville shopping centre, Queen's Bath, Hideaway Beach, and a bus stop were all within a half our walk of their place - albeit in different directions).  Be prepared to wait for the buses.  Any other adventure you are looking to have will likely need a rental car.
Wonderful location in Princeville. Very close to grocery store, Hanalei Bay, and The Queen’s Baths. Great hosts, too!
We were happy to find exactly what we expected. Erin was very helpful to us for the check in. The studio is excellently located and well equipped. Parking is easy and all is at hands.
Great location and having the lenai is a great addition!

***STAY HERE*** You won't find a better value for such a beautiful place in Kauai. 

This was my third visit, second time staying in Princeville. This studio is in a gorgeous area! We loved that there was a full sized fridge so we had plenty of space for all of our food/drinks/frozen items. (We made a trip to Costco right after the airport). We used the coffee maker everyday.  There were sugar cubes there for our use as well. There is a hot plate which we used several times, another plug in skillet type pan as well which we used multiple times. There was a blender, toaster, I think a rice cooker as well. We cooked at home everyday, it was awesome and definitely a money saver. There is a pool/hot tub/bbq area just steps away from the studio. You MUST bbq! The bbq's are really nice and the pool was awesome. I reget not spending more time in the pool. 

Hideaway beach is my favorite place on Earth and it's just minutes away from here. The lanai (patio/deck) is amazing, it was a major added bonus.  We really enjoyed spending time out there everyday and it's an awesome place to eat breakfast. 

There wasn't AC which surprisingly was not an issue for us at night. You can keep the sliding door open (with the screen door shut) and there are shutters beside the bed as well as a ceiling fan. We had no issues sleeping! I struggle with sleep normally but I can honestly say I had some of the best sleep in my life here. 

A couple of tips - bring your own bar soap/soap for washing hands because there was only a small dish soap. I read previous reviews very carefully so that I could be fully prepared for our stay and someone else had said there wasn't soap. I packed dish soap, hand soap, roll of paper towel, some ziplock bags, and a dish sponge (I didn't see any dish sponge for doing dishes in the studio so I'm glad I brought one) You can easily buy stuff when you are there too, but nothing beats hitting the dollar store and just packing a few things. 

If you enjoy cooking as much as we do AND if you are checking in some luggage at the airport, I highly recommend packing a couple of your go-to chopping/pearing knives. The ones in the BNB are very dull, but we made it work!

I could go on and on about how awesome this place is. I've stayed in Princeville down the street at another studio and it didn't have nearly as much to offer as this place did. I can't wait to come back to Kauai and I would 100% recommend staying here. 

Mahalo!
Amazing flat with terrace in a beautiful complex. Definitely recommended!
Great value. Really nice place to stay for a few days.

The apartment is clean, spacious, and in a great location close by to Hanalei. We loved that there is a BBQ, pool, and hot tub available. It is a bummer that the apartment complex requires guests to leave the pool area at 8:45pm because we would have liked to use it later. Overall we’d recommend Dan and Erin’s at Sandpiper Village.
Great value for the area. Would stay again. There was a few things we would of liked better but for the cost I can deal with it. Great value
Nice place. We appreciated that we could cook small meals. The place was clean. There were a few things that we could borrow to go to the beach. I would recommend this place.

Wow! Great place to stay in the northern shore of Kauai!

The appartment is big en the patio was great for breakfast. The swimmingpool was a surprise, it was better than the online pictures. 

We left 4 beers (2 glass + 2 cans) in the fridge for the next guests.

We’ll stay again in sandpiper village if we go to kauai!

We had lots of fun!

CC

Dan and Erin were excellent hosts with a very clean space. The private lanai was a perfect place to enjoy coffee in the morning and having access to the pool/hot tub was great. Very friendly community. Local tips/recommendations were awesome and helpful in deciding our daily adventures. Super close to St. Regis for a beautiful sunset cocktail!

Lovely studio with balcony in the quiet and green heart of Princeville. Near to Hanalei Bay and Na Pali Coast. Very nice place to stay especially with family and kids, pool area accessible and shopping area with large super market 5 minutes away. I would highly recommend staying at Dan & Erin's place!

Dan and Erin's was just as listed, a simple studio with basic amenities for a great price. There is no AC but the fan was usually okay- not sure how uncomfortable it would get in summer though, especially if you get hot easily. Otherwise they were very communicative and helpful, and gave lots of recommendations for the island.
Great location, bring your own toiletries, hair dryer, coffee filters and wine opener. Great value for the $$$.
Large space for a studio. Not a full kitchen, but everything we could think of was there to cook meals. Hosts are friendly and provided a lot of tips and suggestions for what to do on the island!

The location was great. The lanai was relaxing. The pool/BBQ area is great and even had wifi. Check in was very easy and for the most part the place was very comfortable. We did not sleep well on that bed and the pillows were very thin. We had to buy a wine opener and toilet paper so hopefully the next people get to use it.

The place is just as described - nice clean studio in a great location at a great price.
Easy check in and check out. Definitely worth it :)
Great place!!

Fantastic stay for a superb value. 
Mahalo Dan and Erin for letting us stay.
Happy New Year

Great location and value in princeville. Spacious for a studio, nice to have a deck as well. Bit noisy only because of close quarters in the condo complex but excellent budget option for the north shore.

Good value for money. We didn't use any of the amenities at the location.

Check-in was easy. Hosts were responsive when contacted.

The oft-cited parking issue was not a problem for us since we were out early and back by 8pm during our stay.

No air conditioning but the ceiling fan was sufficient for our January stay.

Overall good value for the money.

Nice and quiet place to stay when you want to visit  the north shore. Great swimmingpool with BBQ’s.  Be aware that the road is  closed after Hanalei, so you can’t do some tracks over there or visit some beaches
Fantastic studio and great location.  Had a great time there.  Made our stay memorable.   Would def recommend for anyone planning kuaui
Dan and Erin's place was in a great location and was a really good value!
Very nice and quit Aparment between the locals.

The kitchenette was well stocked and the unit had many thoughtful touches to make beach life comfortable. It was a very quiet neighbourhood with friendly ppl and we really enjoyed socializing at the pool and hot tub.

Ezgi’s place is 10/10. The flat is really beautiful, it is in a central location- close to everything and in a very safe and nice neighborhood. Ezgi is also a perfect host- she helped us with everything and her hospitality is outstanding! We really recommend this place for everyone to stay in Istanbul. Thank you Ezgi!

name: Piso de lujo en Sagrada Familia

Está equipado con 3 TV’s, horno, microondas, secador de pelo, lavadora, secadora, plancha, aire acondicionado / calefacción, wifi...

Está equipado con 3 TV’s, horno, microondas, secador de pelo, lavadora, secadora, plancha, aire acondicionado / calefacción, wifi... Situado a 250m de la Basílica de la Sagrada Familia. En las inmediaciones encontrarán todos los servicios tales como supermercados, un mercado local, bares, restaurantes típicos de la zona y transporte público cercano.

summary: Prince Edward Room for 1 person with lift !! This is about 6 mins walk to MTR in Prince Edward To City U / Poly U only 15 mins. Very convenient area Many restaurants around. Lots of cheap shopping around too. 711 is like mins. away This is a share flat. Meet new friends !!!

Will be calculated pro-rated shared with other (Hidden by Airbnb) .  Thank you

you will get to MEET NEW FRIENDS !!!

Enjoy Your Stay !

name: Galata Ekonomik 1
summary: Odamız, 25 metrekare, standart otel odası özelliklerine sahip ve konforludur. Ücretsiz çay-kahve seti ve su ikramımız fiyata dahildir.
space: Galata Kulesi'ne 50 metre mesafede, cadde üzerinde ve oldukça merkezi konumdadır. Şişhane metro istasyonu yine 50 metre uzaklıktadır.
description: Odamız, 25 metrekare, standart otel odası özelliklerine sahip ve konforludur. Ücretsiz çay-kahve seti ve su ikramımız fiyata dahildir. Galata Kulesi'ne 50 metre mesafede, cadde üzerinde ve oldukça merkezi konumdadır. Şişhane metro istasyonu yine 50 metre uzaklıktadır. Binada asansörümüz ve 2 koltuklu şirin oturma alanımız bulunmaktadır. Misafirlerimizin isteği doğrultusunda her konuda yardımcı olabiliriz. Galata, İstanbul'un kalbinde, gezilecek yerlerin başındadır. Hem eğlence merkezleri hem de tarihi doku bir adım mesafede. Büyük Hendek Caddesi, No 34 (Galata Kulesi'ni boydan gören cadde) Şişhane Metro İstasyonu Şişhane çıkışı: 50 metre Şişhane Otobüs Durağı: 70 metre Karaköy Tramvay Durağı: 200 metre Karaköy Vapur İskelesi: 200 metre İstiklal Caddesi'nin en sonundan Galataya Doğru yürüyerek 5 dakika içerisinde otele ulaşabilirsiniz. İstiklal Caddesi'ne, bankalara, rıhtıma ve toplu taşıma istasyonlarına çok yakındır.

reviews.comments: teşekkürler

Nice cozy place to stay , just a few steps from Galata Tower, and all the happening places to be at.

Our room was damn spacious, neat and clean with all the necessary amenities.

Great Location.
Great Hospitality.

I would highly recommend staying at Galata 34. For the money, it's definitely an unbeatable deal. The room was very spacious, clean, had everything we needed and was located in a very lively area just steps away from the Galata Kulesi and the Sishane metro station. The staff was very friendly and helpful and made us feel very welcome. Our expectations were exceeded.

Stayed here for one night. They responded quickly,  let me check in early and let my 3 friends stash all their huge suitcases before their late flight out of the city, so we could explore the city some more without hauling a bunch of bags. Great location, very affordable compared to other spots in the area. No frills, but an  inexpensive spot to  stay if you'll be mostly out in the city.
there were friendly and helpfull crew and the place was middle of turistic cafes, restaurants etc.

DO NOT use this place! Someone was in my room while I was out and was smoking (I'm a non smoker), there was a pile of cigarette ash on the floor and in the bathroom cigarette ash all over my items on the vanity unit when I return. The reception advised that the owner uses my bathroom (private en suite). There is no cleaning of the rooms as all during the stay. Total disappointing.
perfect for a single traveler, good value for money taking into consideration it was a public holiday and a lot of tourists in istanbul. Would use it again in the future.

I loved the location, its very near galata tower in a great neighborhood. 1 min away from the metro and 10 min walking time to istiklal street.
there is no view though, if you are not spending any time in the hotel, I definitely recommend you to book here.

The location is a few simple steps from Galata tower and its resturants and  nitelife. The host was prompt and helped accomodate my 1 am flight out of IST. Overall the experience was  great for a traveler like me who spent much of the day touring.
位置超好,房东会英语,还过来接我
Good location, hospitable stuff, clean places.
Place was great for me, walking distance to Galata. Thanks for everything!
İyiydi kısacası

Super helpful host. He totally went out of his way to help us find a taxi and helped carry our bags to it as well. His response/communication was always clear and quick. His hotel is walking distance to isteklal caddesi, galata tower, and all the shopping Beyoğlu has to offer. Loved it!

Please ask for a quote. -Tours and transportation are available. host.host_about:
Hi I'm Jane.
Thank you for finding my vacation rental.

I am a dedicated full-time Airbnb host.
I have Airbnb listings in Tokyo and Waikiki. 
I try my very best to accommodate your traveling needs.
I respond to your message as quickly as I can.  
I have a driver license to drive a big commercial bus in Japan.
I provide transportation services to travelers who book my Airbnb in Japan. 

I was born and raised in Japan.
I have lived in USA, China, and Ecuador.
I speak Japanese, English, Mandarin Chinese and Spanish.
I love traveling and learning different cultures and languages.
I have traveled to more than 30 countries.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

如果您有任何问题,请随时联系我｡

reviews.comments:
Jane is excellent super host. She is kind, thoughtful (bringing tape for us to pack boxes, etc) and very responsive.

We rent her van for disney drop & pick up, hakone & Mt Fuji 1 day tour, and going to the airport. She also picked us up at Tokyo Station when we arrived Tokyo.

She is very generous with her time and drive us to many interesting places. Her destination choices & options are 

She also helped me on researching the trains line in Tokyo that can be combine with JR Pass and recommended places when we go by train on our own. 
The apt is a bit small for 4 adults & 2 kids. 15 mins walk to train station and 4 stops to shinjuku.

 Overall, her place and tour service is very recommended
地點距離新百合ｹ丘車站不遠的住宅社區,晚上很安靜,距離麻生川很近,散步好地方,房東回覆十分快速,網路變慢時,還沒通報房東自己就先過來解決｡房間很大,也蠻乾淨的,十分推薦!
good place

name: 定安大厦单人间,近红磡#只接受女生#TO KWA WAN/ Girls Accepted Only

Good location. Host response very good quick. Room very good can be acceptable.

A lovely cute and small place, which has a good location and view from the window! Every morning around 8 am, I looked out the window and saw a man opposite practicing TAI CHI on his rooftop, and to the right the water view and brilliant architecture. 

However, the room is quite small and dusty. Also, be sure to bring your own towel :)
虽然入住过程中出现了一些些小插曲,但是房东人真的很好｡
房源很不错 交通便利 房东姐姐人很ni ce 女生一个人来住很安全
房客都是女生 很安全放心 房东姐姐很有耐心人也很nice 一个人来住的话蛮好的 就是刚来的时候位置比较难找 房间比较小 但性价比很高 交通也比较方便
位置很好,去维港､旺角什么的都很方便,价格划算,别的地方三张床一个屋一张床都要120,这里是单间,其他房间都是女生,加起来一共三个人住｡也不用抢浴室,很方便｡态度很好,回复及时,是一次不错的经历｡

房间不是很大,但交通还挺方便的,去尖沙咀和九龙湾那边挺方便的｡跟房东沟通很愉快｡

name: sahrayıcedit merkezi lokasyon ferah.
summary: Geniş ferah aydınlık bir daire. Misafir odası da Geniş ve aydınlık. Ayrıca bir balkonu da var. Oturma salonu büyük sade döşeli rahat ve ferah. Salonun balkonu çiçeklerle bezeli. Masa ve sandalye var. Mutfakta her ekipman mevcut. Banyo ortak ve her türlü ihtiyaç malzemesi bulunmakta. Evimiz temiz düzenli rahat ferah. Altıncı kat daire aydınlık, önü açık. Bir aile evi. Müthiş güzel kahvaltımız da keyifle sunacağımız bonus umuz. Şehrimizi gezmeden önce Güne keyifle, zinde  başlayın. :-)

neighborhood_overview: Ulaşımı sıkıntısı yok. Taksim Beşiktaş Eminönü Karaköy Adalar Kadıköy Üsküdar Çamlıca Bosphorus çevresi gibi başlıca merkezi yerlere kolay Rahat Ulaşım. Huzurlu sakin elit bir semt. Marketler pazar, ve diğer  alışveriş olanakları çok. Halkı saygılı kibar. Erenköy ile Göztepe arasında bir mahalle
transit: Kadıköy'den  Pendik' e kadar Asya (Anadolu) yakası sahil paralelinde tüm semtlere minibüs ile Ulaşım her saat mevcut. E-5 yolu yürüme mesafesinde. Buradan da otobüs minibüs ve metro ile Ulaşım alternatifleri çok fazla. Boğaz kıyı şeridine otobüs Ulaşımı var. Kadıköy ve Üsküdar dan vapur ve küçük motorlarla Avrupa yakası ya da Boğaz kıyısındaki semtlere deniz ulaşımları var. Atatürk havalimanı ve sabiha gökçen havalimanından otobüsler ve havabüs servisleri ile kolay Ulaşım. Daha pek çok yere Ulaşım konusunda bilgi verebilirim.
interaction: Tüm sorularınızı mesajla gönderebilirsiniz.

host.host_about: Fotoğraf çekmeyi ve Seyahat etmeyi çok seviyorum. fırsat buldukça yeni yerler keşmetmek için yollara düşerim. Turist değil seyyah olmak yeni kültürler ve insanlar tanımak ilgimi çekiyor. Hümanist barışçıl öğrenmeye meraklı bir okurum. Kitap okumak vazgeçilmezim. Tiyatro oyunlarını mutlaka takip ederim. Sanat etkinliklerini takip ederim. Sade bir yaşantım var. Işim evim kitaplarım ailem arkadaşlarım internet ve gezilerim.

reviews.comments: My family stayed at Sin and were really pleased with everything! Sin was helpfull during the stay and quick to answer messages.

host.host_about:
I am a very independent person and an  art lover . A love nature in all its versions ( especially wild nature). My pasion it is travel trough Africa, Asia and Lating America. To enjoy the wild habitats, and the old and traditional cultures.
Since I have retired recently, after working in a big company as art restorer, now  I have much more free time, so I decide to deal myself with the apartment bookings .
 I use the house , for inviting friends and enjoy the beach, on  weekends and holydays, but I live in Barcelona.

name: Casa completa no Condomínio Mansões!
summary: Excelente casa de dois andares em condomínio fechado na Barra da Tijuca, com segurança privada, para todas as famílias. Um dos melhores condomínios da Barra da Tijuca! Área de lazer, natureza exuberante e balsa exclusiva para Praia da Reserva.
space: Ampla casa no Condomínio Mansões - Barra da Tijuca, onde artistas famosos residem. Espaço aconchegante, casa com piscina privativa, varanda, churrasqueira, segurança privada 24h. São 05 quartos (sendo dois conjugados), 03 banheiros internos e dois externos, sala para 04 ambientes, cozinha montada, lavabo, lavanderia com duas lavadoras de roupa automáticas, finamente decorada com ambientes diversificados. Condomínio com excelente área de lazer, seguro, com acesso de balsa própria direto para a Praia da Reserva.

host.host_about: Gosto muito de lidar com pessoas. Sou casada, tenho uma filha e uma neta, meu marido tem uma agência de viagens. De 5 a 20 de agosto recebemos em nossa casa diversos hospedes para as Olimpíadas que aconteceram no Rio de Janeiro, entre eles famílias de atletas e estrangeiros. Meu lema de vida é ser feliz, com honestidade e sempre me envolvendo com pessoas.

address.street: Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A casa é muito ampla, exatamente conforme a descrição. O espaço é limpo. A cozinha possui os itens básicos. Toalhas e lençóis limpos e confortáveis. A casa fica em um condomínio silencioso e privativo. Bem seguro. Fomos muito bem recepcionados, a anfitriã esteve disponível por telefone todo o tempo disponível para todas as nossas necessidades. Foi muito cuidadosa e atenciosa em todos os detalhes. Recomendo com certeza. Voltaremos outras vezes!!
Excelente lugar, super recomendable, hogar muy comodo y muy eqiopado, con  amplios espacios comunes, habitacionea cómodas y una galeria y piscina increibles!!!
Indico a todos que quiserem vir para o Rio de Janeiro este imóvel! Fui muito bem recebido pela anfitriã, toda casa limpa e perfeita! Eu e meus amigos amamos o local! Super indico!

A anfitriã é muito cuidadosa, atenciosa, disponível e muito agradável. A casa é bastante hospitaleira, com roupas de cama e banho muito bem cuidadas.
Recomendo!
A casa da Maria Vilma é ótima! A estadia foi bem melhor que a minha equipe esperava. Hospitalidade e boa localização! Recomendo bastante!!
Fico muito grato e uma casa incrível, a hospitalidade, atenção, limpeza, ubicación, es incrível amei a casa, a piscina, tudo, tem que alugar aqui sem dúvida

Casa muito boa, bastante aconchegante e com ótima localização.  O condomínio é ótimo e muito seguro. Além disso, a Maria Vilma deixa bem a vontade e passa todas as informações. Passamos bons momentos!
Super recomendo.

name: Calm & Cozy 4BR with Parking

It is very conveniently placed close to a metro station, and also is within walking distance to a mall (including Supercenter Walmart, Asian supermarket) where you can find groceries and other necessities.

name: 3 1/2 apt in Quartier des spectacles of heart MTL
summary: This place has an amazing location in the heart of Montreal! Located in Quartier des spectacles.  It's 3 minutes by walk to metro station orange line , 5 minutes to metro station green line. Two big queen size beds  inside the apartment!  5 to 10 minutes walk to Old port, Place des Arts, Saint Catherine street, Saint Laurent street, saint Denis street and Metro station. We're located in ''Quartier des spectacles'', Montreal's hub and area of choice for art, food and nightlife lovers.

reviews.comments: Willam is a by far the best host I have  encountered. He is a very nice man and is willing to do anything to make your stay the best stay. His apartment was very clean basically brand new. Amazing place and location. Would definitely stay here again next time!

This place is at a great location in Montreal. Close to China town and Old Montreal. 

The Host is also great. He replies back quickly to your emails. When I contacted him that the Toilet was broken, he came the very next morning to fix it while we traveled Montreal.

Though minimalistic, this apartment suited our needs for this trip. The AC unit is in the living room and even though there is a good fan in the bedroom, if you like to be cold when you sleep you may be uncomfortable. The apartment is on a quiet street very close to Chinatown and about 10 minutes from Old Montreal.
Great location, clean, quick responses to questions and any needed help.  I recommend.

The room's greatest advantage is location. It's very close to Place des Festivals and the Notre Dame. It is very spacious and very clean. It has a full kitchen (full size fridge, stove, microwave, coffee maker etc.). Check in was not a problem. William was a very good host, very responsive to questions and issues. Open air parking is available nearby, costing 17 CAD per day (until 6 am of the next day, after that you have to pay another full day). 
On the negative side, the room can get hot in the summer and the A/C provided was VERY noisy (one of those portable units and it was situated in the living room, so had to put it at full and keep door open to cool the bedroom). The room definitely did not feel like home, with very poor/ cheap decoration and furnishing. Bed was comfortable however. Overall a budget option. Would look for something more "homey" next time.

Super clean, 1 bedroom with a pull out couch in the living room. Host left toiletries and coffee for us to use. Internet was fast. 

Location cannot be beaten!  So close to Old Montreal...but you have to walk through an amazing-smelling Chinatown to get there...even though we were full from supper at Gibby’s, walking back to the apartment through Chinatown made my mouth water!  

Highly recommend this place...host came early and saved us a street parking place where we were able to leave the car, for free, all weekend. 

Will definitely stay here when next in Montreal.

Zhan and William are easy to connect with, helpful, and respond very quickly. The apartment was sparkling clean, quiet, and very comfortable, especially the tempurpedic mattress. I haven't slept so well in years. The location was perfect with plenty of food, drink, activities, and entertainment right outside the door. I recommend parking your car in a 24-hour garage and forgetting about it for the duration of your stay as it is rewarding to explore the city by foot or by rented bicycle.
Basic apartment in a great location.
Location location location! Perfect place to jump start your Montréal trip. Walk into any direction and you will end up in great sites.  I recommend this to anyone.

Excellent location and within walking distance of many neighbourhoods. Clean and comfortable, but fairly basic accommodations. Host’s communication with me was excellent. Good value. Would definitely return

Great location and super clean apartment. Check-in instructions were crystal clear! I forgot the key card inside the apartment, Zhan came back and opened it for me in 30min. Quick responses and easy to connect with.
Great condo in a great location.  Hosts were always quick in responses and very helpful.  Very happy with this rental.
It was a great home! It was clean and has a very good location so that you can reach anywhere in the city easily.

El departamento impecable y limpio, básico pero con todo lo que uno necesita. 
Cerca de todo, podes ir caminando a todos lados. 
La comunicación fue excelente, siempre muy atento. 
Volvería sin dudas.

This is a perfect place to stay. it's clean and open, there's parking and easy check in. if you head down the street on foot you can reach amazing shopping and restaurants in one direction, the Chinatown district in the other and nightlife everywhere! William would respond to any message within seconds!

We had a great stay at Zhan's place. It was conveniently located within walking distance to the mall and many other shops/restaurants. Zhan was quick to respond to any inquiries and had great communication throughout our stay. Would definitely recommend this condo if you are looking for a central, clean location that is accessible by walking, metro or a quick uber ride to many different areas of Montreal (Old Port, Downtown, Mall etc). The apartment was tidy and had everything we needed for a pleasant stay!

This place was in an amazing location. Conveniently located to everything! Loved that we had a parking space. The airbnb itself was very clean and spacious! Amenities such as soap, shampoo, towels, coffee makers, wifi was all available. Will definitely come again. Only thing was Netflix wasn't working and the tv was hard to navigate but no biggie!

this is the 3th time I am staying in this building, this time in this apt but , as I think any other apts managed by Zhan/William, the experience was more than positive. The place is super clean, spacious, in a modern building with a garage with super easy accessibility, wifi works great. All perfect to me!
Amazing place, very helpful hosts. The apartment was extremely clean, and the location is perfect. The area is quiet and so are the neighbours. Would absolutely stay there again.

name: Be Happy in the Heart Of Montreal DT 1MIN to Metro

Enough pubs, restaurants and clubs to keep you busy for weeks. neighborhood_overview: Ville-Marie is the name of a borough (arrondissement) in the centre of the city of Montreal, Quebec. The borough is named after Fort Ville-Marie, the French settlement that would later become Montreal (now Old Montreal), which was located within the present-day borough.  This location is a popular attraction for both tourists and locals alike. North of De Maisonneuve Boulevard, one can find many luxury boutiques and art galleries in a Victorian architectural setting. To the south of de Maisonneuve the concentration of nightclubs, bars and restaurants makes this Montreal's most well-known nightlife strips.

reviews.comments:
Great location, within walking distance of downtown core and 1 block from guy concordia metro. Condo was clean and well presented. Matt was easy to communicate with and quick to reply.

Best bang for the buck out there.
Very nice and clean, just as in photos. Also includes Netflix!
Great location and close to the Metro which will get you anywhere!

Matt was a fantastic host, we had some questions after arrival and he was prompt with his responses both via text and within the AirBnB messenger. He was unable to meet us at check-in but his friend helped us park the car and even carry luggage up to the apartment! Parking on site is easy and a welcome amenity in a busy city. We didn't spend much time in the apartment outside of sleeping and getting ready in the morning, but it is just as pictured, clean, bright and enough room for our family and needs. The air conditioning was a welcome reprieve during a hot August and the beds were comfy and cozy. I would definitely recommend staying here and when we return next summer we would consider staying here again if still available.
Rapide et simple

Matts place is cozy. There are two queen beds with comfy comforters and more than enough pillows. He left us 4 clean towels. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need. Theres also a balcony with two chairs. Theres 2 convenience stores right across the street if you need snacks/beer/wine..super close to the heart of dt. Matt responds very quick too. Ubers are very easy to get in the area.
Thanks

Great place! Very clean and spacious. Awesome location. The building did have some construction going on, but it wasn’t a bother. The mattress was not the most comfortable thing ever, but I really liked the apartment! A lot of light, full kitchen, and a nice tv!

We recently spent a long weekend in Montreal.  We had a wonderful time and part of that was because Matt’s apartment gave us a place to come “home” to at the end of each busy day. The apartment is exactly like the pictures.  There were no bad surprises. It is very difficult to find a place in Montreal that has two distinct beds.... not a couch rollout or a blow up mattress.  This has two identical queen beds, one in the bedroom and one in the large living room. Everything was very comfortable and very clean!  Matt was a great host.  Check in couldn’t have been easier and he responded within minutes to everything we asked. I will be staying there again.  Matt, thank you so much! We had a wonderful time.
Great place to stay. Well decorated, comfortable, and  excellent communication with the host
We had a great stay at Matt's place.  His apartment is close to metro station. The two beds are very comfortable.

Matt was a wonderful host. From the moment I booked the Airbnb he was very informative and within the first couple of days of me booking he had already sent the instructions on how to get into the Airbnb followed by some rules. When arrived at the Airbnb it was exactly how it looked in the pictures.  Matt was very helpful when we had a problem turning on the shower i sent him a message and he was at the Airbnb within 5 minutes to help us out! The place was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. The location of the Airbnb was perfect an block away from all food stores and pharmacies and a one minute walk to the metro. Overall,Matt was a great host and I would definitely recommend his place if you are looking to stay a few days in Montreal. Thanks again Matt!

We were two professionals who stayed at the apartment for 5 nights to attend a conference. The apartment was very conveniently located for our needs (near Concordia University, grocery store, tons of restaurants, and public transportation). It was a safe neighborhood. The apartment itself was okay but spartan (as pictured so true to photos). Two real beds are great feature. No where else to sit though other than uncomfortable folded couch and dining table chairs. Missing some very basic things for any Airbnb place: NO maps, tourist information or instructions on how to use the TV and get into Netflix. Only towel rack was in the shower and NO washcloths or hand towels were provided. We got two large towels each and had to get paper towels from the kitchen to put in the bathroom to dry our hands. The beds were comfortable but don't have top sheets, only a duvet cover. We have to assume and hope that they launder the duvet covers after each guest. It was, on the surface, somewhat clean, although the shower curtain had black mold and there was hair in the drain. There was no stopper for the bathtub.  Items in the kitchen (spatula, fridge, and pan) had remnants of food. The hallway outside of the apartment smelled of fried food the entire week. Really bad smell, which isn't the fault of the host, but may be an issue for some. It was nice to have access to a gym on the top floor. Do not stay here if you are counting on using the garage parking. You need a card to get in and out of the garage, which means you need to park on the street (in a very busy area) on arrival and then departure in order to collect/deposit the card in the apartment. Finally, if a solo traveler or if concerned about safety, be aware that the keys (only one key was left--we had to ask for a second) are left in the unlocked apartment for you to let yourself in after using a code to enter the building. This and parking system are not in the description but should be disclosed before paying so people can make more informed choices. Neither of us would stay here again.
Very cozy and very good location.
Matt's appartment is very good and comfortable, very clean and close to supermarket and underground station.  Definitely recommend.
Clean, big space in a good location!
